</aside>

</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>You are protected, in short, by your ability to <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a>! The only protection that can possibly work against the lure of power like Voldemort's! In spite of all the temptation you have endured, all the suffering, you remain pure of heart, just as pure as you were at the age of eleven, when you stared into a <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">mirror that reflected your heart's desire</a>, and it showed you only the way to thwart Lord Voldemort, and not immortality or riches. Harry, have you any idea how few wizards could have seen what you saw in that mirror?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Dumbledore's description of Harry's rare nature and the power that Harry has but not Lord Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p><b>Harry James</b><sup id="cite_ref-DH7_59-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH7-59">&#91;59&#93;</a></sup><b> Potter</b> (b. <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a> <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a><sup id="cite_ref-PM-HP_1-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-HP-1">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup>) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Half-blood" title="Half-blood">half-blood</a><sup id="cite_ref-blood_2-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-blood-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a>, and one of the most famous wizards of modern times. He was the only child and son of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">Lily Potter</a> <span class="template-c">(née <a href="/wiki/Evans_family" title="Evans family">Evans</a>)</span>, both members of the original <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>. Harry's birth was overshadowed by a <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_first_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s first prophecy">prophecy</a>, naming either himself or <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> as the one with the power to vanquish <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>. After half of the prophecy was reported to Voldemort, courtesy of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, Harry was chosen as the target due to his many similarities with the Dark Lord. In turn, this caused the <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">Potter family</a> to go into hiding. Voldemort made his first <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1981)">vain attempt</a> to circumvent the prophecy when Harry was a year and three months old. During this attempt, he murdered Harry's parents as they tried to protect him, but this unsuccessful attempt to kill Harry led to Voldemort's first downfall. This downfall marked the end of the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a>, and to Harry henceforth being known as the "Boy Who Lived",<sup id="cite_ref-PS1_5-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS1-5">&#91;5&#93;</a></sup> as he was the only known survivor of the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>. 
</p><p>One consequence of Lily's <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">loving sacrifice</a> was that her orphaned son had to be raised by her only remaining blood relative, his <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> aunt, <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia Dursley</a>. While in her care he would be protected from Lord Voldemort, due to the <a href="/wiki/Bond_of_blood_charm" title="Bond of blood charm">Bond of Blood</a> charm <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> placed upon him.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP37_60-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP37-60">&#91;60&#93;</a></sup> This powerful charm would protect him until he became of age, or no longer called his aunt's house home. Due to Petunia's resentment of her sister and her magic gifts, Harry grew up abused and neglected.
</p><p>On his eleventh birthday, Harry learned that he was a wizard, from <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS4_61-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS4-61">&#91;61&#93;</a></sup> He began attending <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a> in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>. The <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> was initially going to Sort Harry into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin House</a>, but Harry pleaded 'not Slytherin' and the Hat heeded this plea, instead sorting the young wizard into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor House</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS7_62-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS7-62">&#91;62&#93;</a></sup> At school, Harry became best friends with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>. He later became the youngest <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> Seeker in over a century and eventually the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Captain#Hogwarts_Quidditch_Captains" title="Quidditch Captain">captain</a> of the Gryffindor House Quidditch Team in his <a href="/wiki/Sixth_year" title="Sixth year">sixth year</a>, winning two <a href="/wiki/Inter-House_Quidditch_Cup" title="Inter-House Quidditch Cup">Quidditch Cups</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-63" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-63">&#91;63&#93;</a></sup> He became even better known in his early years for protecting the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> from Voldemort, saving Ron's sister <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, solving the mystery of the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>, slaying <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_basilisk" class="mw-redirect" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s basilisk">basilisk</a>, and learning how to conjure a corporeal stag <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> at the age of thirteen. In his fourth year, Harry won the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, although the competition ended with the tragic death of <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">return</a> of Lord Voldemort. During the next school year, Harry reluctantly taught and led <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>. He also fought in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, during which he lost his godfather, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>.
</p><p>Harry played a significant role in many other battles of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>. He, Ron, and Hermione hunted down and destroyed Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. During the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, Harry personally saw the deaths of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a> while learning that <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>, <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a>, and many <a href="/wiki/Fallen_Fifty" title="Fallen Fifty">others</a> had fallen in battle as well. He encountered Voldemort and nearly sacrificed himself, knowing that his doing so was the only way to destroy the fragment of Voldemort's soul inside of him. In <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">limbo</a>, after Voldemort cursed him in the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">forest clearing</a>, Albus Dumbledore gave Harry advice and background information on the Dark Lord. When told he could choose to live or to "move on", Harry chose to live. After he awoke, Harry confronted Voldemort and defeated him once and for all. 
</p><p>Harry was also noted for being the only known <a href="/wiki/Master_of_Death" title="Master of Death">Master of Death</a>, having united the three <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> at the mere age of seventeen.
</p><p>After the war, Harry became an <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> and helped reform and revolutionise the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-TODAY_57-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-TODAY-57">&#91;57&#93;</a></sup> At some point, he married Ginny Weasley, with whom he had three children: <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius</a> (named after his father and godfather), <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a> (named after Albus Dumbledore and Severus Snape), and <a href="/wiki/Lily_L._Potter" title="Lily L. Potter">Lily Luna</a> (named after his mother and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>). He was also named the godfather of <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Edward "Teddy" Remus Lupin</a>. In <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a> Harry was promoted to Head of the <a href="/wiki/Auror_Office" title="Auror Office">Auror Office</a> at the age of 26,<sup id="cite_ref-64" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-64">&#91;64&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-WOTM_56-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WOTM-56">&#91;56&#93;</a></sup> and would occasionally deliver <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> lectures at Hogwarts.<sup id="cite_ref-TODAY_57-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-TODAY-57">&#91;57&#93;</a></sup> He later went on to be Head of the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Department of Magical Law Enforcement</a> by the summer of <a href="/wiki/2020" title="2020">2020</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-CC15_58-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CC15-58">&#91;58&#93;</a></sup>
</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Biography">Biography</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=1" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Biography">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: Biography"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span id="Early_life_(1980-1991)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Early_life_.281980-1991.29">Early life <span class="template-c">(1980-1991)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=2" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Early life (1980-1991)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: Early life (1980-1991)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>But what happened to Vol - Sorry, I mean, You-Know-Who?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hagrid</b>: "<i>Good question, Harry. Disappeared. Vanished. Same night he tried to kill you. Makes yeh more famous. That's the biggest myst'ry, see ... he was gettin' more an' more powerful - why'd he go?</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Hagrid and Harry discussing Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Harry James Potter was born on <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a> <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a>, to <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">Lily Potter</a> (née <a href="/wiki/Evans_family" title="Evans family">Evans</a>), two members of the original <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> at the height of the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a>, only hours after his classmate-to-be <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-65" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-65">&#91;65&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Lily and James went into hiding in late <a href="/wiki/1979" title="1979">1979</a> when they discovered she was pregnant.<sup id="cite_ref-carnegie_66-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-carnegie-66">&#91;66&#93;</a></sup> When Harry was born, Lily held a <a href="/wiki/Christening_of_Harry_Potter" title="Christening of Harry Potter">christening</a>; it was quiet and quick, with only James, Lily, Harry, and <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> in attendance.<sup id="cite_ref-DH10_67-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH10-67">&#91;67&#93;</a></sup> Harry spent his infancy in hiding with his parents in the <a href="/wiki/Potter_cottage" title="Potter cottage">Potter cottage</a> at <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> in the <a href="/wiki/West_Country" title="West Country">West Country</a>, <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">England</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH16_23-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH16-23">&#91;23&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>For Harry's first birthday, Sirius bought him a <a href="/wiki/Toy_broomstick" title="Toy broomstick">toy broomstick</a>. In Lily's letter to Sirius, it mentioned that this broomstick had been Harry's favourite present and that he had smashed a horrible vase that had been a gift from Petunia. In the letter, Lily also included a picture of Harry flying around on the broom and James chasing after him. Lily also stated in the letter that<i> </i>Harry looked pleased with himself while flying around on the toy broom<i>. </i>Lily and James also hosted a very quiet birthday tea. The only ones in attendance were them, Harry, and <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>. Bathilda also used to dote on infant Harry. The Potters owned a cat, but it is unknown what happened to it after Voldemort's attack.<sup id="cite_ref-DH10_67-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH10-67">&#91;67&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140804174322" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort arrives.gif" data-image-key="Voldemort_arrives.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140804174322" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140804174322" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140804174322" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort arrives.gif" data-image-key="Voldemort_arrives.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140804174322" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_arrives.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort arriving at <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, planning to murder infant Harry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>To keep them safe from <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, who had marked them for death after hearing of <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_first_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s first prophecy">a prophecy</a> regarding his downfall at the hands of a male child born at the end of July in 1980, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> suggested they use the <a href="/wiki/Fidelius_Charm" title="Fidelius Charm">Fidelius Charm</a>. Dumbledore even offered to be the Potter's <a href="/wiki/Secret_Keeper" title="Secret Keeper">Secret Keeper</a>, but the Potters had planned to make Harry's godfather <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> their Secret Keeper instead. On Sirius' advice, they changed this designation to <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, who they thought would be less suspicious.<sup id="cite_ref-POA19_68-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA19-68">&#91;68&#93;</a></sup> In a terrible turn of fate, Pettigrew was a spy and <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eater</a> for Voldemort and barely a week later betrayed the Potter's and gave their whereabouts.<sup id="cite_ref-69" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-69">&#91;69&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span id="Attack_at_Godric's_Hollow_(1981)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Attack_at_Godric.27s_Hollow_.281981.29"><a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1981)">Attack at Godric's Hollow (1981)</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=3" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Attack at Godric&#039;s Hollow (1981)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Attack at Godric&#039;s Hollow (1981)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>This boy will be famous, a legend. I wouldn't be surprised if today was known as Harry Potter day in future. There will be books written about Harry, every child in our <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">world</a> will know his name!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a> regarding Harry's future in the wizarding world<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 249px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606142545" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="247" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Voldemort 1981.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/247?cb=20180606142545" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606142545" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/247?cb=20180606142545" decoding="async" width="247" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Voldemort 1981.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/247?cb=20180606142545" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as an infant facing death for the first time at the hands of Lord Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On the evening of <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en" title="Hallowe&#39;en">Hallowe'en</a> in <a href="/wiki/1981" title="1981">1981</a>, <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> arrived at Godric's Hollow and murdered James and Lily. He murdered James first, who tried to distract the Dark Lord; unfortunately, he did not have his wand with him and was killed immediately. Voldemort then advanced on Lily, who died trying to protect Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-DH17_70-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH17-70">&#91;70&#93;</a></sup> Her <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">sacrifice</a> prevented the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> from working on Harry, resulting in her <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a> for Harry becoming a barrier to protecting him. When Voldemort attempted the curse on Harry it backfired on the caster and instead of murdering Harry, Voldemort lost all his powers and his physical form was obliterated.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/33/Potter_family_murder.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161007230659" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Potter family murder.gif" data-image-key="Potter_family_murder.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/33/Potter_family_murder.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161007230659" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/33/Potter_family_murder.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161007230659" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/33/Potter_family_murder.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161007230659" decoding="async" width="245" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Potter family murder.gif" data-image-key="Potter_family_murder.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/33/Potter_family_murder.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161007230659" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potter_family_murder.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Potter family <a href="/wiki/Potters%27_Cottage" class="mw-redirect" title="Potters&#39; Cottage">home</a> under attack, as Lily Potter was being murdered by Lord Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort was saved from death by the five Horcruxes he had made up to that point, including his <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">diary</a>, <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt&#39;s Ring">Gaunt's ring</a>, <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_locket" class="mw-redirect" title="Slytherin&#39;s locket">Slytherin's locket</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_cup" class="mw-redirect" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s cup">Hufflepuff's cup</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw%27s_diadem" class="mw-redirect" title="Ravenclaw&#39;s diadem">Ravenclaw's diadem</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-71" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-71">&#91;71&#93;</a></sup> Later this also included Harry himself, because a piece of Voldemort's unstable soul latched onto the only living being present. This gave him some of Voldemort's abilities such as the ability to speak <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>. This event made Harry the only person to have survived the Killing Curse, thus giving him the title the "Boy Who Lived". The failed curse left a <a href="/wiki/Harry%27s_scars" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry&#39;s scars">lightning-bolt scar</a> on his forehead marking him as Voldemort's equal. The scar would be a bane and also a blessing to Harry in the years to come, as it opened a telepathic link between Lord Voldemort and himself, giving each some awareness of each other's thoughts.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8e/Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208050449" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="134" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hagrid delivers Harry.jpg" data-image-key="Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8e/Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20161208050449" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8e/Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208050449" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8e/Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20161208050449" decoding="async" width="240" height="134" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hagrid delivers Harry.jpg" data-image-key="Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8e/Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20161208050449" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hagrid_delivers_Harry.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> delivering baby Harry to 4 Privet Drive</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> rescued Harry from the house, partially destroyed by Voldemort's faulty killing curse, and was given specific orders from <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> to take him to his <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">aunt</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">uncle</a>. As Hagrid left, he was intercepted by <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, a close friend of the Potters, who pleaded for Hagrid to give the baby to him, as he was the chosen guardian in the event of James and Lily's death. Hagrid refused, saying that he was under orders from Dumbledore to take Harry to his relatives. Sirius, though reluctant, relented and gave Hagrid his flying motorcycle to take Harry to <a href="/wiki/Privet_Drive" title="Privet Drive">Privet Drive</a>, and left to find <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, who subsequently faked his death and framed Sirius for his death and the death of twelve <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggles</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA10_72-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA10-72">&#91;72&#93;</a></sup> Later this encounter with Hagrid was used to support the idea that Sirius Black betrayed the Potters to Voldemort.
</p><p>Hagrid delivered Harry to Dumbledore late on the evening of <a href="/wiki/1_November" title="1 November">1 November</a> <a href="/wiki/1981" title="1981">1981</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS1_5-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS1-5">&#91;5&#93;</a></sup> Dumbledore left a letter of explanation to the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>, but they never relayed it to Harry. Instead, Harry spent the next decade of his life in their strict and miserable home without knowing that he was a wizard.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Life_at_Privet_Drive">Life at Privet Drive</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=4" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Life at Privet Drive">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=4" title="Edit section: Life at Privet Drive"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>I'm not having one in the house, Petunia! Didn't we swear when we took him in we'd stamp out <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">that dangerous nonsense</a>?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Vernon Dursley refusing that Harry was a wizard<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png/revision/latest?cb=20180606153618" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Baby Harry Left At Privet Drive.png" data-image-key="Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180606153618" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png/revision/latest?cb=20180606153618" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180606153618" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Baby Harry Left At Privet Drive.png" data-image-key="Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180606153618" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Baby_Harry_Left_At_Privet_Drive.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore leaving infant Potter with a note at the doorstep of 4 Privet Drive</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure> 
<p>As Harry's aunt and uncle, the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>, were <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggles</a>, and they had no understanding of magic, and even though his aunt and uncle knew about his lineage, they wanted absolutely nothing to do with it. The <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> proudly considered themselves a "normal" family and despised anything out of the ordinary. They lied to Harry about his parents' death, claiming they had died in a car crash. They also claimed that the <a href="/wiki/Scar" title="Scar">lightning-bolt scar</a> on Harry's forehead (which he had received from Voldemort's failed <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>, and could vaguely recall as if he 'strained his memory' a green flash of light and a <i>high, cold, laugh</i>.) was from the same car crash his parents died in.<sup id="cite_ref-PS2_73-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS2-73">&#91;73&#93;</a></sup> He tried to understand what it was, or if it was from the car crash, but he simply could not. <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon</a> forbade  Harry from asking questions, particularly those regarding his parents. In addition, the Dursleys refused to have pictures of Lily and James, and did their best to avoid the subject of Harry's parents altogether.<sup id="cite_ref-74" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-74">&#91;74&#93;</a></sup> 
</p><p>They resented Harry for his <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a>, which was sporadic, but evident and strongly discouraged any sort of imagination. They neglected Harry, verbally and emotionally abused him, and inflicted cruel punishments like depriving him of meals and locking him into the cupboard under the stairs on him whenever something "unusual" occurred. Their behaviour was left unreported to authorities. In his youth, Harry could make strange things happen without understanding why he could, as no one had told him that he was a <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a>. For instance, after Petunia had sheared off all of his messy hair using a pair of kitchen scissors in her fury that it would not lay flat, leaving him almost completely bald with only the fringe at the front, it had grown all the way back, and to its previous messy state at that, by the next morning. Harry was punished, even though he had not done anything on purpose. Another time, <a href="/wiki/Dedalus_Diggle" title="Dedalus Diggle">Dedalus Diggle</a> bowed to him in a shop, and Petunia furiously interrogated Harry as to know how he knew the man before leaving the shop hastily.<sup id="cite_ref-PS2_73-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS2-73">&#91;73&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 243px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif/revision/latest?cb=20140621030117" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Cupboard under the stairs GIF..gif" data-image-key="Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140621030117" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif/revision/latest?cb=20140621030117" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140621030117" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Cupboard under the stairs GIF..gif" data-image-key="Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140621030117" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Cupboard_under_the_stairs_GIF..gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Potter living in a cupboard beneath the staircase</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> spoiled and pampered their son <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> and paid almost no attention to Harry; indeed, what little attention they did pay to him was negative in its entirety. All his clothes were hand-me-downs from Dudley and were far too large for Harry. He was made to sleep in the <a href="/wiki/Cupboard_Under_the_Stairs" title="Cupboard Under the Stairs">Cupboard Under the Stairs</a>, while his cousin got two bedrooms to himself (one for sleeping in and one for storing all his toys). They also made Harry do household chores for them, such as making food and getting the post. In time, Dudley started bullying Harry. The Dursleys took Dudley and <a href="/wiki/Piers_Polkiss" title="Piers Polkiss">Piers Polkiss</a> to someplace spectacular every year for his birthday, but the only thing Harry ever got for his birthday was one of Vernon's old socks or a coat hanger.
</p><p>The Dursleys always hid evidence of Harry's existence by not having pictures of him in the house. Among the few people who did know about Harry were Petunia's friend <a href="/wiki/Yvonne" title="Yvonne">Yvonne</a> and Vernon's sister <a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">Marge</a>, the latter of whom the boy was forced to consider an aunt to him despite not being a relative of his. Aunt Marge showed the most dislike for the frail boy while visiting <a href="/wiki/Privet_Drive" title="Privet Drive">Privet Drive</a> during <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley%27s_fifth_birthday" title="Dudley Dursley&#39;s fifth birthday">Dudley Dursley's fifth birthday</a>, when she whacked Harry around the shins to stop him from beating Dudley at <a href="/wiki/Musical_statues" title="Musical statues">musical statues</a>, and on holidays like Christmas, when she brought a computerised robot for Dudley and a box of dog biscuits for Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-PS2_73-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS2-73">&#91;73&#93;</a></sup> She eventually made a fool out of the young Potter during Dudley's tenth birthday, when Harry accidentally stepped on the paw of her favourite pet bulldog <a href="/wiki/Ripper" title="Ripper">Ripper</a>, causing the enraged dog to chase him out into the garden and up a tree. <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> laughed himself silly at the sight of his cousin then, and to the Dursleys' delight, Marge refused to call Ripper off until past midnight.<sup id="cite_ref-PS2_73-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS2-73">&#91;73&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Harry_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606153221" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry privet drive.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_privet_drive.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Harry_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180606153221" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Harry_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606153221" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Harry_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180606153221" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry privet drive.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_privet_drive.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Harry_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180606153221" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_privet_drive.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with his aunt in the kitchen of 4 Privet Drive</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's hardship, however, was highly necessary as by returning to live with his mother's only living blood relative, the protection that Lily gave Harry would continue. While Harry could call that place home he could not be harmed. However, the <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">Bond of Blood</a> charm would be broken when Harry turned seventeen years old, or when he no longer called <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> his home.
</p><p>Unknown to Harry, one of his neighbours, <a href="/wiki/Arabella_Figg" title="Arabella Figg">Arabella Figg</a>, was a <a href="/wiki/Squib" title="Squib">Squib</a>. Unfortunately for Harry, to maintain favour with the Dursleys, she was forced by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> to give him a lousy time whenever she had to look after him, as the Dursleys would never have let him go if they knew Harry was enjoying himself, a possibility that infuriated them. Harry discovered her connection to the wizarding world when it was revealed during the summer before his fifth year that she worked undercover for the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> to keep tabs on Harry's suffering.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest?cb=20180606153415" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HarryParseltongue.png" data-image-key="HarryParseltongue.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180606153415" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest?cb=20180606153415" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180606153415" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HarryParseltongue.png" data-image-key="HarryParseltongue.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180606153415" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HarryParseltongue.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Potter speaking <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a> to a boa constrictor at the zoo</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/23_June" title="23 June">23 June</a> <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, Dudley's eleventh birthday, the Dursleys went to the <a href="/wiki/Zoo" title="Zoo">zoo</a> with Dudley's best friend Piers Polkiss. Unfortunately for the Dursleys, they had to take Harry with them, as Mrs Figg had broken her leg and there was no one to take Harry, and they refused to leave him alone in their house. At the zoo, Harry <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">spoke</a> with a <a href="/wiki/Boa_constrictor_at_the_Zoo" title="Boa constrictor at the Zoo">boa constrictor</a> and unintentionally made the glass of its enclosure <a href="/wiki/Vanishment" title="Vanishment">disappear</a>. This allowed the snake to slither out of his cage which scared Dudley into thinking it was after him. Harry was able to communicate in Parseltongue with the freed boa, which thanked Harry briefly, then slithered out of the reptile house calmly.<sup id="cite_ref-PS2_73-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS2-73">&#91;73&#93;</a></sup> After this incident, the enraged <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> sentenced Harry to his cupboard until the beginning of the summer holidays.<sup id="cite_ref-PS3_75-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS3-75">&#91;75&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span id="St._Grogory's_Primary_School"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="St._Grogory.27s_Primary_School">St. Grogory's Primary School</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=5" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: St. Grogory&#039;s Primary School">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=5" title="Edit section: St. Grogory&#039;s Primary School"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>At school, Harry had no one. Everybody knew that Dudley's gang hated that odd Harry Potter in his baggy old clothes and broken glasses, and nobody liked to disagree with Dudley's gang.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;The reason Harry had no friends at school<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 202px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Blue_Wig.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111029231526" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="200" height="187" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Blue Wig.jpg" data-image-key="Blue_Wig.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Blue_Wig.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20111029231526" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Blue_Wig.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111029231526" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Blue_Wig.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20111029231526" decoding="async" width="200" height="187" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Blue Wig.jpg" data-image-key="Blue_Wig.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Blue_Wig.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20111029231526" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Blue_Wig.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's <a href="/wiki/Unidentified_teacher_at_St._Grogory%27s_Primary_School" title="Unidentified teacher at St. Grogory&#39;s Primary School">primary school teacher</a> panicking after he accidentally turned her wig blue</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry attended <a href="/wiki/St._Grogory%27s_Primary_School" title="St. Grogory&#39;s Primary School">St. Grogory's Primary School</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-hppts_76-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-hppts-76">&#91;76&#93;</a></sup> a Muggle primary school, with Dudley. He had no friends there, since all the students were afraid of <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley%27s_gang" title="Dudley Dursley&#39;s gang">Dudley's gang</a>, all of whose members hated Harry because Dudley did. In particular, Dudley's friends liked to play a unique game — '<a href="/wiki/Harry_Hunting" title="Harry Hunting">Harry Hunting</a>' — which involved chasing Harry. Although he was good at sports, he was always the last picked for a team because no one wanted to admit to Dudley that they liked him, rather than because he was no good.
</p><p>Harry got decent, if not good grades at school. On one occasion, Harry accidentally turned his teacher's wig blue; on another, he accidentally <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">apparated</a> onto the school kitchen roof when escaping from Dudley's gang; and on a third, he made Dudley's old jumper shrink as <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Aunt Petunia</a> tried to shove it over his head. These incidents always enraged the Dursleys, and after each, they would punish Harry by throwing him into the cupboard — except for after the jumper incident because Aunt Petunia thought that the jumper had shrunk in the wash.
</p><p>If Harry had not gone to Hogwarts, then he would have attended <a href="/wiki/Stonewall_High" title="Stonewall High">Stonewall High</a>, a Muggle secondary school that Harry dreaded attending.<sup id="cite_ref-77" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-77">&#91;77&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Discovery_of_being_a_wizard">Discovery of being a wizard</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=6" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Discovery of being a wizard">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=6" title="Edit section: Discovery of being a wizard"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Hagrid</b>: "<i>Harry - yer a wizard.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I'm a what?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hagrid</b>: "<i>A wizard, o' course, an' a thumpin' good'un, I'd say once yeh've been trained up a bit. With a mum an' dad like yours, what else would yeh be? An' I reckon it's about time yeh read yer letter.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Hagrid informing Harry of his heritage<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912122002" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hogwarts letter.gif" data-image-key="Hogwarts_letter.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912122002" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912122002" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912122002" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hogwarts letter.gif" data-image-key="Hogwarts_letter.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912122002" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hogwarts_letter.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Potter's Hogwarts acceptance letter</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had no birthday celebrations until the day he turned 11, which was the same day that he discovered the exceptional reality about <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">his identity</a>. On the week of Harry's birthday, hundreds of letters began arriving at the Dursleys's home, addressed to him from a place called <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a>. When the Dursleys saw the first letter was addressed as "<i>cupboard under the stairs</i>", they panicked at the thought of Harry's ill treatment being observed and transferred him to Dudley's second bedroom out of fear of being arrested for child abuse, which soon appeared on letters as the <a href="/wiki/The_Smallest_Bedroom" class="mw-redirect" title="The Smallest Bedroom"><i>smallest bedroom.</i></a>
</p><p>When <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Uncle Vernon</a> first read the letter, he turned a pale porridge grey out of fear that wizards were trying to contact Harry. Because of this, Vernon tried to destroy the letters in a futile attempt to keep Harry from his destiny. But the letters kept coming in increasingly larger quantities, to the point where they started flying out of the fireplace by the dozens, and as they did, the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> saw no alternative, but to flee from them. This was not enough to let the Dursleys avoid the letters, as the owls carrying these letters followed them wherever they went. On <a href="/wiki/30_July" title="30 July">30 July</a> <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, In a final desperate move on, the Dursleys moved to a <a href="/wiki/Hut-on-the-Rock" title="Hut-on-the-Rock">shack</a> on a rocky island at the edge of the sea.<sup id="cite_ref-PS3_75-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS3-75">&#91;75&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 241px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111131533" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="239" height="122" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry birthday.gif" data-image-key="Harry_birthday.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/239?cb=20141111131533" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111131533" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/239?cb=20141111131533" decoding="async" width="239" height="122" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry birthday.gif" data-image-key="Harry_birthday.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/239?cb=20141111131533" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_birthday.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Potter receiving a birthday cake from <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> on his eleventh birthday</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At midnight on <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">Harry's birthday</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> appeared in person to find out why Harry had not received his letter. He was infuriated by the Dursleys and explained to Harry, in spite of Vernon's obstinate protests, that he was a wizard, <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1981)">how his parents died</a>, that <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> demanded him to take Harry from the ruined house to his hated relatives, and that he was to be sent to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.<sup id="cite_ref-PS4_61-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS4-61">&#91;61&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>This would be Harry's first birthday celebration and Hagrid gave him a small homemade birthday cake and later, a snowy owl. Harry named her <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a>, a name he had found from his textbook (History of Magic by Bathilda Bagshot). This was the first birthday present Harry ever received. Hagrid took Harry to the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a>, where he learned that he was famous. He met <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirinus Quirrell</a>, his soon-to-be <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher at Hogwarts, the Inn-keeper <a href="/wiki/Tom" title="Tom">Tom</a>, a witch named <a href="/wiki/Doris_Crockford" title="Doris Crockford">Doris Crockford</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Dedalus_Diggle" title="Dedalus Diggle">Dedalus Diggle</a> — the man who had bowed to Harry several years earlier. Hagrid then took Harry to <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>, where he learned more about his fame in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a> and that his parents had left him a small fortune in a <a href="/wiki/Vault_687" title="Vault 687">vault</a> at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 249px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208051711" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="247" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="00Wand shopPM.png" data-image-key="00Wand_shopPM.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/247?cb=20161208051711" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208051711" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/247?cb=20161208051711" decoding="async" width="247" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="00Wand shopPM.png" data-image-key="00Wand_shopPM.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/247?cb=20161208051711" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:00Wand_shopPM.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Potter at Ollivander's on Diagon Alley buying <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">his wand</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry bought his first wand from Ollivander's that very day. The wand that chose Harry was made of holly wood and had a <a href="/wiki/Phoenix_feather" title="Phoenix feather">phoenix feather</a> core; it was 11", nice and supple. The phoenix feather at its core came from Dumbledore's phoenix <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a>. It was crafted by Garrick Ollivander, who had also created a twin wand. This wand had been made from yew, and contained the only other feather supplied by Fawkes. This twin wand had long ago chosen <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a> as its master. But Riddle, after he turned to evil and assumed the alias of Lord Voldemort, ended up using this wand to attack Harry and his parents. The two wands, sharing the same phoenix origin, had a <a href="/wiki/Reverse_Spell" title="Reverse Spell">unique connection</a> which would prevent them from successfully duelling against each other in the years to come.
</p>
<h3><span id="Hogwarts_years_(1991-1997)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Hogwarts_years_.281991-1997.29">Hogwarts years <span class="template-c">(1991-1997)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=7" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Hogwarts years (1991-1997)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=7" title="Edit section: Hogwarts years (1991-1997)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="First_year">First year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=8" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: First year">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=8" title="Edit section: First year"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>But why couldn’t Quirrell touch me?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Your mother died to save you. If there is one thing Voldemort cannot understand, it is love. He didn’t realise that love as powerful as your mother’s for you leaves its own mark. Not a scar, no visible sign . . . to have been loved so deeply, even though the person who loved us is gone, will give us some protection forever. It is in your very skin. Quirrell, full of hatred, greed, and ambition, sharing his soul with Voldemort, could not touch you for this reason. It was agony to touch a person marked by something so good.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> regarding the power of love<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Harry was guided further to his destiny on <a href="/wiki/1_September" title="1 September">1 September</a>, <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, when he was dropped off by the Dursleys at King's Cross Station. Vernon helped Harry wheel his things to the platforms and left laughing about how <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform Nine and Three-Quarters</a> hadn't been built yet. The family then drove off leaving Harry at the busy station all alone. With only ten minutes left until the train's departure at eleven a.m., Harry was panicking when he overheard a red-headed family complaining about the station being packed with Muggles and he noticed they had an owl with their belongings.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180607010810" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry meeting the Weasleys..jpg" data-image-key="Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180607010810" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180607010810" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180607010810" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry meeting the Weasleys..jpg" data-image-key="Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180607010810" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_meeting_the_Weasleys..jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry meeting the Weasleys for the first time at <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry watched as the older boys magically passed through the barrier between platforms nine and ten. Harry nervously interrupted them and was introduced to the youngest son <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, who was starting his first year as well. Molly (Ron's mother) kindly gave him instructions on how to board the platform. Harry quickly ran through the barrier, followed by Ron, and arrived on the Platform, catching his first sight of the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>. As most of the compartments were full, Harry pushed his things to near the end of the train, and with some help from twins from the red-headed family, was able to get his things aboard.<sup id="cite_ref-PS6_78-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS6-78">&#91;78&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>While helping, the twins noticed his scar and recognised that he must be Harry Potter. While Harry sat near the window in his compartment watching the family, the twins <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a> reported this discovery to the amazement of their little sister <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> and their older brother <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy</a> who was a <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">Prefect</a> and had already changed into his robes. After boarding, the train soon departed and Ron asked if he could sit with Harry, who agreed. Ron asked Harry about his scar, and Harry asked if Ron's <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">whole family</a> were wizards, which they are except for his mother’s <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley%27s_second_cousin" title="Molly Weasley&#39;s second cousin">second cousin</a>, who was an accountant. When the <a href="/wiki/Trolley_witch" title="Trolley witch">Trolley witch</a> came by around half-past twelve, Harry bought some of all the treats from the cart and shared them with Ron.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160215161419" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="111" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Trio meet.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_meet.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160215161419" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160215161419" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160215161419" decoding="async" width="245" height="111" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Trio meet.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_meet.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160215161419" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trio_meet.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio meeting for the first time aboard the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> soon came by searching for his lost <a href="/wiki/Toad" title="Toad">toad</a>, <a href="/wiki/Trevor" title="Trevor">Trevor</a>. While Ron was attempting a <a href="/wiki/Spell_to_turn_Scabbers_yellow" title="Spell to turn Scabbers yellow">magic spell</a> to change his rat <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew#Scabbers" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> interrupted trying to help find Trevor. After Ron's spell failed, Hermione introduced herself and upon learning Harry's name, informed him that he was in several books on magical history. While speculating which house they might be in, Harry and Ron were interrupted by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a>. Although Draco attempted to ingratiate himself, Harry refused to shake his hand after he insulted Ron and his family. When Goyle attempted to take some of their <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog_Card" title="Chocolate Frog Card">Chocolate Frog Cards</a>, Scabbers bit his finger and helped drive them off. Ron afterwards explained that the <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_family" title="Malfoy family">Malfoy family</a> were on Voldemort's side, but came back saying they had been bewitched, although <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">his father</a> didn't believe it.<sup id="cite_ref-PS6_78-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS6-78">&#91;78&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Upon arriving, Hagrid gathered all the first years together and they followed a path down to the edge of a <a href="/wiki/Great_Lake" title="Great Lake">Great Lake</a>. In groups of no more than four, they climbed aboard a little fleet of small boats, and sailed across the lake to an underground harbour. Helping to remind Neville to take his toad, Hagrid took them up a passageway to the gates of the castle.<sup id="cite_ref-PS6_78-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS6-78">&#91;78&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Sorting_ceremony">The Sorting ceremony</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=9" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Sorting ceremony">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=9" title="Edit section: The Sorting ceremony"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry's choice to be Sorted into Gryffindor<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>The new students were greeted at the castle door by <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor Minerva McGonagall</a>, who explained the four houses of Hogwarts: <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuff</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaw</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>, as well as the <a href="/wiki/Forum:House_Cup_Competition_rules" title="Forum:House Cup Competition rules">rules of the</a> <a href="/wiki/House_Cup" title="House Cup">House Cup</a>. McGonagall led the first years into a <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Reception" title="Chamber of Reception">small room</a> off the <a href="/wiki/Entrance_Hall" title="Entrance Hall">Entrance Hall</a> and told them to wait until she returned. When she did, they were led into the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>, where they were greeted by the rest of the students, and more importantly, a <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">shabby wizard's hat</a> on a <a href="/wiki/Sorting_ceremony_stool" title="Sorting ceremony stool">small stool</a>.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 246px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150906012040" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="244" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20150906012040" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150906012040" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20150906012040" decoding="async" width="244" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20150906012040" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter1-disneyscreencaps.com-5582.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry during the Sorting Ceremony</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was particularly anxious, as he did not feel that any of the Houses as they were described in the Hat's song were right for him. Harry noted that <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, whom Harry had met in <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>, was instantly placed in Slytherin, and remembered what <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> had told him about Slytherin's reputation for turning out <a href="/wiki/Dark_Wizard" title="Dark Wizard">Dark Wizards</a>, and that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> had been in Slytherin. When Harry put on the Hat, it slipped down past his eyes, and the hat told him that he "would do well in Slytherin". Thinking of Voldemort, Harry desperately repeated the phrase "not Slytherin". The Hat heeded Harry's request and placed Harry in Gryffindor along with Ron and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>. In his second year during a visit to Dumbledore's office, the Sorting Hat re-emphasised the idea that Harry "would do well in Slytherin".
</p><p>The Sorting Ceremony was followed by the <a href="/wiki/Welcoming_Feast" title="Welcoming Feast">Welcoming Feast</a>. Harry, who had never been allowed to eat as much as he wanted, was overwhelmed by the sheer variety of foods in front of him. Dessert arrived, and talk turned to the first years' families. <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> told the others how his family thought he was a <a href="/wiki/Squib" title="Squib">Squib</a> until his <a href="/wiki/Algie" class="mw-redirect" title="Algie">Great-Uncle</a> accidentally dropped him out of a window, and he bounced.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213530" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HP1-1294.jpg" data-image-key="HP1-1294.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141122213530" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213530" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141122213530" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HP1-1294.jpg" data-image-key="HP1-1294.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141122213530" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HP1-1294.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as his scar begins to hurt during the Sorting ceremony after making eye contact with <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>It was during the Feast that Harry's scar hurt for the first time: Harry was looking up at the staff table at <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a> <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirrell</a> when the <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">hook-nosed teacher</a> Quirrell was talking to looked past Quirrell at Harry, who immediately felt a sharp pain in his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars#The_lightning-bolt_scar" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">scar</a>. This is because Lord Voldemort was inhabiting Quirrell's body as anytime Voldemort is near Harry's scar hurt. After the last morsels melted from the golden plates and goblets, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> gave a speech welcoming the new students to the school and the old students back.
