He added a few warnings about staying away from the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, and avoiding the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Castle#Third_Floor_Corridor" title="Hogwarts Castle">third-floor corridor</a> before leading the school in singing the <a href="/wiki/Hoggy_Warty_Hogwarts" title="Hoggy Warty Hogwarts">School Song</a> and sending everyone off to their dormitories.
</p>
<h5><span id="First_years_lessons/classes"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="First_years_lessons.2Fclasses">First years lessons/classes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=10" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: First years lessons/classes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=10" title="Edit section: First years lessons/classes"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>What is the difference, Potter, between monkshood and wolfsbane?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I don't know. I think Hermione does, though, why don't you try her?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>...And a point will be taken from Gryffindor House for your cheek, Potter</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; From this first interaction Harry deduces Snape's hatred of him<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>In his first ever <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> class, Harry discovered that Professor Snape hated him, mocking him as the school's "new celebrity" before teaching the class how to brew a <a href="/wiki/Boil-Cure_Potion" class="mw-redirect" title="Boil-Cure Potion">Boil-Cure Potion</a>. Harry and Ron went down to Hagrid’s hut for tea, where they met Hagrid's huge and fierce-looking dog, <a href="/wiki/Fang" title="Fang">Fang</a>. Hagrid told Harry that he was overreacting to Snape’s treatment, asserting that he would have no reason to hate him. Hagrid and Ron began to talk about Ron's brother older <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie Weasley</a>. While they were talking, Harry picked up a cutting from the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> that was lying on the table. The article detailed a <a href="/wiki/Break-in_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1991)" title="Break-in of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1991)">break-in</a> that occurred on Harry's birthday at Gringotts. The vault that was broken into was number 713, the same vault Hagrid visited with Harry on their trip to Diagon Alley.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Flying_class_in_1991.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161213051125" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="93" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Flying class in 1991.jpg" data-image-key="Flying_class_in_1991.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Flying_class_in_1991.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161213051125" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Flying_class_in_1991.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161213051125" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Flying_class_in_1991.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161213051125" decoding="async" width="249" height="93" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Flying class in 1991.jpg" data-image-key="Flying_class_in_1991.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Flying_class_in_1991.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161213051125" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Flying_class_in_1991.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hogwarts' first flying class of school year 1991-1992</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>One of the things Harry had been looking forward to was <a href="/wiki/Flying_(class)" title="Flying (class)">learning to fly</a> until he found out that the Gryffindors would be taking flying lessons with the Slytherins. Malfoy had been bragging about his skill to anyone who would listen. <a href="/wiki/Rolanda_Hooch" title="Rolanda Hooch">Madam Rolanda Hooch</a> taught the class by starting with basic broom control. After learning the theory, the students were told to hover gently off the ground on Madam Hooch's go-ahead. Neville, terrified of being left behind, panicked and kicked off before anyone else, rising fifty feet in the air before falling off and breaking his wrist. Madam Hooch took Neville to the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> after warning the other students to stay on the ground until she got back.
</p><p>Draco Malfoy nicked Neville's <a href="/wiki/Remembrall" title="Remembrall">Remembrall</a> from off the ground and was told to give it to Harry, jeering that he'd leave it "up a tree" unless Harry stopped him and took off on his broom. Harry mounted his broom and kicked off after him. As much to his surprise as everyone else's, he discovered that he could not only fly, but that it was something he didn't need to be taught. Bending low on the broom handle, he shot toward Draco, who realised that Harry was a better flyer and threw the Remembrall into the air, daring the famous boy to catch it. Harry raced the ball towards the ground, catching it and coming out of his dive a foot from the ground. He toppled lightly onto the grass amidst the cheers of the Gryffindors, grinning wildly.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/de/Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170529041716" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-seeker harry.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/de/Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170529041716" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/de/Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170529041716" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/de/Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170529041716" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-seeker harry.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/de/Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170529041716" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter1-seeker_harry.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">McGonagall discovering Harry's potential as the new Gryffindor Seeker</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>His euphoria did not last long however, as <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> quickly arrived on the scene. Having seen the dive, she ordered Harry to follow her. Harry, expecting punishment, was instead introduced to <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wood" title="Oliver Wood">Oliver Wood</a>, whom she pulled out of a <a href="/wiki/Charms_(class)" title="Charms (class)">Charms</a> class. Captain of the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a>, Wood's confusion at being introduced to a first year quickly turned to excitement and ecstasy upon hearing McGonagall recount the dive. He told her that Harry would need a decent broom if they were to compete, and explained to Harry that he would make an excellent <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a>, perhaps rivalling the legendary <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie Weasley</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Midnight_Duel">The Midnight Duel</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=11" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Midnight Duel">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=11" title="Edit section: The Midnight Duel"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>You're a lot braver now that you're back on the ground and you've got your little friends with you.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Draco Malfoy</b>: "<i>I'd take you on anytime on my own. Tonight, if you want. <a href="/wiki/Duel" class="mw-redirect" title="Duel">Wizard's duel</a>. Wands only — no contact. What's the matter? Never heard of a wizard's duel before, I suppose?</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Malfoy challenging Harry to a one-on-one duel<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>Harry told <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> about everything that happened after he left with McGonagall over dinner that night, but warned him that Wood wanted to keep it a secret. Much calmer on the ground, and with his cronies <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a> flanking him, Draco came over to taunt Harry about getting in trouble earlier. Enraged that Harry not only escaped trouble, but was instead rewarded, he challenged Harry to a wizard’s duel. In spite of Hermione’s attempt to dissuade them from breaking the school rules, (or perhaps because of it), Harry accepted the challenge.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Trio_third_floor.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170925195031" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Trio third floor.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_third_floor.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Trio_third_floor.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925195031" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Trio_third_floor.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170925195031" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Trio_third_floor.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925195031" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Trio third floor.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_third_floor.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Trio_third_floor.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925195031" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trio_third_floor.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio trespassing in the restricted third-floor corridor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As they left the tower, the t<a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">rio</a> found Neville (whose wrist had been fixed by <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a>) waiting outside, having forgotten the password. Neville decided to go with them and the four arrived at the <a href="/wiki/Trophy_Room" title="Trophy Room">Trophy Room</a> (the site of the duel), but Malfoy was nowhere to be found. They speculated that he may have chickened out and were deciding what to do next when they heard the school caretaker <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Argus Filch</a> and his cat, <a href="/wiki/Mrs_Norris" title="Mrs Norris">Mrs Norris</a>, enter the room. Realising that Draco tricked them and told Filch their location, they attempted to quietly exit the room. A nearby doorknob rattled and <a href="/wiki/Peeves" title="Peeves">Peeves</a>, Hogwarts' resident <a href="/wiki/Poltergeist" title="Poltergeist">poltergeist</a>, burst into the hallway, threatening to expose them.<sup id="cite_ref-79" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-79">&#91;79&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 246px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180605062549" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="244" height="116" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Fluffy PM B1C9M3 ForbiddenCorridorFluffy Moment.jpg" data-image-key="Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20180605062549" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180605062549" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20180605062549" decoding="async" width="244" height="116" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Fluffy PM B1C9M3 ForbiddenCorridorFluffy Moment.jpg" data-image-key="Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20180605062549" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Fluffy_PM_B1C9M3_ForbiddenCorridorFluffy_Moment.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio encounter Fluffy a three-headed dog guarding a trap door</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Growing desperate, Ron took a swipe at Peeves, who began to bellow their whereabouts as loud as he could, attracting Filch. The four kids ran right to the end of the corridor, where they found themselves stopped by a locked door, which <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> opened with the <a href="/wiki/Unlocking_Charm" title="Unlocking Charm">Unlocking Charm</a> using Harry's wand. They hurried inside, thinking themselves out of danger until turning around and coming face-to-face with a monstrous sight: <a href="/wiki/Fluffy" title="Fluffy">a giant three-headed dog</a>. Choosing Filch over death, the children ran for it, somehow managing to get back to their dormitory without running into anyone along the way. Though shaken by the night’s events, Harry’s interest in exploring was piqued by Hermione’s pointing out that the dog was standing on a trapdoor.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Nimbus_2000">The Nimbus 2000</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=12" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Nimbus 2000">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=12" title="Edit section: The Nimbus 2000"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>Wood — I've found you a Seeker. The boy's a natural. I've never seen anything like it. Was that your first time on a broomstick, Potter?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry becomes Gryffindor's new Seeker<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 248px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Broomstick_PS.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606152607" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="246" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Broomstick PS.jpg" data-image-key="Broomstick_PS.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Broomstick_PS.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20180606152607" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Broomstick_PS.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606152607" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Broomstick_PS.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20180606152607" decoding="async" width="246" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Broomstick PS.jpg" data-image-key="Broomstick_PS.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Broomstick_PS.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20180606152607" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Broomstick_PS.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry receives a Nimbus 2000, a gift from Professor McGonagall</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Over breakfast the next morning, Harry and Ron were discussing what Fluffy could be guarding when the mail arrived. Harry, who had received no mail apart from Hagrid’s letter, was intrigued as everyone else by the long, oddly-shaped package in the mail that morning, and was even more surprised than the others when he discovered what was inside: a <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a>, and with a note from Professor McGonagall warning him not to open the package at the table and that he was to meet Wood that night for <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> practice. Taking the broom up to their dormitory, Harry and Ron were stopped by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a>, who seized the package and told Harry that first-year students are not allowed their own <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">brooms</a>. When <a href="/wiki/Filius_Flitwick" title="Filius Flitwick">Professor Flitwick</a> walked up to them, he tried to report Harry, but Flitwick, who had been told of Harry’s special permission, just expressed admiration for Harry’s talent.
</p>
<h5><span id="Hallowe'en"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Hallowe.27en">Hallowe'en</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=13" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Hallowe&#039;en">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=13" title="Edit section: Hallowe&#039;en"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>But from that moment on, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> became their friend. There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other, and knocking out a twelve-foot mountain troll is one of them.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry and Ron form a friendship with Hermione<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170925204339" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-harry seamus charm lesson.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925204339" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170925204339" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925204339" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-harry seamus charm lesson.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925204339" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter1-harry_seamus_charm_lesson.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A Hallowe'en lesson on the <a href="/wiki/Levitation_Charm" title="Levitation Charm">Levitation Charm</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en" title="Hallowe&#39;en">Hallowe'en</a>, Professor Flitwick began teaching his students how to perform the Levitation Charm. Only Hermione succeeded; Ron, offended by her air of superiority, later made a nasty comment that she overheard. The comment was about her lack of friends, causing her to run off to lock herself in the girl's bathroom in tears and making him and Harry feel slightly guilty. When the two went down to the <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en_feast" class="mw-redirect" title="Hallowe&#39;en feast">Hallowe'en feast</a> later, their guilt was forgotten amidst the splendour of the decorations.
</p><p>Partway into the feast, Quirrell arrived to announce that there was a twelve-foot <a href="/wiki/Mountain_Troll" class="mw-redirect" title="Mountain Troll">Mountain Troll</a> in the dungeons before fainting where he stood. The <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefects</a> led the students back to their dorms, but Harry realised that Hermione did not know about the troll and convinced Ron to help save her, since they were responsible. They sneaked off to the girl’s bathroom to warn Hermione, locking the troll inside. However, they didn't realise their mistake until they heard Hermione's terrified scream emanate from the bathroom. A horrified Harry and Ron ran back into the bathroom to rescue her. After a brief skirmish, during which Harry stuck his wand up the trolls nose. Ron finally knocked the troll out, by levitating the troll's own club to smash into it' head.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls%27_Toilets.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161220001752" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="93" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B1C10M3 Troll in First-Floor Girls&#39; Toilets.jpg" data-image-key="B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls&#39;_Toilets.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls%27_Toilets.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161220001752" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls%27_Toilets.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161220001752" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls%27_Toilets.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161220001752" decoding="async" width="249" height="93" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B1C10M3 Troll in First-Floor Girls&#39; Toilets.jpg" data-image-key="B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls&#39;_Toilets.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls%27_Toilets.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161220001752" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B1C10M3_Troll_in_First-Floor_Girls%27_Toilets.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The mountain <a href="/wiki/Troll" title="Troll">troll</a> in the bathroom, where Hermione is hiding</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The teachers arrived, attracted by the troll’s yells, to find Harry, Ron, and Hermione covered in dust, and the bathroom in disarray. <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a>, head of <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a>, began scolding the boys for not going straight to their dormitories with the rest of their house, but instead putting themselves in grave danger. Much to Harry and Ron’s surprise, Hermione lied to McGonagall and told her that she had gone looking for the troll, as she thought she could handle them. She claimed that Harry and Ron were looking for her, (which was true), and she would most likely be dead if the boys had failed to rescue her (also true). The three bonded over the shared experience, and were friends thereafter.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Quidditch">Quidditch</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=14" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Quidditch">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=14" title="Edit section: Quidditch"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I've got the Snitch!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Marcus Flint</b>: "<i>He didn't catch it, he nearly swallowed it!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry catches the Golden Snitch with his mouth<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>As the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> season began Harry became increasingly nervous. The first match of the season was against <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>. Harry was under increasing pressure to show that he was not just a famous name. In an attempt to calm his nerves, Harry borrowed a book entitled <i><a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Through_the_Ages" title="Quidditch Through the Ages">Quidditch Through the Ages</a></i>. A book that was comprehensive history of the sport, that Hermione most have checked put from the library. During break the day before the match, <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">Harry, Ron, and Hermione</a> were huddled together around a <a href="/wiki/Bluebell_Flames" title="Bluebell Flames">jar of flames</a>, which had been conjured by Hermione, to keep warm.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524205110" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="101" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-snape limp.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170524205110" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524205110" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170524205110" decoding="async" width="245" height="101" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-snape limp.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170524205110" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter1-snape_limp.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry notices the blood on Snape's robes and a slight limp when he walks</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> noticed their guilty faces, and looking for a reason to punish them, confiscated Harry’s book on the feeble pretext that library books were not be taken outside. Harry noticed that Snape was limping, as though his leg was injured, strengthening his suspicions that the <a href="/wiki/Potions_Master" title="Potions Master">Potions Master</a> was after whatever it was that Fluffy was guarding. Nervous about the next day's match, Harry decided to ask Snape for the book back; realising that he would most likely be in the <a href="/wiki/Staffroom" title="Staffroom">staffroom</a> and that it would be harder for Snape to bully him if there were other teachers around, Harry decided to confront him. Approaching the door, Harry overheard Snape complaining to <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Filch</a> about Fluffy. After opening the door Harry saw Filch helping Snape to bandage his leg. He returned to the Common Room and then told his two friends everything he had seen.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match_(1991)" title="Gryffindor vs Slytherin Quidditch match (1991)">Gryffindor vs Slytherin Quidditch match (1991)</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208051806" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="93" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B1C11M2 Gryffindor vs Slytherin Quidditch match.jpg" data-image-key="B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208051806" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208051806" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208051806" decoding="async" width="250" height="93" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B1C11M2 Gryffindor vs Slytherin Quidditch match.jpg" data-image-key="B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208051806" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B1C11M2_Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry playing in his first Quidditch match against Slytherin</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had little time to dwell on Snape’s injury as the first <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match began the very next morning. Harry's job as being the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor</a> <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a> was to catch the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a>. The snitch is a walnut-sized gold ball, that is extremely fast and difficult to see. The entire match rested upon the retrival of the Snitch. Harry’s first attempt to catch the Snitch was foiled when the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a> <a href="/wiki/Blatching" title="Blatching">blatched</a> him. Though the Seeker was penalised, the move succeeded in stopping Harry from getting to the Snitch.  
</p><p>Soon after, Harry’s broom began bucking uncontrollably as if trying to unseat him. The bucking became even more violent with each passing second, until Harry was hanging from the broom with just one hand. The crowd looked on with horror, some of the professors had their wands at the ready should he fall. Ron and Hermione began to wonder if the other was at fault. That is until <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, who had arrived to watch the game, noted that it would take <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">powerful dark magic</a> to make a <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a> so hard to manage. Magic that powerful is well above the level of a second year and therefore had to be cases by a qualified wizard. This announcement did nothing to help the worried friends. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif/revision/latest?cb=20170531000806" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry catches the snitch.gif" data-image-key="Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170531000806" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif/revision/latest?cb=20170531000806" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170531000806" decoding="async" width="245" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry catches the snitch.gif" data-image-key="Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170531000806" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_catches_the_snitch.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry catches the Snitch and wins the opening match against Slytherin</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, who had turned her gaze away from Harry, and was scanning the stands, noticed that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> was staring unblinkingly at Harry and muttering nonstop under his breath. Thinking quickly, Hermione took advantage of the fact that everyone’s attention was now focused on Harry (and the Weasley twins’ attempts to rescue him) to run around the entire <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_pitch" title="Quidditch pitch">stadium</a>, knocking over <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Professor Quirrell</a>, and ending up behind Snape. Muttering a few "well-chosen words" Hermione lit Snape’s robes on fire with <a href="/wiki/Bluebell_Flames" title="Bluebell Flames">Bluebell Flames</a>; a yell of shock told her she had done her job and she scooped the fire into a jar. Suddenly, up in the air, the spell on Harry’s broomstick was broken and he was once again able to control his broom. The spectators watched in confusion as Harry dove towards the ground, only to clasp his hand to his mouth as if he was being violently sick the instant he landed. In actuality Harry had caught the Snitch in his mouth. His capture of the Snitch ended the match, thus Gryffindor won.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190313165939" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="93" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B1C14M1 Trio in the Hogwarts Library.jpg" data-image-key="B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313165939" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190313165939" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313165939" decoding="async" width="250" height="93" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B1C14M1 Trio in the Hogwarts Library.jpg" data-image-key="B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313165939" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B1C14M1_Trio_in_the_Hogwarts_Library.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio searching for information on Flamel in the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Library" title="Hogwarts Library">Hogwarts Library</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After the match, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> took <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">the three</a> back to his <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid%27s_cabin" class="mw-redirect" title="Rubeus Hagrid&#39;s cabin">hut</a>. Ron and Hermione told Harry and Hagrid about what was happening on the other side of the stands, and how <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> was <a href="/wiki/Curse" title="Curse">cursing</a> his <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a>. Hagrid, however, did not believe them, asking why Snape would try to kill Harry; Harry told Hagrid about Snape being bitten by <a href="/wiki/Fluffy" title="Fluffy">the dog in the third-floor corridor</a>. Hagrid, surprised by their knowledge, involuntarily revealed that the dog belonged to him, and that what the dog was guarding did not concern them, as it was a secret known only to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> and a man named <a href="/wiki/Nicolas_Flamel" title="Nicolas Flamel">Nicolas Flamel</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Christmas_season">Christmas season</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=15" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Christmas season">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=15" title="Edit section: Christmas season"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live, remember that.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Albus Dumbledore warning Harry about the Mirror<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>Impressed as they were with the fact that Harry had managed to hold onto a <a href="/wiki/Hurling_Hex" title="Hurling Hex">bucking</a> broomstick, Malfoy soon found that the rest of the school no longer found his taunts that Harry was to be replaced amusing, and so reverted to teasing Harry about having to stay at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> for the holidays. Harry, however, was looking forward to spending Christmas away from the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>, especially in light of the fact that Ron was also staying at Hogwarts, but also because it would give them some time to look up <a href="/wiki/Nicolas_Flamel" title="Nicolas Flamel">Nicolas Flamel</a>; they were certain that <a href="/wiki/Irma_Pince" title="Irma Pince">the librarian</a> would be able to find a book on Flamel in an instant, but were worried that it might be suspicious, and were thus forced to search for themselves.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 243px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140406043752" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Invisibility Cloak GIF.gif" data-image-key="Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140406043752" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140406043752" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140406043752" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Invisibility Cloak GIF.gif" data-image-key="Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140406043752" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Invisibility_Cloak_GIF.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry receives his father's <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a> as a Christmas gift</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> day, Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> awoke to a pile of presents each at the foot of their beds. At the bottom of the pile, he found a package containing an Invisibility Cloak and an anonymous note telling him only that the cloak once belonged to <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">his father</a>, and to "use it well". That night Harry, thoughts on the Cloak and decided to try it out. Realising he could go anywhere, he snuck back to the library and headed straight for the <a href="/wiki/Restricted_Section" title="Restricted Section">Restricted Section</a>. Knowing he had to start somewhere, Harry pulled down one of the heavier books, and let it fall open on his knee. To his shock and horror, the silence was rent by a blood-curdling scream that issued from the book in front of him. He stuffed the book back in its place and ran for the door, knocking over the lantern he brought with him in his haste. Ducking under <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Filch</a>’s outstretched arms, Harry ran down the dark corridors, away from the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Library" title="Hogwarts Library">library</a>, and away from Filch.
</p><p>Thinking he had escaped, Harry was scared to hear Filch’s voice approaching, and horrified when he realised whom Filch was talking to: <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a>. As Snape and Filch rounded the corner, Harry realised that although his father’s cloak made him invisible, it did not stop him from being solid, and that he had no chance of sneaking past them, as the corridor was particularly narrow. Thinking quickly, (and panicking slightly), Harry noticed a door to his left; slipping inside, he found himself in an abandoned classroom. After Filch and Snape passed his hiding place, Harry relaxed and took in more details about the room he was in.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524212405" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="96" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="MirrorOfErised PM.jpg" data-image-key="MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524212405" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524212405" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524212405" decoding="async" width="250" height="96" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="MirrorOfErised PM.jpg" data-image-key="MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524212405" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:MirrorOfErised_PM.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry standing in front of the <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">Mirror of Erised</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In doing so, he noticed something he had missed the first time: an old, <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">gilded mirror</a> bearing the inscription “<i>Erised stra ehru oyt ube cafru oyt on wohsi</i>”. Stepping in front of the mirror, Harry very nearly cried out in shock: inside the mirror he saw a large crowd of people standing behind him. Shocked, Harry turned around to look at the room, but saw no one there. Turning back to the mirror and looking more closely, Harry realised that the man and woman in the front looked oddly like him. The man looked just like him, from his untidy hair to his glasses, and the <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">woman</a>, Harry saw, had the same eyes he had. Understanding, Harry focused on other members of the crowd, and saw others who had his untidy hair, his eyes, and even an old man who had Harry’s knees; Harry was looking at his family, for the first time in his life.
</p><p>The next night, Harry brought Ron with him to the mirror room. Ron did not see Harry’s family in the mirror, but instead saw himself standing alone, tall, holding the <a href="/wiki/House_Cup" title="House Cup">House Cup</a>, wearing badges indicating he was <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy_or_Girl" title="Head Boy or Girl">Head Boy</a> and <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Captain#Hogwarts_Quidditch_Captains" title="Quidditch Captain">Quidditch Captain</a>. The two began arguing over who would be allowed to look in the mirror; <a href="/wiki/Mrs_Norris" title="Mrs Norris">Mrs Norris</a>, Filch’s prowling cat, entered the room, attracted by the sounds of their argument. The next day, Ron, worried about being caught and about his friend’s obsession with the mirror, warned Harry not to return; Harry, however, was not to be dissuaded.  
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a1/Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524232937" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore talking to Harry about the Mirror of Erised.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a1/Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524232937" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a1/Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524232937" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a1/Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524232937" decoding="async" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore talking to Harry about the Mirror of Erised.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a1/Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524232937" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore_talking_to_Harry_about_the_Mirror_of_Erised.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore advising Harry from seeking out the mirror again</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Going to the <a href="/wiki/Disused_classroom" title="Disused classroom">room</a> that evening, Harry was ready to stay there all night, staring at the family he lost. However, in his haste, he failed to notice <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a> standing by the door until after he removed his cloak. Dumbledore, who had been waiting for Harry, explained that the mirror, which was known as the “Mirror of Erised”, displayed the deepest, most desperate desire of whomever looked into it. Harry, who had never known his family, saw them standing around him; Ron, ever overshadowed by his older brothers, saw himself standing alone, the best of them all.  
</p><p>Before sending Harry back to bed, however, Dumbledore warned him that the mirror was and a dangerous object; men had been driven mad by what they saw in the mirror, not knowing if what they saw was real, or even possible. He told Harry that the mirror was to be moved to a new location, and warned Harry to not go looking for it. Before he left, Harry asked the headmaster what he saw in the mirror. Much to his surprise, Dumbledore told Harry that he saw himself with a pair of woollen socks. Despite his promise to Dumbledore, Harry found it difficult to forget the image of his parents, until <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wood" title="Oliver Wood">Wood</a> told the team that Snape would be refereeing the next Quidditch match against <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuff</a>. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_%281991%29.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180606153004" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Neville got a Leg-Locker Curse (1991).JPG" data-image-key="Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_(1991).JPG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_%281991%29.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180606153004" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_%281991%29.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180606153004" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_%281991%29.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180606153004" decoding="async" width="249" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Neville got a Leg-Locker Curse (1991).JPG" data-image-key="Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_(1991).JPG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_%281991%29.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180606153004" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Neville_got_a_Leg-Locker_Curse_(1991).JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry cheers Neville up after the latter was bullied by Draco Malfoy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Shortly before the match, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a>, ever eager to pick on <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, used the <a href="/wiki/Leg-Locker_Curse" title="Leg-Locker Curse">Leg-Locker Curse</a> on Neville, forcing him to bunny hop his way back to the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Common Room</a>. Harry told Neville he was "worth twelve of Malfoy" and gave him a <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog" title="Chocolate Frog">Chocolate Frog</a>. Thanking Harry, Neville handed the card back to Harry for his collection. Looking down, Harry noted it was Dumbledore's card, the first he ever got. He turned the card over and suddenly remembered where he read the name Nicolas Flamel before: on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">train on the way to school</a>.
</p><p>As the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> vs. Hufflepuff Quidditch match drew nearer, tensions mounted in the school; Gryffindor had failed to overtake Slytherin in the <a href="/wiki/Inter-House_Quidditch_Cup" title="Inter-House Quidditch Cup">Inter-House Quidditch Cup</a> for seven years, and Harry was worried that it would be impossible with Snape as a referee. Unknown to Harry, Ron and Hermione had been practising the Leg-Locker Curse to use on Snape, should he show any signs of wanting to harm Harry. Before the match began, Wood took Harry aside and reminded him that he needed to catch the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Snitch</a> as soon as he could, before Snape could favour Hufflepuff too much. Harry performed his role as <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a> phenomenally, catching the Snitch within five minutes of the game starting, putting Gryffindor in first place for the <a href="/wiki/Inter-House_Quidditch_Cup" title="Inter-House Quidditch Cup">Quidditch Cup</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Detention">Detention</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=16" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Detention">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=16" title="Edit section: Detention"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Firenze</b>: "<i>It will keep you alive, even if you are an inch from death, but at a terrible price. You have slain something pure and defenceless to save yourself, and you will have but a half-life, a cursed life, from the moment the blood touches your lips.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>But — who would choose such a life?</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Firenze explaining the properties of unicorn blood<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/Egg_hatching_ps.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161201035806" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="131" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Egg hatching ps.gif" data-image-key="Egg_hatching_ps.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/Egg_hatching_ps.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161201035806" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/Egg_hatching_ps.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161201035806" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/Egg_hatching_ps.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161201035806" decoding="async" width="245" height="131" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Egg hatching ps.gif" data-image-key="Egg_hatching_ps.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4d/Egg_hatching_ps.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161201035806" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Egg_hatching_ps.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio watch a dragon egg hatch while in <a href="/wiki/Hagrid%27s_hut" class="mw-redirect" title="Hagrid&#39;s hut">Hagrid's hut</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Having realised how much Harry, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> had worked out about the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Stone</a> after running into them in the library, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> told them to meet him in his <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid%27s_cabin" class="mw-redirect" title="Rubeus Hagrid&#39;s cabin">hut</a> later. When the trio arrived later, they noticed that the fire was lit, despite the heat of the day. Although he was reluctant to answer their questions, Hermione managed to manipulate him into talking about the various protections used to guard it: <a href="/wiki/Fluffy" title="Fluffy">Fluffy</a>, the three headed dog, was Hagrid's, along with enchantments from Professors <a href="/wiki/Pomona_Sprout" title="Pomona Sprout">Sprout</a>, <a href="/wiki/Filius_Flitwick" title="Filius Flitwick">Flitwick</a>, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a>, <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirrell</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a>. Harry, growing uncomfortable in the heat, asked Hagrid to open a window, something Hagrid refused to do as he had a <a href="/wiki/Dragon_egg" title="Dragon egg">dragon egg</a> in the fire. Unfortunately <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> discovered the <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragon</a>, and decided to use the knowledge to get revenge by getting them into trouble for possessing an illegal dragon. So Malfoy in turn, tried to tell McGonagall of the trio's activities.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424033836" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="93" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B1C14M3 Astronomy Tower farewell Norbert.jpg" data-image-key="B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424033836" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424033836" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424033836" decoding="async" width="250" height="93" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B1C14M3 Astronomy Tower farewell Norbert.jpg" data-image-key="B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424033836" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B1C14M3_Astronomy_Tower_farewell_Norbert.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione wait on top of the Astronomy tower with baby Norbert</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>To save everyone involved, Harry, Ron, and Hermione convinced Hagrid to send <a href="/wiki/Norberta" title="Norberta">Norbert</a> off to Ron's brother <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie Weasley</a>, who would take Norbert to a <a href="/wiki/Romania" title="Romania">Romanian</a> dragon preserve. While helping Hagrid to prepare Norbert for the journey, the dragon bit Ron's hand, causing it to swell up and forcing Ron to see <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a>. On the pre-arranged night, Harry and Hermione managed to smuggle Norbert in a crate up to the <a href="/wiki/Astronomy_Tower" title="Astronomy Tower">Astronomy Tower</a> under Harry's <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility cloak</a>. On the way up they witnessed Professor McGonagall hauling Malfoy away for being out of bed at night, who protested that Harry was in possession of a dragon. Harry and Hermione passed the crate off to Charlie's friends and headed back down the stairs, where they were confronted by a gleeful <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Argus Filch</a>; they had left the Cloak behind.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170924160828" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="116" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="WB F1 Fang HarryMalfoyFangInForest 11428.jpg" data-image-key="WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170924160828" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170924160828" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170924160828" decoding="async" width="240" height="116" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="WB F1 Fang HarryMalfoyFangInForest 11428.jpg" data-image-key="WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170924160828" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:WB_F1_Fang_HarryMalfoyFangInForest_11428.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the Dark Forest with Draco Malfoy during their detention</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Filch took them to McGonagall's office, where they found <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, who had attempted to warn them about Malfoy. <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>, who was very disappointed in them, took fifty points each from Harry, Hermione, and Neville and gave the three detention, which they were to serve along with <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a>. Harry's popularity, riding high on his Quidditch wins plummeted: no one wanted to talk to the "stupid first year" who, along with two others, had lost Gryffindor their chance of defeating <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>, and winning the <a href="/wiki/House_Cup" title="House Cup">House Cup</a>. A week or so before exams, Harry's new determination to not meddle in other's business was tested when he heard <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Professor Quirrell</a>, whimpering as if he was being threatened. Believing that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> was the one threatening Quirrell, and that he was going after the Stone, Hermione suggested that they go talk to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a>, but Harry dismissed the idea, as they had no proof.
</p><p>The next morning, Harry, Hermione, and Neville received notes from Professor McGonagall informing them their detention would begin at eleven that night. <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Argus Filch</a> took them out to the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, where <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> was waiting for them. Hagrid led them into the Forbidden Forest and showed them a pool of <a href="/wiki/Unicorn" title="Unicorn">unicorn</a> blood on the ground. They split up, Hagrid taking Harry and Hermione, while Neville and <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a> went off with <a href="/wiki/Fang" title="Fang">Fang</a>. After Malfoy scared Neville into sending up red sparks, Hagrid sent Harry off with Malfoy, deciding that Malfoy would be less likely to scare Harry. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170721182311" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter and Firenze in the Forbidden Forest.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170721182311" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170721182311" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170721182311" decoding="async" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter and Firenze in the Forbidden Forest.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170721182311" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_and_Firenze_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with Firenze in the forest discussing the properties of unicorn blood</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As they continued, Harry noticed the pools of unicorn blood they were following seemed to be growing larger and larger, as if the animal had been thrashing around. Eventually, they came to a clearing and found the laying on the ground, and very dead. As they watched, a hooded figure emerged from the bushes and began to drink the unicorn's blood. Malfoy screamed and bolted away with <a href="/wiki/Fang" title="Fang">Fang</a>, leaving Harry, half blinded by the pain in his scar to stumble away from the advancing figure. Harry was saved by <a href="/wiki/Firenze" title="Firenze">Firenze</a>, a palamino <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">centaur</a>, who allowed Harry to ride on his back out of the forest. Firenze told Harry the properties of <a href="/wiki/Unicorn_blood" title="Unicorn blood">unicorn blood</a>. Harry realised that there would only be one person who would be so desperate as to kill a unicorn: <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>.
</p>
<h5><span id="The_Philosopher's_Stone"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Philosopher.27s_Stone">The Philosopher's Stone</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=17" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Philosopher&#039;s Stone">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=17" title="Edit section: The Philosopher&#039;s Stone"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>"Professor, I think — I know — that someone's going to try and steal the Stone. I've got to talk to Professor Dumbledore.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>McGonagall</b>: "<i><a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a> will be back tomorrow. I don't know how you found out about the Stone, but rest assured, no one can possibly steal it, it's too well protected.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The trio warn McGonagall of the plot to steal the stone<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>While talking to Ron and Hermione after finishing their exams Harry realised the strange coincidence that had occurred: <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> wanted a <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragon</a> more than anything else, only to meet a stranger who had one to give him. They ran down to ask Hagrid more about the man who gave him Norbert, only to find out that the stranger never lowered his hood, something of a fashion in the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head_Inn" title="Hog&#39;s Head Inn">Hogs head</a>. Hagrid explained that he couldn't remember much, as the man kept buying him drinks, but said that he thought they talked about <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> and the kinds of creatures Hagrid looks after there.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Transfiguration_homework.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524232616" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Transfiguration homework.jpg" data-image-key="Transfiguration_homework.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Transfiguration_homework.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524232616" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Transfiguration_homework.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170524232616" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Transfiguration_homework.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524232616" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Transfiguration homework.jpg" data-image-key="Transfiguration_homework.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Transfiguration_homework.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170524232616" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Transfiguration_homework.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio attempting to tell McGonagall about the plot to steal the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Focused on remembering what had happened that night, Hagrid accidentally let slip that <a href="/wiki/Fluffy" title="Fluffy">Fluffy</a> fell asleep when played music. Harry, Ron, and Hermione, now convinced that Snape had all the information he needed to get past Fluffy, decided to go see Professor Dumbledore and tell him their suspicions. While walking across the <a href="/wiki/Entrance_Hall" title="Entrance Hall">Entrance Hall</a>, they were stopped by Professor McGonagall, and decided to tell her what they'd found out. She insisted that no one could steal the Stone, and told them that Dumbledore was in London for the day.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Attack_in_the_Underground_Chambers" class="mw-redirect" title="Attack in the Underground Chambers">Attack in the Underground Chambers</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<p>As the trio set off that night to stop Snape, they were stopped themselves by <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, who believed they were sneaking out without reason again, and was worried that they would loose <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> even more points. Desperate as they were for time, Hermione <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">paralysed</a> Neville. When they arrived the third-floor corridor, it was to find <a href="/wiki/Fluffy" title="Fluffy">Fluffy</a> awake, but a harp by his feet. Remembering what Hagrid told them, Harry began to blow into the wooden flute Hagrid gave him for <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a>. From the first notes, Fluffy's eyes began to droop, and he quickly fell asleep. Jumping through the trapdoor, they found themselves in Professor Sprout's room, filled with <a href="/wiki/Devil%27s_Snare" title="Devil&#39;s Snare">Devil's Snare</a>, which almost smothered them.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png/revision/latest?cb=20160808234736" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-Potter and the winged-keys PS.png" data-image-key="Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20160808234736" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png/revision/latest?cb=20160808234736" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20160808234736" decoding="async" width="251" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-Potter and the winged-keys PS.png" data-image-key="Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20160808234736" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-Potter_and_the_winged-keys_PS.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry retrieves the right key from the swarm</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The next room, Professor Flitwick's, held a bunch of <a href="/wiki/Winged_Keys" title="Winged Keys">flying keys</a> and some <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomsticks</a>. Harry found the correct key, caught it, and unlocked the next door with it.
