The next room was Professor McGonagall's, and had a large chessboard, for a game of <a href="/wiki/Wizard%27s_Chess" title="Wizard&#39;s Chess">Wizard's Chess</a> which Ron won at the cost of sacrificing himself. Harry and Hermione continued to the next room (leaving an unconscious Ron where they could return for him), to find an unconscious <a href="/wiki/Troll" title="Troll">troll</a>; Professor Quirrell's room. Lastly, they entered Professor Snape's room, and found seven potions in bottles along with a roll of paper giving clues on which one to drink to continue: a logic puzzle. Hermione solved the puzzle, and at Harry's urging, drank the potion that allowed her to head back so that she could get Ron out, while Harry drank the potion to go forward to the final room.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 208px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160722182419" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="206" height="136" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="QuirinusQuirrell WB F1 QuirrellAndHarry Still 080615 Land.jpg" data-image-key="QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/206?cb=20160722182419" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160722182419" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/206?cb=20160722182419" decoding="async" width="206" height="136" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="QuirinusQuirrell WB F1 QuirrellAndHarry Still 080615 Land.jpg" data-image-key="QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/206?cb=20160722182419" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:QuirinusQuirrell_WB_F1_QuirrellAndHarry_Still_080615_Land.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Quirrell in the Dungeon</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once inside the room, Harry's attention was drawn to two things: the <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">Mirror of Erised</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirrell</a>. Quirrell bound Harry before explaining that the Mirror was the key to finding the Stone. Desperate to distract him from the Mirror, Harry questioned Quirrell, who revealed that was serving <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, and although Snape hated Harry (because Snape allegedly loathed his father in their time at school), he never wanted him dead. Unable to locate the stone, Quirrell asked Voldemort for help; much to Harry's surprise, a voice which seemed to issue from Quirrell himself said "to use the boy".
</p><p>Looking in the Mirror, Harry saw his reflection pull the Stone out of his pocket and replace it, at which point he felt the real Stone drop his real pocket. He told Quirrell that he saw himself winning the House Cup, but Voldemort, an accomplished <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimens</a>, informed Quirrell that Harry was lying, and ordered Quirrell to allow him to speak "to the boy". Quirrell unwrapped his turban, and turned away from Harry. Voldemort, who was sticking out of the back of Quirrell's head, demanded that Harry give him the Stone. Harry refused, and Quirrell seized him, causing Harry's scar to sear with pain; but contact with Harry's skin burned Quirrell's hands, forcing him to release Harry. Harry, realising that contact caused Quirrell pain, grabbed Quirrell's arm and held on until he blacked out.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/B1C17M2_Harry%27s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210031238" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="94" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B1C17M2 Harry&#39;s first Hospital Wing stay.png" data-image-key="B1C17M2_Harry&#39;s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/B1C17M2_Harry%27s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210031238" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/B1C17M2_Harry%27s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210031238" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/B1C17M2_Harry%27s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210031238" decoding="async" width="251" height="94" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B1C17M2 Harry&#39;s first Hospital Wing stay.png" data-image-key="B1C17M2_Harry&#39;s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/B1C17M2_Harry%27s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210031238" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B1C17M2_Harry%27s_first_Hospital_Wing_stay.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> after the attack in the underground chamber</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>He woke in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a>, where Albus Dumbledore reassured him that Quirrell did not succeed at getting the Stone, and that the Stone had in fact, been destroyed. Dumbledore then explained the reason why Quirrell could not touch him was that because Harry's mother had died to save him, granting him <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">protection against Voldemort</a>.
</p><p>At the <a href="/wiki/End-of-Term_Feast" title="End-of-Term Feast">End-of-Term Feast</a>, after seemingly congratulating Slytherin on winning the <a href="/wiki/House_Cup" title="House Cup">House Cup</a>, Dumbledore awarded Ron and Hermione fifty points, Harry sixty points, and Neville ten, which allowed them to win the cup.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Second_year">Second year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=18" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Second year">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=18" title="Edit section: Second year"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>You’re a Parselmouth. Why didn’t you tell us?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I’m a what?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>A Parselmouth! You can talk to snakes!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I know., I mean, that’s only the second time I’ve ever done it. I accidentally set a boa constrictor on my cousin Dudley at the zoo once — long story — but it was telling me it had never seen Brazil and I sort of set it free without meaning to that was before I knew I was a wizard —</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>A boa constrictor told you it had never seen Brazil?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>So? I bet loads of people here can do it.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Oh, no they can’t. It’s not a very common gift. Harry, this is bad.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry and Ron discussing Parseltongue<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p><br />
Harry's second year in <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a> started out badly and gradually got worse. Throughout the preceding summer, the Dursleys became so fearful of his newly discovered magical abilities that they locked away all of his school supplies immediately after his return home to them. They even went as far as to ban him from saying words pertaining or related to magic in general, as evident to Harry getting reprimanded by <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Uncle Vernon</a> for saying the word "magic" at the breakfast table one day. This, however, did not stop Harry from exploiting their paranoia in order to have quiet time alone, such as taunting <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> with made-up magical <a href="/wiki/Incantation" title="Incantation">incantations</a> (like <a href="/wiki/Jiggery_Pokery" title="Jiggery Pokery">Jiggery Pokery</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hocus_Pocus" title="Hocus Pocus">Hocus Pocus</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Squiggly_wiggly" title="Squiggly wiggly">Squiggly wiggly</a>) whenever the latter teased him. Furthermore, he had no contact with any of his friends nor any news from the wizarding world, and <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a> took to making noise out of boredom from being padlocked in her cage.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/37/B2C1M2_Dursley%27s_garden.png/revision/latest?cb=20161213053941" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C1M2 Dursley&#39;s garden.png" data-image-key="B2C1M2_Dursley&#39;s_garden.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/37/B2C1M2_Dursley%27s_garden.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161213053941" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/37/B2C1M2_Dursley%27s_garden.png/revision/latest?cb=20161213053941" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/37/B2C1M2_Dursley%27s_garden.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161213053941" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C1M2 Dursley&#39;s garden.png" data-image-key="B2C1M2_Dursley&#39;s_garden.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/37/B2C1M2_Dursley%27s_garden.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161213053941" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C1M2_Dursley%27s_garden.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the garden at 4 Privet Drive</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a> (Harry's <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_twelfth_birthday" title="Harry Potter&#39;s twelfth birthday">twelfth birthday</a>), Harry felt very lonely from receiving no letters from his friends. Dudley taunted him stating "<i>Who would want to be friends with you?</i>" The Dursleys seemed to have forgotten his birthday too, for they were too busy preparing for a dinner party with <a href="/wiki/Mason" title="Mason">a client</a> of Vernon's at work. The sight of the hedge supposedly staring back startled Harry, but <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley Dursley</a> came over to bother him as the eyes vanished. Harry tried to scare his cousin away by pretending the use of incantations would set the hedge on fire. Petunia then threatened him with a soapy pan and tasked him with a list of chores to keep him out of her way until Vernon and Dudley returned home from buying dinner jackets.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/92/Dobby_1992.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20170527021817" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dobby 1992.jpeg" data-image-key="Dobby_1992.jpeg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/92/Dobby_1992.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170527021817" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/92/Dobby_1992.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20170527021817" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/92/Dobby_1992.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170527021817" decoding="async" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dobby 1992.jpeg" data-image-key="Dobby_1992.jpeg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/92/Dobby_1992.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170527021817" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dobby_1992.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dobby introduces himself to Harry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When he was sent up to his bedroom later that evening for the dinner party, a <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> named <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> waiting on his bed to warn him against returning to Hogwarts. As it meant putting himself in great danger. He tried to tell Dobby that Hogwarts was his home and where he belonged. The elf then revealed that he prevented the direct deliverance of the mail from Harry's friends and promised to give the letters back when Harry complied with the warning.
</p><p>This bargain failed as well, so Dobby crashed the dinner party downstairs via a <a href="/wiki/Hover_Charm" title="Hover Charm">Hover Charm</a> on Petunia's homemade masterpiece of <a href="/wiki/Pudding" title="Pudding">pudding</a>, which splattered everywhere when the spell was lifted, and disappeared. The mess left behind was thus blamed on Harry, who received an official warning from the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> about using magic outside school. The Dursleys taking advantage of this incident and using it as a means to suppress the magical blood in their nephew, locked him in his room with bars on his window to prevent him from returning to Hogwarts as punishment.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2d/Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160816210806" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry escaping privet drive.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2d/Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20160816210806" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2d/Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160816210806" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2d/Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20160816210806" decoding="async" width="249" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry escaping privet drive.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2d/Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20160816210806" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_escaping_privet_drive.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Fred, George, and Ron rescue Harry from the Dursleys with the use of a <a href="/wiki/Flying_Ford_Anglia" title="Flying Ford Anglia">Flying Ford Anglia</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure> 
<p>Three nights later, Harry was rescued from his imprisonment by Ron, who was worried about not hearing from him all summer and flew with his older brothers <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a> in a flying Ford Anglia belonging to their father <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a>, the Head of the Ministry's <a href="/wiki/Misuse_of_Muggle_Artefacts_Office" title="Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office">Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office</a>, to break off the bars on Harry's window and help him retrieve his school things. Hedwig's screeches soon alerted the Dursleys of the getaway, but they were unable to do anything as the car flew off with Harry in tow. During the flight to the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>'s home <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">the Burrow</a>, Harry told Ron and the twins about Dobby's warning, which Fred and George concluded must have been part of a joke from <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, whose <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_family" title="Malfoy family">family</a> was of great wealth.
</p><p>They arrived at their destination early the next morning to find a worried-sick <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> waiting in the kitchen to punish her three sons for taking the vehicle without permission by having them and Harry (who volunteered) <a href="/wiki/Gnome" title="Gnome">de-gnome</a> the garden. Mr Weasley came home to discuss the results of his proposed <a href="/wiki/Muggle_Protection_Act" title="Muggle Protection Act">Muggle Protection Act</a> to the Ministry with his family, and was glad to meet Harry once introduced to him despite his wife berating him for bewitching their car. As a generous measure, the Weasleys welcomed the young wizard into the family fold for the rest of the summer, though this made Ron's younger sister <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> spend the entire day hiding in Harry's presence.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Welcoming_at_Flourish_and_Blotts">Welcoming at Flourish and Blotts</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=19" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Welcoming at Flourish and Blotts">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=19" title="Edit section: Welcoming at Flourish and Blotts"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Where did you come out?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Knockturn Alley.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Weasley twins</b>: "<i>Excellent!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry's Floo mishap lands him in Borgin and Burkes<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/Harry-potter2-borgin_%26_burkes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527023259" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-borgin &amp; burkes.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-borgin_&amp;_burkes.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/Harry-potter2-borgin_%26_burkes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170527023259" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/Harry-potter2-borgin_%26_burkes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527023259" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/Harry-potter2-borgin_%26_burkes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170527023259" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-borgin &amp; burkes.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-borgin_&amp;_burkes.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/Harry-potter2-borgin_%26_burkes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170527023259" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-borgin_%26_burkes.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in <a href="/wiki/Knockturn_Alley" title="Knockturn Alley">Knockturn Alley</a> inside Borgin and Burkes</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When a <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_acceptance_letter" title="Hogwarts acceptance letter">Hogwarts acceptance letter</a> for Ginny arrived a week later, the Weasleys set out for <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a> using the <a href="/wiki/Floo_Network" title="Floo Network">Floo Network</a> eight days afterwards to buy some school supplies. Harry ended up at <a href="/wiki/Borgin_and_Burkes" title="Borgin and Burkes">Borgin and Burkes</a> in the adjacent Knockturn Alley. While inside the shop he was forced to hide in a <a href="/wiki/Crushing_Cabinet" title="Crushing Cabinet">Crushing Cabinet</a>, as Draco Malfoy and his father <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> entered. Draco made many sulky remarks regarding Harry's talent in <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a>.
</p><p>The shopkeeper, <a href="/wiki/Borgin" title="Borgin">Mr Borgin</a> was surprised that Mr Malfoy was only selling dark and illegally enchanted artefacts and not buying. Mr Malfoy was sealing the items before they could be confiscated by the raids on wizarding households Mr Weasley was conducting as part of the Muggle Protection Act, Borgin expressed pity to the current decline of <a href="/wiki/Blood_status" title="Blood status">blood purity</a>. Draco, on the other hand, interest in a few of the items already on sale, including the <a href="/wiki/Hand_of_Glory" title="Hand of Glory">Hand of Glory</a> and a <a href="/wiki/Opal_Necklace" title="Opal Necklace">cursed opal necklace</a>, and was stopped from approaching Harry's hiding place by his father.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160804194015" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harr Potter takes image with Lockhart.jpg" data-image-key="Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160804194015" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160804194015" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160804194015" decoding="async" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harr Potter takes image with Lockhart.jpg" data-image-key="Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160804194015" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harr_Potter_takes_image_with_Lockhart.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Gilderoy Lockhart embarrasses Harry while in <a href="/wiki/Flourish_and_Blotts" title="Flourish and Blotts">Flourish and Blotts</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Soon as the <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_family" title="Malfoy family">Malfoys</a> left, Harry was found leaving the shop himself by <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>, who brought him out of Knockturn and into Diagon Ally's Flourish and Blotts, where the Weasleys were in line with Hermione and her parents for a book signing for the arrival of flamboyant but incompetent celebrity author <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a>, who was recently appointed Hogwarts' new <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">professor</a>. When Lockhart saw Harry for the first time, he got excited and beckoned him up to the front, allowing the audience to take pictures of them together before giving Harry a <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart%27s_published_works" title="Gilderoy Lockhart&#39;s published works">set of his books</a>.
</p><p>Harry was too embarrassed by this publicity stunt, and gave the books to Ginny since he could afford a set of his own. Draco went over to congratulate him for being unable to avoid making the front page when walking into a bookstore, but then his father moved him aside to have a one-on-one argument with Mr Weasley over the latter's obsession with Muggles (finding an example of which in Hermione's parents, both Muggle dentists), provoking Weasley into lunging at him. Hagrid broke up the fight just in time, but not before the senior Malfoy slipped a <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">diary</a> into Ginny's <a href="/wiki/Cauldron" title="Cauldron">cauldron</a> of school books.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Car_flight_alongside_the_Hogwarts_Express">Car flight alongside the Hogwarts Express</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=20" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Car flight alongside the Hogwarts Express">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=20" title="Edit section: Car flight alongside the Hogwarts Express"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Brilliant! Inspired! What an entrance! Flying a car right into the Whomping Willow, people'll be talking about that one for years —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;The impressed inhabitants of <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Gryffindor Tower</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 238px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622045312" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="236" height="125" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Blocked Barrier GIF.gif" data-image-key="Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/236?cb=20140622045312" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622045312" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/236?cb=20140622045312" decoding="async" width="236" height="125" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Blocked Barrier GIF.gif" data-image-key="Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/236?cb=20140622045312" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Blocked_Barrier_GIF.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron Weasley crossing the magical barrier to Platform 9¾ only to find it blocked</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Harry and Ron tried to get onto <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform 9¾</a> to join Hermione and the rest of the Weasleys, the barrier mysteriously sealed and they hit the wall. They missed the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a> as a result, and decided to fly the car to Hogwarts, reasoning that they would not be seen due to the <a href="/wiki/Invisibility_Booster" title="Invisibility Booster">Invisibility Booster</a> that Mr Weasley installed. However, the booster failed shortly after takeoff, and the car was spotted by several Muggles as they flew northward alongside the train.
</p><p>Their day-long flight ended with them crashing into the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>, instead of with the graceful landing they imagined. <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley%27s_first_wand" class="mw-redirect" title="Ronald Weasley&#39;s first wand">Ron's wand</a> was inadvertently broken by the resulting impact as the gigantic tree started pounding the car in anger of being hit, but luckily for them, the battered Angila broke free from the branches to eject Harry and Ron out of the front seat with their belongings before driving off into the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>. Both boys were found by <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a> watching the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_ceremony" title="Sorting ceremony">Sorting ceremony</a> from the window. They were taken to <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape%27s_office" title="Severus Snape&#39;s office">his office</a>, where they were given separate <a href="/wiki/Discipline_at_Hogwarts#Detention" title="Discipline at Hogwarts">detentions</a> by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> and professor <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>. Ginny Weasley, meanwhile, was sorted into Gryffindor.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart%27s_fan_mail.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424045954" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="90" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C7M2 Harry replying to Lockhart&#39;s fan mail.png" data-image-key="B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart&#39;s_fan_mail.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart%27s_fan_mail.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424045954" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart%27s_fan_mail.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424045954" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart%27s_fan_mail.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424045954" decoding="async" width="250" height="90" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C7M2 Harry replying to Lockhart&#39;s fan mail.png" data-image-key="B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart&#39;s_fan_mail.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart%27s_fan_mail.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424045954" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C7M2_Harry_replying_to_Lockhart%27s_fan_mail.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry helping Lockhart answer fan-mail as detention, before he hears the voice inside the walls</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The next day at breakfast, Ron received a <a href="/wiki/Howler" title="Howler">Howler</a> from his mother, who told him that he would be brought home if he broke another rule. The day only got worse when the Gryffindors attended their first Defence Against the Dark Arts class. Lockhart's teaching was a disaster, since the first thing he did was give them a pop quiz on himself and claimed the answers could be found in his books. He then let a cage of "freshly caught" Cornish <a href="/wiki/Pixie" title="Pixie">Pixies</a> loose and struggled to round them up, but ran to hide from them leaving his young pupils to save the day.
</p><p>As the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">DADA</a> lessons continued, Harry found himself having to act out scenes from Lockhart's books as he read them in class. Lockhart was in love with fame and kept bothering Harry, who had to help him answer his fan-mail while Ron had to polish the school's prizes and trophies. But he was not the only one who paid him extra attention: Many <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first-year</a> <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindors</a> like <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a> were star-struck by Harry, and Ginny had a huge crush on him that developed over the summer since she first saw the famous Potter on Platform 9¾ at the start and end of his first year. After hours of tedious work, Harry heard a disembodied, sinister voice, which Lockhart was unable to hear.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Death-day_Party">Death-day Party</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=21" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Death-day Party">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=21" title="Edit section: Death-day Party"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>The Chamber of Secrets has been opened. Enemies of the Heir Beware.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;A grim message from the Heir of Slytherin<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a8/Writting_on_the_wall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170924194724" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="116" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Writting on the wall.jpg" data-image-key="Writting_on_the_wall.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a8/Writting_on_the_wall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170924194724" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a8/Writting_on_the_wall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170924194724" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a8/Writting_on_the_wall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170924194724" decoding="async" width="240" height="116" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Writting on the wall.jpg" data-image-key="Writting_on_the_wall.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a8/Writting_on_the_wall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170924194724" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Writting_on_the_wall.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The writing on the wall and the petrified form of <a href="/wiki/Mrs_Norris" title="Mrs Norris">Mrs Norris</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In return for distracting <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Argus Filch</a> just when he was about to give Harry severe punishment for something he did not do, Harry promised he would attend <a href="/wiki/Nicholas_de_Mimsy-Porpington" title="Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington">Nearly Headless Nick</a>'s Death-day Party on <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en" title="Hallowe&#39;en">Hallowe'en</a>. He did this as a favour in order to help boost Nick's reputation, so that he might achieve his desire of joining the Headless Hunt. He brought Ron and Hermione along, as well. Hermione was excited at the prospect of attending the event, as most living beings have not been to a <a href="/wiki/Nicholas_de_Mimsy-Porpington%27s_five-hundredth_Deathday_Party" title="Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington&#39;s five-hundredth Deathday Party">Death-day Party</a>. Ron on the other hand was not excited at attending the event.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png/revision/latest?cb=20170924161237" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Deathday Party Pottermore.png" data-image-key="Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170924161237" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png/revision/latest?cb=20170924161237" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170924161237" decoding="async" width="245" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Deathday Party Pottermore.png" data-image-key="Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170924161237" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathday_Party_Pottermore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio attended Sir Nicolas's Death-day Party</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The event was dismal and dreary. The party entailed a candlelit dinner of rancid, mouldy food, the smell of which caused all three to gag. Harry knew the reason for this was the claim that a ghost can "almost taste" seriously spoiled food. Sir Nicolas was deeply touched that the three students put in an appearance, in part because it gave him a certain status in the eyes of his fellow deceased. But the three of them quickly grew tired of the ghostly party and returned to the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>. Before they got to the <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en_feast" class="mw-redirect" title="Hallowe&#39;en feast">Hallowe'en feast</a>, Harry heard the voice (which Ron and Hermione also could not hear). He followed it to the second floor where he found the bathroom flooded and Mrs Norris, Filch's cat, <a href="/wiki/Petrification" title="Petrification">petrified</a> — coupled with a message on the wall.
</p><p>Filch became distraught and threatened Harry, as he mistakenly believed Harry to be the culprit. <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Filch</a> and <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> then tried to get Harry in trouble for this, but Dumbledore said that it was powerful <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">dark magic</a> that no second year student could perform. They decided that <a href="/wiki/Pomona_Sprout" title="Pomona Sprout">Sprout</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Mandrake" title="Mandrake">mandrakes</a> would be used, once they were mature enough, to create a draught capable of reviving Mrs Norris. This occurrence left the students and staff with a sense of dread and worry, as many believed that the writing on the wall was just the beginning
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="History_of_Magic">History of Magic</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=22" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: History of Magic">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=22" title="Edit section: History of Magic"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>I was wondering if you could tell us anything about the Chamber of Secrets?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Cuthbert Binns</b>: "<i>The story goes that Slytherin had built a hidden chamber in the castle, of which the other founders knew nothing. Slytherin, according to the legend, sealed the Chamber of Secrets so that none would be able to open it until his own true heir arrived at the school. The heir alone would be able to unseal the Chamber of Secrets, unleash the horror within, and use it to purge the school of all who were unworthy to study magic.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The legend of the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210024606" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C9M1 Cuthbert Binns on the Chamber of Secrets.png" data-image-key="B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210024606" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210024606" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210024606" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C9M1 Cuthbert Binns on the Chamber of Secrets.png" data-image-key="B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210024606" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C9M1_Cuthbert_Binns_on_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Cuthbert_Binns" title="Cuthbert Binns">Professor Binns</a> tells his students the legend of the Chamber of Secrets</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione wanted to research the Chamber of Secrets, so she talked <a href="/wiki/History_of_Magic" title="History of Magic">History of Magic</a> Professor Cuthbert Binns into telling the class about its origin. To begin the story, Binns explained that it all started with the founding of Hogwarts itself around <a href="/wiki/First_millennium_A.D." title="First millennium A.D.">990 A.D.</a>, at the hands of two of the greatest wizards and two of the greatest witches of the age: <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor" title="Godric Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor</a>, <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff" title="Helga Hufflepuff">Helga Hufflepuff</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw" title="Rowena Ravenclaw">Rowena Ravenclaw</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>. But Slytherin got into an argument with the other founders about whether Muggle-borns should be admitted and, when the rift grew too large between him and Gryffindor, he left the school. According to legend, he built a going-away present to the school in the form of a secret chamber that could only be opened by his true heir. This "Chamber of Secrets" allegedly contained a <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">monster</a> that, once released, would purge the school of all <a href="/wiki/Muggle-borns" class="mw-redirect" title="Muggle-borns">Muggle-borns</a>. Professor Binns unsuccessfully tried to assure the class that the Chamber did not actually exist and that the school had been searched many times in vain.
</p><p>Harry, Ron and Hermione decided that the heir was probably <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. To try to prove it, Hermione proposed to use the <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a>, which can change one's appearance into somebody else's for an hour. Hermione warned that the potion would take a month to brew, supposing they gathered all the necessary ingredients (one of which could only be found in <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a>'s private inventory) and managed to keep it a secret.
</p>
<ol><li>Quidditch</li></ol>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>So there is a Chamber of Secrets? And did you say it's been opened before? Tell me, Dobby!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Dobby</b>: "<i>Ah, sir, ask no more, ask no more of poor Dobby. Dark deeds are planned in this place, but Harry Potter must not be here when they happen — go home, Harry Potter, go home. Harry Potter must not meddle in this, sir, 'tis too dangerous —</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; A midnight visitor and a serious conversation about the Chamber of Secrets<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/QuiddithAnimation.gif/revision/latest?cb=20110320204014" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="QuiddithAnimation.gif" data-image-key="QuiddithAnimation.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/QuiddithAnimation.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110320204014" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/QuiddithAnimation.gif/revision/latest?cb=20110320204014" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/QuiddithAnimation.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110320204014" decoding="async" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="QuiddithAnimation.gif" data-image-key="QuiddithAnimation.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/QuiddithAnimation.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110320204014" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:QuiddithAnimation.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry playing against Draco Malfoy in the opening match of the season</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the month that it took the <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> to brew, a <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match between <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> and <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> took place. <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> had been made Slytherin's new <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a>, on the merit of his father's generous contribution to the team: a set of <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2001" title="Nimbus 2001">Nimbus 2001</a> brooms. During the match one of the Bludgers took after Harry and focused completely on him. Malfoy lost no time in making fun of the manoeuvres Harry had to perform in order to avoid the Bludger. Since <a href="/wiki/Bludger" title="Bludger">Bludgers</a> were supposed to attack each and every player, the crowd soon realised that this Bludger had been tampered with. Harry still managed to catch the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Snitch</a> and <span style="font-weight:normal;">Gryffindor won</span>. He caught it right out from under Malfoy's nose, who was more focused on taunting Harry then looking for the Snitch. However, the Bludger broke his arm and Lockhart in his attempt to fix it removed all of the bones instead. <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a> gave Harry a potion called <a href="/wiki/Skele-Gro" title="Skele-Gro">Skele-Gro</a>, to counter this and he was forced to stay in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> overnight.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 246px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170522171310" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="244" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20170522171310" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170522171310" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20170522171310" decoding="async" width="244" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/244?cb=20170522171310" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-and-dobby-gallery.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> and Harry in the hospital wing, after Harry injured his right arm during a Quidditch match</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During that night, Dobby visited Harry and revealed that it was he who made the Bludger chase after Harry and was also responsible for the barrier of <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">platform 9¾</a> not letting him in. Dobby did this in hopes of Harry leaving or never arriving at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. This was a misguided attempt to protect Harry from the monter inside the chamber. Dobby proceeded to ask Harry to leave the school, something he refused to do. He also revealed that the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> had been opened before and immediately punished himself, as he was not supposed to reveal anything. After Dobby disappeared, Dumbledore, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a>, and Madam Pomfrey entered with <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a>, who had apparently been petrified. He was found with a camera containing film that had been burnt to the melting point.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Duelling_Club">Duelling Club</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=23" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Duelling Club">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=23" title="Edit section: Duelling Club"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Draco Malfoy</b>: "<i>Scared Potter?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>You wish!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry prepares to enter a practice duel with Malfoy<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Duel_harry_draco.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141105012958" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Duel harry draco.gif" data-image-key="Duel_harry_draco.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Duel_harry_draco.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141105012958" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Duel_harry_draco.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141105012958" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Duel_harry_draco.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141105012958" decoding="async" width="240" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Duel harry draco.gif" data-image-key="Duel_harry_draco.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Duel_harry_draco.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141105012958" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Duel_harry_draco.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Meeting of the Duelling club, where Harry and Draco participate in a practice duel</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry signed up for a <a href="/wiki/Duelling_Club" title="Duelling Club">Duelling Club</a>, which was (to Harry's great displeasure) taught by his two least favourite teachers: <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Lockhart</a> and <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a>. The event was scheduled to take place in the Great Hall. During the club's first meeting Lockhart demonstrated an ineptitude. He was successfully disarmed by Snape and floundered throughout the entire practice duel. Also during a practice battle in the first meeting, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> conjured a snake to attack Harry. Malfoy conjured this snake via instructions from Snape. Lockhart tried to banish it, but all he managed was to set it loose on the students.
</p><p>Harry saw that the snake was rapidly advancing on a Muggle-born student and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuff</a> named <a href="/wiki/Justin_Finch-Fletchley" title="Justin Finch-Fletchley">Justin Finch-Fletchley</a> (who had introduced himself to Harry before this incident) and instinctively told it to stop, which — to Harry's great surprise — it did. The others students were less than ecstatic about this development, however. All they saw was Harry speaking <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>, the language of snakes and became afraid. Since they could not understand it, it seemed to them that he was egging the snake on. It turned out that Parseltongue was a very rare gift that was closely associated with <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>. This was something Slytherin was famous for, hence why the symbol of Slytherin house is a serpent. Due to this, Harry became the number one suspect among students for being the heir of Slytherin. Hermione even told him that since Salazar Slytherin lived so long ago, he might actually be.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 243px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180707195259" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="241" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg" data-image-key="Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20180707195259" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180707195259" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20180707195259" decoding="async" width="241" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg" data-image-key="Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20180707195259" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Chamber-of-secrets-fawkes.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry meets <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a> for the first time after finding a petrified Justin</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Seconds after leaving a conversation with <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, Harry ran into a petrified Justin Finch-Fletchley and a black, smoking <a href="/wiki/Nicholas_de_Mimsy-Porpington" title="Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington">Nearly-Headless Nick</a>. <a href="/wiki/Peeves" title="Peeves">Peeves</a> alerted the whole school, and a Hufflepuff called <a href="/wiki/Ernest_Macmillan" title="Ernest Macmillan">Ernie Macmillan</a> claimed that Harry had been caught red-handed. For the first time, Harry was taken to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>'s office, and there he witnessed Fawkes — Dumbledore's <a href="/wiki/Phoenix" title="Phoenix">phoenix</a> — bursting into ashes and being reborn. Dumbledore says that he did not believe Harry to be behind the attacks, a belief reinforced by Hagrid backing Harry's alibi, but a large portion of the school was sure that Harry was <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Slytherin</a>'s heir.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Disguised_as_Slytherins">Disguised as Slytherins</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=24" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Disguised as Slytherins">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=24" title="Edit section: Disguised as Slytherins"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>There might be a way. Of course, it would be difficult. And dangerous, very dangerous. We’d be breaking about fifty school rules, I expect… What we’d need to do is to get inside the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin_Dungeon" title="Slytherin Dungeon">Slytherin common room</a> and ask Malfoy a few questions without him realising it’s us.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>But that’s impossible.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>No, it’s not. All we’d need would be some Polyjuice Potion...</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Trio planning to expose the Heir of Slytherin<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180628160157" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HarryRonHermione PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg" data-image-key="HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180628160157" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180628160157" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180628160157" decoding="async" width="240" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HarryRonHermione PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg" data-image-key="HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180628160157" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HarryRonHermione_PolyjuicePotionMyrtlesBathroom.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Trio brewing <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> in an attempt to gain information from Draco Malfoy, disguised as Slytherins</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry, Ron, and Hermione all signed up to remain at the school during <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a>, since <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Crabbe</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Goyle</a> had done so as well. This gave them the perfect opportunity to use their Polyjuice potion. When Christmas arrived they drugged Crabbe and Goyle via <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_cake" title="Chocolate cake">chocolate cakes</a>, took their hairs and assumed their forms. Hermione tried to use a hair she thought belonged to <a href="/wiki/Millicent_Bulstrode" title="Millicent Bulstrode">Millicent Bulstrode</a>, but it was actually her cat's and Hermione was transformed into a hybrid. Hermione was forced to spend a few weeks in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a>. As Crabbe and Goyle, Harry and Ron interrogated an unsuspecting <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a> and discovered that Draco was not the Heir of <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>. They also heard that the last time the chamber was opened, a <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a> girl died and whoever was responsible was expelled. Malfoy also mentioned his father's secret stash of illegal artefacts.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170925195204" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925195204" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170925195204" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925195204" decoding="async" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170925195204" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-Potter-and-the-Chamber-of-Secrets-2002-books-male-characters-29996396-500-375.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio discuss possible theories behind Tom Riddle's mysterious <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">diary</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Weeks later, Ron and Harry overheard <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Argus Filch</a> complaining about his workload and leaving. They arrive at <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a>'s bathroom to find it flooded. Myrtle, a sulking <a href="/wiki/Ghost" title="Ghost">ghost</a>, explained that she had flooded it because somebody threw a diary at her. Harry picked it up; it turned out to have belonged to a T.M. Riddle and appeared to be completely blank. Ron remembered from his detention that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Riddle</a> had won an award for special service to the school fifty years before. Hermione deduced that since this coincided with the last time the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber</a> was opened, Tom Riddle might have received his prize for catching whoever was responsible for the attacks back then. Even though all attempts to extract information from the diary failed, Harry felt a strange compulsion to keep it.
</p><p>On <a href="/wiki/Valentine%27s_Day" title="Valentine&#39;s Day">Valentine's Day</a>, Ron and Harry were dismayed to find out Lockhart had spread dwarves dressed as cupids throughout the school to receive and deliver Valentines. One cupid-dwarf managed to deliver one to Harry. While struggling to avoid him, the embarrassed Harry tripped and fell, spilling ink all over the contents of his bag. Ginny noticed the diary and assumed a horrified expression.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Secret_Diary">The Secret Diary</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=25" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Secret Diary">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=25" title="Edit section: The Secret Diary"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Harry saw at once that it was a diary, and the faded year on the cover told him it was fifty years old. He opened it eagerly. On the first page he could just make out the name "T M. Riddle" in smudged ink.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry comes across the diary of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151211144355" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="116" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151211144355" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151211144355" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151211144355" decoding="async" width="245" height="116" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151211144355" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Diary Riddle showing Harry a selected memory of his</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Later, Harry realised that even though the ink was spilled all over the diary, it was not stained at all. He tried writing to the diary and, to his surprise, the diary — or rather T.M. Riddle — began to write back. Riddle explained that he was the one who caught the person who opened the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> the last time, and he could show Harry what happened. Harry agreed and got sucked into a "recording" of Riddle's memory.
</p><p>Harry witnessed the school's previous headmaster, <a href="/wiki/Armando_Dippet" title="Armando Dippet">Armando Dippet</a>, informing Riddle that the school would be closed and Riddle, apprehensive of this, catching <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> fiddling with a large spider in a box. Riddle reported Hagrid to Dippet. During the memory, Harry also learned that Riddle was an orphan that did not want to go back to the orphanage, and his full name was <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Marvolo Riddle</a>. Having seen this, Harry wondered whether Hagrid was the one who opened the Chamber fifty years before and whether he was responsible this time. This was exactly what Riddle wanted.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180613180459" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180613180459" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180613180459" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180613180459" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180613180459" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-movie-dorm.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry possessions are ransacked by a fellow Gryffindor in search of Tom Riddle's diary</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry, Ron, and Hermione decided not to ask Hagrid about it, hoping that the attacks had stopped — and indeed, almost four months after the attack on <a href="/wiki/Justin_Finch-Fletchley" title="Justin Finch-Fletchley">Justin</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nicholas_de_Mimsy-Porpington" title="Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington">Nearly-Headless Nick</a>, the disembodied voice kept quiet and the attacks seemed to have ceased. However, odd things keep happening: Harry returned to his dormitory one day to find it a mess. Ron deduced that somebody had been looking for something, and Harry eventually noticed that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_diary" class="mw-redirect" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s diary">Tom Riddle's diary</a> was gone. This greatly befuddled them, seeing as only a <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> could know the password to enter the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">dormitory</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Cornelius_Fudge"><a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=26" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Cornelius Fudge">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=26" title="Edit section: Cornelius Fudge"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span><b>Hagrid</b>: "<i>If anyone wanted ter find out some stuff, all they’d have ter do would be ter follow the spiders. That’d lead ‘em right. That’s all I’m sayin’.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>We’re in trouble now. No Dumbledore. They might as well close the school tonight. There’ll be an attack a day with him gone.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hagrid's clue before he is taken to Azkaban</b>: "<i>Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; {{{7}}}</dd></dl>
</div>
<p>The next day, the scheduled <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match between <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuff</a> was cancelled due to yet another attack and Harry heard the voice again. This time, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a> called for Harry and Ron personally, and led them to the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a>, where they saw Hermione petrified. She was found near the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Library" title="Hogwarts Library">library</a> with a <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaw</a> <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a>, inexplicably holding a small, circular mirror. This removed Harry as a suspect in the eyes of many of the students, as they knew he would never harm Hermione. Some students even offered him an apology, such as <a href="/wiki/Ernest_Macmillan" title="Ernest Macmillan">Ernie Macmillan</a>.
</p>
