<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161007215951" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Cloak of Invisibility 1992.gif" data-image-key="Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161007215951" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161007215951" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161007215951" decoding="async" width="245" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Cloak of Invisibility 1992.gif" data-image-key="Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161007215951" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Cloak_of_Invisibility_1992.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron visit Hagrid right before he is taken to <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and Ron decided they now must talk to Hagrid. With the now constant supervision on students, this was not easy, but they managed to do it by using Harry's Invisibility cloak. When they reach <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid%27s_cabin" class="mw-redirect" title="Rubeus Hagrid&#39;s cabin">Hagrid's cabin</a>, Harry and Ron managed to hide just before Dumbledore and <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> arrived at the scene. Fudge announced that Hagrid, who to the best of his knowledge opened the Chamber of Secrets the last time, would be sent to wizard prison Azkaban as a precaution. They were shortly joined by <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a>, who declared that he and the other Hogwarts governors unanimously voted to suspend Dumbledore, despite the obvious logic that this would only worsen the situation. Both Hagrid and Dumbledore gave last words, but Hagrid covertly suggested to Harry and Ron that if they want the truth, they should "follow the spiders", and Dumbledore said that he would only truly have left the school when none there remained loyal to him. He also stressed that if anybody at Hogwarts needed help, it would always be available.
</p>
<h5><span id="Visit_to_Aragog's_lair"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Visit_to_Aragog.27s_lair">Visit to Aragog's lair</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=27" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Visit to Aragog&#039;s lair">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=27" title="Edit section: Visit to Aragog&#039;s lair"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Aragog</b>: "<i>The thing that lives in the castle is an ancient creature we spiders fear above all others.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>What is it?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Aragog</b>: "<i>We do not speak of it! We do not name it!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Discussion of the monster within the chamber<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190819144011" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-spider aragog.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20190819144011" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190819144011" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20190819144011" decoding="async" width="245" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-spider aragog.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20190819144011" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron follow the spiders, which lead them to <a href="/wiki/Aragog" title="Aragog">Aragog</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and Ron decided to follow the spiders as per Hagrid's advice. Walking along the trails of the spiders, which were strangely all fleeing <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, take them into the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>. Even though Ron was deeply arachnophobic, the fact that Hermione had been petrified and that they may be able to help through this investigation gave him the willpower to go along anyway. There, they encountered the <a href="/wiki/Flying_Ford_Anglia" title="Flying Ford Anglia">Ford Anglia</a>, which had apparently taken to driving through the forest like some sort of wild animal. They eventually meet Aragog, a giant spider which had been the monster Hagrid had been "caught" setting on other students fifty years ago. Aragog explained that <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> was innocent, but rather than letting Harry and Ron go, he decided to leave them as dinner for his children. <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Mr Weasley</a>'s Ford Anglia came blasting through the layers of spiders, however, and assisted the boys' escape.
</p><p>After this, Harry and Ron felt that they had reached dead ends everywhere, until one possible last hope occurred to them. Aragog said the monster's last victim died in a bathroom, and it occurred to Harry that <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a> might have been that victim. Of course, with the school under such security, it would be almost impossible to sneak in the girls' bathroom near where the first attack occurred.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_last_attack">The last attack</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=28" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The last attack">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=28" title="Edit section: The last attack"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>HER SKELETON WILL LIE IN THE CHAMBER FOREVER</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;The final message on the wall<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527025427" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="99" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Petrification.jpg" data-image-key="Petrification.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20170527025427" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527025427" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20170527025427" decoding="async" width="251" height="99" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Petrification.jpg" data-image-key="Petrification.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20170527025427" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Petrification.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> and the other petrified students being visited by Harry and Ron</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Later that same day, Harry and Ron managed to trick Lockhart — who was leading them to their next class — into letting them go by stroking his ego. Just as they patted themselves on the back, they were caught by <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a>, and Harry had to make up an excuse — they were going to see Hermione in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a>, where visitors were now barred. They now had to go along to make their story appear convincing, but rather than simply hanging around Hermione's petrified form, this time Harry noticed a piece of paper tightly clutched in her hand.
</p><p>This piece of paper revealed what Hermione had found out before she was attacked. She discovered, based on strong circumstantial evidence, that the monster in the Chamber of Secrets was a <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">Basilisk</a> (a giant slithering serpent capable of feeding on human and animal aura to cause petrifaction and death to anyone near it via direct eye contact), which explained why only Harry could hear it. But none of its victims died because they didn't look at its gaze directly: <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a> saw it through his camera, <a href="/wiki/Justin_Finch-Fletchley" title="Justin Finch-Fletchley">Justin Finch-Fletchley</a> saw it through <a href="/wiki/Nearly-Headless_Nick" class="mw-redirect" title="Nearly-Headless Nick">Nearly-Headless Nick</a> (who was already dead), Mrs Norris saw its reflection in the waters from the flooded bathroom, and Hermione used a mirror to look around corners after figuring things out. There was also a note about how spiders feared the Basilisk (which explained them fleeing Hogwarts) and the rooster's call being potentially fatal to it (which explains Hagrid's roosters having been mysteriously killed during the year). This summed up the years events.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Writing_on_the_Wall.png/revision/latest?cb=20180613181133" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Writing on the Wall.png" data-image-key="Writing_on_the_Wall.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Writing_on_the_Wall.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180613181133" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Writing_on_the_Wall.png/revision/latest?cb=20180613181133" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Writing_on_the_Wall.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180613181133" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Writing on the Wall.png" data-image-key="Writing_on_the_Wall.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Writing_on_the_Wall.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180613181133" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Writing_on_the_Wall.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The message written on the wall after Ginevra Weasley is taken into the Chamber of Secrets</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On the note was also scribbled a single word, "pipes", which meant that the serpent moved around through the plumbing. Having solved the mystery, Harry and Ron decided to go to the staff room and report to the teachers. When they got there, they overheard the teachers talking about another attack has occurred. Harry and Ron decided to hide to hear more details, and learning that Ginny had been kidnapped and the heir of <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> had left another message under the previous one: Harry and Ron also heard that <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> would be closed the following day. The teachers then forced <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Lockhart</a> to deal with the monster, as he had been claiming he could handle whatever was responsible for the attacks, irritating the rest of the staff to no end. Looking very crestfallen, he left for his room.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Discovery_in_the_bathroom">Discovery in the bathroom</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=29" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Discovery in the bathroom">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=29" title="Edit section: Discovery in the bathroom"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Moaning Myrtle</b>: "<i>I died in this very stall. I remember it so well... The door was locked, and I was crying, and then I heard somebody come in. They said something funny. A <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">different language</a>, I think it must have been. Anyway, what really got me was that it was a boy speaking. So I unlocked the door, to tell him to go and use his own toilet, and then — I </i>died<i>.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>How?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Moaning Myrtle</b>: "<i>No idea. I just remember seeing a pair of great, big, yellow eyes.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Myrtle's death after she meet the deadly gaze of Slytherin's basilisk<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>That night, Harry and Ron felt utterly useless and helpless, until it occurred to Harry that if the serpent used the plumbing to get around and the last time the chamber was opened a girl died, then the chamber entrance must be in the bathroom <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a> haunted. Harry and Ron decided that if Lockhart was going to deal with the monster they might as well tell him what they knew. They went to his room, only to find him frantically packing, having decided to run away. When questioned on why such a talented <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a> as himself was leaving, Lockhart admitted that he was a fraud and that he put <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">Memory Charms</a> on the people who really did the things that he claimed to have done in his books.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170601005315" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="101" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-chamber entrance.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170601005315" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170601005315" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170601005315" decoding="async" width="245" height="101" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-chamber entrance.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170601005315" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-chamber_entrance.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, Ron, and Lockhart discover the entrance to the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>He then attempted to put a memory charm on Harry and Ron as well. They managed to disarm him and under <a href="/wiki/Wand" title="Wand">wand</a> threats took him to <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a>'s bathroom. Harry then asked Moaning Myrtle about her death, which she happily explained. She stated that the last thing she saw was a pair of enormous eyes by one of the sinks. This sink incidentally had a tap that had never worked. Harry came to the conclusion that the tap can only be opened by the use of <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>. He found a snake carved on the tap and then opened the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest?cb=20161218205852" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C16M3 Snake entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.png" data-image-key="B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161218205852" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest?cb=20161218205852" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161218205852" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C16M3 Snake entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.png" data-image-key="B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161218205852" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C16M3_Snake_entrance_to_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The entrance into the main section of the chamber</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry, Ron, and Lockhart slid down a large pipe and found themselves in maze-like tunnels far under the school. Down there, they encountered a snake skin left by the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Basilisk" class="mw-redirect" title="Slytherin&#39;s Basilisk">basilisk</a>. Just then, Lockhart feigned fainting and stole Ron's wand. Victoriously proclaiming that he would erase Harry and Ron's memories and tell everybody they lost their sanity at the sight of Ginny's mangled body, Lockhart attempted a spell. <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley%27s_first_wand" class="mw-redirect" title="Ronald Weasley&#39;s first wand">Ron's broken wand</a> caused the charm to backfire, erasing Lockhart's memory and causing a portion of the ceiling to cave in. This trapped Harry in the direction of the chamber and Ron in the direction of the castle. Ron had no choice but to stay behind and clear a path through the rocks while Harry continued in search of Ginny. Harry then encountered a wall with stone snakes on it, opened it by speaking <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>, and enters the Chamber itself.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Chamber_of_Secrets">The Chamber of Secrets</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=30" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Chamber of Secrets">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=30" title="Edit section: The Chamber of Secrets"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Skirmish in the Chamber of Secrets">Skirmish in the Chamber of Secrets</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Why do you care how I escaped? Voldemort was after your time...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Tom Riddle</b>: "<i>Voldemort is my past, present, and future, Harry Potter...</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Tom Riddle reveals that he is in fact Lord Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170924142818" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C16M3 Chamber of Secrets revealed.jpg" data-image-key="B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170924142818" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170924142818" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170924142818" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C16M3 Chamber of Secrets revealed.jpg" data-image-key="B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170924142818" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C16M3_Chamber_of_Secrets_revealed.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the entrance chamber of the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Inside, he found Ginny lying on the ground, pale and cold. He dropped <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">his wand</a> and ran to her, trying to get a response from her, but to no avail. He then saw <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a> smiling at him and holding Harry's wand. Riddle explained his presence in the present by revealing he was a memory, which had been preserved in his diary for fifty years.
</p><p>He then explained what had happened. Riddle had opened the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> fifty years ago and planned to purge the school of <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-borns</a> and half-bloods; however, when he learned that the school was going to close down due to the attacks and that Dumbledore (then the <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration_(class)" title="Transfiguration (class)">Transfiguration</a> teacher) was keeping a closer and closer watch on him, he had no choice but to cease the attacks and frame <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> for doing it. Not wanting to waste all the years he spent on figuring out where the chamber was and how to get to it, he left behind a diary containing the memory of his sixteen-year-old self in hopes that it would, one day, fall into the hands of an unsuspecting victim who would help him finish his work.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161211004513" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C17M1 Harry Ginny Tom Chamber of Secrets.jpg" data-image-key="B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211004513" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161211004513" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211004513" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C17M1 Harry Ginny Tom Chamber of Secrets.jpg" data-image-key="B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211004513" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C17M1_Harry_Ginny_Tom_Chamber_of_Secrets.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and an unconscious Ginny in the main chamber, with Riddle watching</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ginny had been writing in the <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_diary" class="mw-redirect" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s diary">diary</a> all year. Riddle had written back sympathetically and Ginny grew to confess her fears, hopes and feelings to him. She essentially poured some of her soul into him, which was exactly what he wanted. He gradually grew more powerful and eventually managed to pour some of his soul back into her, possessing her and using her body to open the chamber and launch the new series of attacks. However, eventually Ginny became suspicious of the diary and decided to get rid of it by flushing it down the toilet in <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a>'s bathroom. This is when Harry found it. When Ginny saw Harry with the diary on Valentine's Day, she panicked and worried that Riddle had told all of her secrets to Harry, so she stole it back from Harry's dormitory. It began taking control of her again, but this time with the intention of killing Harry, so he had Ginny write her own farewell on the wall and come down to wait, luring Harry to the rescue and, consequently, his doom.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 182px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190227225113" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="180" height="73" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="I am Lord Voldemort.gif" data-image-key="I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20190227225113" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190227225113" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20190227225113" decoding="async" width="180" height="73" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="I am Lord Voldemort.gif" data-image-key="I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20190227225113" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:I_am_Lord_Voldemort.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><i>I am Lord Voldemort</i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Riddle then asked how Harry managed to defeat the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Wizard" title="Dark Wizard">Dark Wizard</a> <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> as a mere baby. Harry asks Riddle why he cares, as Voldemort existed after his time. Riddle replies that Voldemort was his <i>"past, present and future.</i>" He then wrote his name in the air with Harry's wand: TOM MARVOLO RIDDLE Riddle then waved the wand and the letters rearrange themselves into I AM LORD VOLDEMORT. Needless to say, this meant Riddle grew up to become Lord Voldemort. Riddle then revealed he was, in fact, a <a href="/wiki/Half-blood" title="Half-blood">half-blood</a>, and his mother had named him Tom after his Muggle father and Marvolo after his <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a> grandfather, a descendant of <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>. He scrambled his "filthy Muggle father's name" to create a new one, which he knew people would fear when he became the most powerful wizard in the world.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battling_the_Basilisk">Battling the Basilisk</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=31" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Battling the Basilisk">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=31" title="Edit section: Battling the Basilisk"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Let's match the power of Lord Voldemort, Heir of Salazar Slytherin, against the famous Harry Potter.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Tom Riddle unleashes the basilisk<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>Harry retorted that he must be mistaken, because the greatest <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a> in the world, as everybody knew, was not <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> but Dumbledore. Even when Voldemort was at the peak of his power, he was afraid of Dumbledore, and now he was barely alive. Riddle angrily answered that Dumbledore had been driven out the castle by the mere memory of him. Harry yelled that Dumbledore was not as gone as Riddle seemed to believe. In this display of loyalty, he summoned <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a> the <a href="/wiki/Phoenix" title="Phoenix">phoenix</a> to him, who also brought with him the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a>, both assets that Riddle deems extremely useless.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 243px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6d/COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140710235835" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="COS piercing through Serpent of Slytherin.gif" data-image-key="COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6d/COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140710235835" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6d/COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140710235835" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6d/COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140710235835" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="COS piercing through Serpent of Slytherin.gif" data-image-key="COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6d/COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140710235835" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:COS_piercing_through_Serpent_of_Slytherin.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry slays Slytherin's basilisk with the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Riddle then <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Skirmish in the Chamber of Secrets">summoned</a> the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Basilisk" class="mw-redirect" title="Slytherin&#39;s Basilisk">basilisk</a> and commanded it to kill Harry. However, <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a> was not as defenceless as one might initially think, and pecked out the basilisk's eyes, thus preventing its gaze from killing. The basilisk could still smell Harry, however, and remained very dangerous; Harry, in desperation, put on the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a>, wishing against hope for help. Instead of an answer, Harry had a heavy sword with a hilt embedded with rubies fall on his head from inside the hat. After several missed strikes from the blinded basilisk, Harry plunged the sword into the roof of its mouth, killing it. However, one of its poisonous fangs sank into his arm, injecting a deadly poison. While Riddle gloated over his "win", Fawkes proceeded to cry on the wound and Harry was instantly cured.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527030007" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="93" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HarryPotter PM B2C17M3 HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang Moment.jpg" data-image-key="HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20170527030007" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527030007" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20170527030007" decoding="async" width="249" height="93" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HarryPotter PM B2C17M3 HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang Moment.jpg" data-image-key="HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20170527030007" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HarryPotter_PM_B2C17M3_HarryStabbingDiaryWithBasiliskFang_Moment.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry stabbing Tom Riddle's diary with a Basilisk fang (unknowingly destroying one of Voldemort's Horcruxes)</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry then stabbed the diary three times with the Basilisk fang to rid himself of Riddle, unknowingly destroying one of Voldemort's Horcruxes in the process. Riddle's manifestation exploded, therefore foiling his attempt to come back to life. Ink began pouring out of the book and the memory of Riddle faded out of existence; Ginny immediately stirred and woke up, quite distraught. Harry and Ginny travelled back through the Chamber to find Ron and Lockhart, who had no idea of who or where he was.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Escaping_the_chamber">Escaping the chamber</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=32" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Escaping the chamber">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=32" title="Edit section: Escaping the chamber"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>He looks like he wants you to grab hold... But you're much too heavy for a bird to pull up there —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Fawkes isn't an ordinary bird.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry and others escape the chamber with the aid of Fawkes<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>Harry, Ron, Ginny and Lockhart grabbed onto <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a> and flew out of the Chamber (another <a href="/wiki/Phoenix" title="Phoenix">phoenix</a> specialty). They returned to the castle to find Dumbledore, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a>, <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur</a> and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a>, who were delighted to see them alive. Harry worried that Ginny would get blamed for being the person behind the attacks, but to his great relief Dumbledore rightly deduced that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> was the culprit. After Ginny left to get a much-needed rest, Harry and Ron both received 200 house points each for <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> and both got an Award for Special Services to the school. Dumbledore then gave Ron Hagrid's release paper for him to mail and then spoke with Harry alone.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210035910" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="95" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C18M1 Sword of Gryffindor engraving.png" data-image-key="B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210035910" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210035910" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210035910" decoding="async" width="250" height="95" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C18M1 Sword of Gryffindor engraving.png" data-image-key="B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210035910" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C18M1_Sword_of_Gryffindor_engraving.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Dumbledore talk after Harry slayed the Basilisk in the chamber</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry expressed his concern that he belonged in <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>. Dumbledore revealed that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> transferred some of his powers to Harry when he gave him his scar, explaining his ability to speak <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>. He asked Harry why he thought the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> put him in <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> if he had so many Slytherin qualities, and Harry admitted that the only reason it did was because he had asked it to. Dumbledore confirmed this and told Harry that "<i>it is our choices, rather than our abilities, that reveal who we truly are</i>". He also commends Harry for showing him real loyalty in the Chamber, for only that could've called Fawkes to his aid. He pointed out to the sword Harry had drawn out of the hat - Harry now noticed it had <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor" title="Godric Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor</a>'s name on it. Dumbledore said that only a true <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> would be able to draw it out.
</p>
<h5><span id="Dobby's_reward"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Dobby.27s_reward">Dobby's reward</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=33" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Dobby&#039;s reward">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=33" title="Edit section: Dobby&#039;s reward"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Lucius Malfoy</b>: "<i>You lost me my servant!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Dobby</b>: "<i>You shall not harm Harry Potter!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Dobby defends Harry after the latter frees him from servitude<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p><a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> barged into Dumbledore's office, outraged that Dumbledore had returned to the school after being dismissed. Dumbledore calmly responded that the governors had asked him to return once they heard that <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a>'s daughter was attacked. Apparently they had been blackmailed by Lucius to vote for Dumbledore's dismissal in the first place on pain of Lucius cursing their families. <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> followed Lucius into the room, thus showing that his masters were the <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_family" title="Malfoy family">Malfoys</a>.
</p><p class="mw-empty-elt"></p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 290px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180523042009" class="image"><img alt="Chamber-of-secrets-lucius harry.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="288" height="153" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Chamber-of-secrets-lucius harry.jpg" data-image-key="Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/288?cb=20180523042009" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180523042009" class="image"><img alt="Chamber-of-secrets-lucius harry.jpg" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/288?cb=20180523042009" decoding="async" width="288" height="153" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Chamber-of-secrets-lucius harry.jpg" data-image-key="Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/288?cb=20180523042009" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Chamber-of-secrets-lucius_harry.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p class="mw-empty-elt"></p><p>Dumbledore and <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Malfoy</a> had a calm and venomous interchange (respectively), during which Dumbledore and Harry (with the help of <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>'s unspoken hints) essentially exposed Lucius sneaking <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_Diary" class="mw-redirect" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s Diary">Riddle's diary</a> (one of his illegal artefacts) into Ginny's school things during the fight with Arthur at <a href="/wiki/Flourish_and_Blotts" title="Flourish and Blotts">Flourish and Blotts</a>. This was supposed to frame Ginny for the attacks, with heavy implications on the <a href="/wiki/Muggle_Protection_Act" title="Muggle Protection Act">Muggle Protection Act</a> <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> had been suggesting. Malfoy dared Dumbledore to prove his accusation, and while the Headmaster has insufficient evidence to do that, he cautioned Malfoy against orchestrating further such plots.
</p><p>Knowing that a master could release his <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> by giving them some clothes, Harry tricked <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Malfoy</a> into freeing <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> by giving Malfoy one of his own socks, which he promptly threw away, and was caught by Dobby. Malfoy, after discovering Harry's trick, attempted to kill Harry, only to be stopped by Dobby. Dobby thanked Harry dearly for freeing him and left. At the ending feast, Dumbledore announced his school treat of cancelling all final exams (much to Hermione's dismay) and that Lockhart would not return to Hogwarts.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Third_year">Third year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=34" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Third year">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=34" title="Edit section: Third year"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Sirius Black escaped to come after you? Oh, Harry… you’ll have to be really, really careful. don’t go looking for trouble, Harry…</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I don’t go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>How thick would Harry have to be, to go looking for a nutter who wants to kill him?</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry, Ron and Hermione discussing Sirius Black's escape<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/The_smallest_bedroom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160811192628" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The smallest bedroom.jpg" data-image-key="The_smallest_bedroom.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/The_smallest_bedroom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20160811192628" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/The_smallest_bedroom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160811192628" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/The_smallest_bedroom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20160811192628" decoding="async" width="249" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The smallest bedroom.jpg" data-image-key="The_smallest_bedroom.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/The_smallest_bedroom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20160811192628" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_smallest_bedroom.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his bedroom reading a <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> article</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's third year in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a> started out almost as bad as the year prior, and gradually got depressing. Throughout the preceding summer, the Dursleys became fearful of his magical abilities getting exposed that they banned him from talking to the neighbours immediately after his return home to them. They even went as far as punishing him for giving their phone number to his friends, as evident to Harry getting reprimanded by <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Uncle Vernon</a> when the latter received a call from Ron. This, however, did not stop Harry from studying magic every night by sneaking his school supplies and hiding them in his room one night while <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Aunt Petunia</a> and <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> were out admiring Vernon's new company car. Furthermore, he had little contact with his friends nor any news from the wizarding world since the phone incident, but <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a> was allowed out of her padlocked cage because the Dursleys could no longer take the noise she made in boredom.
</p><p>On <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a> (Harry's <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_thirteenth_birthday" title="Harry Potter&#39;s thirteenth birthday">thirteenth birthday</a>), which might have made the Dursleys forget about his birthday, for they were too busy preparing for a visit from Aunt Marge. The sight of a copy of the <i>Daily Prophet </i>among the mail from Errol interested Harry, as it said that Ron had returned from a trip to <a href="/wiki/Egypt" title="Egypt">Egypt</a> to visit his oldest brother <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> (a <a href="/wiki/Curse-Breaker" title="Curse-Breaker">Curse-Breaker</a> of <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a>) for which <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> paid using seven hundred galleons he won in the <a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet_Grand_Prize_Galleon_Draw" title="Daily Prophet Grand Prize Galleon Draw">Daily Prophet Grand Prize Galleon Draw</a>. The article also showcased a picture of the Weasleys standing in front of a pyramid. It was there that Ron bought Harry the most fascinating present: a <a href="/wiki/Sneakoscope" title="Sneakoscope">Sneakoscope</a>, which was sold for tourists. He also revived birthday presents from Hermione and Hagrid as well.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150214194653" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="101" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Marge starts to inflate.gif" data-image-key="Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20150214194653" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150214194653" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20150214194653" decoding="async" width="245" height="101" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Marge starts to inflate.gif" data-image-key="Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20150214194653" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Marge_starts_to_inflate.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A enraged Harry inflates <a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">Marge Dursley</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When his <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade_permission_form" title="Hogsmeade permission form">Hogsmeade permission form</a> was delivered, Harry was worried of the trouble he'll probably go through in order to persuade his aunt or uncle to sign it. They agreed to do so the next morning, but only if he behaved during Marge's visit. However, Marge began insulting the memory of Harry's mother at the dinner table three days later, describing her as a "bad egg" who ran off with a "scoundrel" and left the Dursleys with Harry as the "result in front of them". Harry lost his temper to this, inadvertently making Marge's wine glass explode. The insults transitioned to his father on the final day of her visit, making him very upset to such extent that he ended up losing all control of his magic powers and <a href="/wiki/Blowing-up_of_Marjorie_Dursley" class="mw-redirect" title="Blowing-up of Marjorie Dursley">accidentally inflated her</a>, possibly with an <a href="/wiki/Engorgement_Charm" title="Engorgement Charm">Engorgement Charm</a>. Vernon ordered his nephew to put Marge back the way she was, but Harry said no and instead packed up his school things and left the house. He fled out of fear of being expelled from Hogwarts by the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>, for using underage magic outside school, something he had already been warned about.
</p><p>Later that night, Harry was picked up off the curb of <a href="/wiki/Magnolia_Crescent" title="Magnolia Crescent">Magnolia Crescent</a> by the triple-decker wizard transport the <a href="/wiki/Knight_Bus" title="Knight Bus">Knight Bus</a>, which was sent to drive him as two members of the Ministry's <a href="/wiki/Accidental_Magic_Reversal_Squad" title="Accidental Magic Reversal Squad">Accidental Magic Reversal Squad</a> were dispatched to deflate and <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">Obliviate</a> Marge. During the ride to the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a>, the bus' conductor <a href="/wiki/Stanley_Shunpike" title="Stanley Shunpike">Stan Shunpike</a> gave him a copy of the <i>Daily Prophet</i> with its front page story being about the Ministry's continuing struggle to recapture <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, a convicted Voldemort supporter who recently escaped from the wizard prison <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a> (the first person ever to have done so) after spending twelve years there for the mass-murder of thirteen people with a single <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527055547" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170527055547" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527055547" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170527055547" decoding="async" width="245" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170527055547" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter4-movie-screencaps.com-1579.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Minister Cornelius Fudge personally sees that Harry is safe</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They arrived at their destination to find a relieved-looking <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> waiting at the restaurant door to welcome Harry in for a meeting. To Harry's relief though, the <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> took no action against him since accidental uses of magic did not count as a violation to the <a href="/wiki/Decree_for_the_Reasonable_Restriction_of_Underage_Sorcery" title="Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage Sorcery">Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage Sorcery</a>, but described the choice of running away as very irresponsible despite it putting the Ministry in a right flap. As a generous measure, Fudge booked the young wizard a room in the Leaky Cauldron Inn for the rest of the summer, though this made something about Fudge's tone spike Harry's suspicion.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Stay_at_the_Leaky_Cauldron">Stay at the Leaky Cauldron</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=35" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Stay at the Leaky Cauldron">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=35" title="Edit section: Stay at the Leaky Cauldron"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Molly Weasley</b>: "<i>But no one's really sure that Black's after Harry.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Arthur Weasley</b>: "<i>The guards told Fudge that Blacks been talking in his sleep for a while now. Always the same words: 'He's at Hogwarts... he's at Hogwarts.' Black is deranged, Molly, and he wants Harry dead.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry finds out that Sirius Black supposedly wants him dead<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>When finished with his exploration of <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a> for school supplies three weeks later, Harry found Ron and Hermione looking all over for him at <a href="/wiki/Florean_Fortescue%27s_Ice_Cream_Parlour" title="Florean Fortescue&#39;s Ice Cream Parlour">Florean Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlour</a> four days afterwards while the Weasleys were booking a room at the inn. They already heard of his inflation of Marge, and while Ron thought it funny, Hermione was amazed to learn that Harry was not expelled and wondered why Fudge really let him off the hook. Ron, however, was more concerned for his pet rat <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a>, who was looking very ill since he was brought back from Egypt (possibly due to the stress of the trip), so he and Harry went over to the <a href="/wiki/Magical_Menagerie" title="Magical Menagerie">Magical Menagerie</a> to buy a bottle of <a href="/wiki/Rat_tonic" title="Rat tonic">rat tonic</a> for him.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png/revision/latest?cb=20180417014719" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="90" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C4M2 Magical Menagerie.png" data-image-key="B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180417014719" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png/revision/latest?cb=20180417014719" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180417014719" decoding="async" width="250" height="90" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C4M2 Magical Menagerie.png" data-image-key="B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180417014719" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C4M2_Magical_Menagerie.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a> in Magical Menagerie right before being purchased by Hermione</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While in Diagon Alley, Harry found it very interesting to learn from the <a href="/wiki/Magical_Menagerie_saleswoman" title="Magical Menagerie saleswoman">saleswoman</a> behind the counter that most rats have an expected life span of three years. He found this odd, since Scabbers originally belonged to Ron's older brother <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy Weasley</a>. Thus Scabbers lived much longer than Ron could remember, at least 12 years. As Ron declined the Saleswoman's offer to buy a sleek black rat as a replacement, a half-<a href="/wiki/Kneazle" title="Kneazle">Kneazle</a> <a href="/wiki/Cat" title="Cat">cat</a> named Crookshanks tried to attack Scabbers, who scurried away to hide in a wastepaper bin outside <a href="/wiki/Quality_Quidditch_Supplies" title="Quality Quidditch Supplies">Quality Quidditch Supplies</a> with his owner and Harry following. Hermione spent the early birthday money from her parents to buy the tonic and Crookshanks, much to Ron's displeasure.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Harry-potter4-warning.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527051322" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter4-warning.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter4-warning.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Harry-potter4-warning.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170527051322" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Harry-potter4-warning.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170527051322" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Harry-potter4-warning.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170527051322" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter4-warning.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter4-warning.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Harry-potter4-warning.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170527051322" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter4-warning.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Arthur Weasley warns Harry of the danger that he is possibly in</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When the rat tonic was misplaced somewhere around the Leaky Cauldron salon later that night, Harry volunteered to search for it there while Ron was busy helping Percy search for his new <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy_badge" title="Head Boy badge">Head Boy badge</a> in their room at the inn. But the conversation which a worried <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> was having with her husband soon caught his attention, so Harry listened to what they were saying about Sirius Black's escape, and what connection it had to Harry himself. According to Mr Weasley, when Voldemort met his downfall, Black lost everything he hoped to gain, but to that day he remained a faithful servant to the Dark Lord's cause.
</p><p>The Ministry feared that the killer's motive was to use Harry to return his master to full strength, as evident to the report from Fudge's inspection of <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a> saying that Black was repeatedly muttering "<i>He's at Hogwarts</i>" in his sleep. This shook Harry a little to the realisation that Fudge let him go because he was relieved to see Harry all right after running away. Though he was convinced that Hogwarts was a a safe haven because of the presence of Albus Dumbledore, the senior Weasleys agreed that Black could break into the school if he could break out of his Azkaban.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Delay_on_the_Hogwarts_Express">Delay on the Hogwarts Express</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=36" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Delay on the Hogwarts Express">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=36" title="Edit section: Delay on the Hogwarts Express"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>Standing in the doorway, illuminated by the shivering flames in Lupin's hand, was a cloaked figure that towered to the ceiling. Its face was completely hidden beneath its hood. Harry's eyes darted downward, and what he saw made his stomach contract... And then the thing beneath the hood, whatever it was, drew a long, slow, rattling breath, as though it were trying to suck something more than air from its surroundings. An intense cold swept over them all.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry's first encounter with a guard of Azkaban<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 244px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Harry_vs_Dementor.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190209151005" class="image"><img alt="Harry vs Dementor.gif" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="242" height="101" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry vs Dementor.gif" data-image-key="Harry_vs_Dementor.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Harry_vs_Dementor.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20190209151005" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Harry_vs_Dementor.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190209151005" class="image"><img alt="Harry vs Dementor.gif" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Harry_vs_Dementor.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20190209151005" decoding="async" width="242" height="101" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry vs Dementor.gif" data-image-key="Harry_vs_Dementor.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Harry_vs_Dementor.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20190209151005" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_vs_Dementor.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When they got onto <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform 9¾</a>, Mr Weasley moved Harry aside to tell him not to go looking for Black, but Harry claimed that he would never look for someone who wanted him killed. He, Ron and Hermione found only one empty compartment on the Hogwarts Express, but had to share with a friend of Harry's parents, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, who was recently appointed Hogwarts' new <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">professor</a>. As Harry told his friends of what he heard about Black coming after him until, the train stopped almost halfway to Hogwarts, letting one of the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> (a gliding wraith capable of feeding on human happiness to cause depression and madness to anyone near it via mental energy draining) used as the Azkaban guards aboard to determine if Black himself was hiding on it.
</p><p>Only Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> were the most affected by the creature (since he had the worst past involving the night Voldemort killed his parents, and she had the worst experience of being under the control of the sentient memory within <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">Voldemort's old school diary</a> the year before), and were about to fall victim to <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">its fatal kiss</a> when Lupin cast a <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a> which drove it away. Harry fainted to the sound of his mother screaming, but recovered when Lupin gave him a piece of chocolate to feel better and sent a letter ahead to <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor Minerva McGonagall</a> saying he was ill.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161220002522" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C6M3.jpg" data-image-key="B3C6M3.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161220002522" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161220002522" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161220002522" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C6M3.jpg" data-image-key="B3C6M3.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161220002522" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C6M3.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's first <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a> lessons involving hippogriffs</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>For one, Hermione was taking nearly twice as many classes, including some taught at the same time. <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> for Care of Magical Creatures. While Lupin's lessons were enjoyable, Hagrid's soon become dreary. During the first lesson, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> deliberately provoked the <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriff</a> <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> into attacking him. This in turn forced <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> to file a complaint against Hagrid with the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures. Meanwhile, tensions grew between Hermione and Ron over Crookshanks' continuing habit of trying to harm Scabbers.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161211020850" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C11M1 Confiscating Firebolt.jpg" data-image-key="B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211020850" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161211020850" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211020850" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C11M1 Confiscating Firebolt.jpg" data-image-key="B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211020850" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C11M1_Confiscating_Firebolt.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry receives a Firebolt for Christmas that is shortly confiscated by McGonagall</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
