<p>After several Dementors approached Harry during a <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match, causing him to faint and fall off his broomstick. <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> stopped Harry's fall, but his <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a> flew into the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a> and was destroyed, much to Harry's dismay. At Christmas, Harry received a new, superb <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">Firebolt</a> <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a>, although Hermione suspected Black was the anonymous donor. She reported it to Professor <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>, who confiscated the broom for testing. Harry and Ron were furious with Hermione and they stopped speaking to her. When the broom was returned some months later, the two boys tried to make up with her, but it went wrong when Ron discovered Scabbers was missing; Ron blamed Crookshanks because he found cat hairs and blood on his dormitory floor.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Mauraders_Map">Mauraders Map</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=37" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Mauraders Map">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=37" title="Edit section: Mauraders Map"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry being given the Marauder&#39;s Map"><b>George Weasley</b>: "<i>This, Harry, is the secret of our success.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Fred Weasley</b>: "<i>It’s a wrench, giving it to you, but we decided last night, your need’s greater than ours.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>George Weasley</b>: "<i>Anyway, we know it off by heart. We bequeath it to you. We don’t really need it anymore.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>And what do I need with a bit of old parchment?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Fred Weasley</b>: "<i>A bit of old parchment! Explain, George.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry being given the Marauder's Map<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png/revision/latest?cb=20161213065557" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="90" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C10M1 Harry next to the One-Eyed Witch.png" data-image-key="B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161213065557" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png/revision/latest?cb=20161213065557" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161213065557" decoding="async" width="249" height="90" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C10M1 Harry next to the One-Eyed Witch.png" data-image-key="B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20161213065557" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C10M1_Harry_next_to_the_One-Eyed_Witch.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry using the map to sneak off to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Shortly before Christmas, the <a href="/wiki/Fred_and_George_Weasley" title="Fred and George Weasley">Weasley twins</a> gave Harry their <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a>, a magical document that showed every person's location within <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, what they were doing, and secret passageways in and out of the castle. Harry used a tunnel to sneak into Hogsmeade village, where he overheard a disturbing conversation that <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> was his parents' best friend, as well as his godfather and legal guardian. Black was the Potters' <a href="/wiki/Secret_Keeper" title="Secret Keeper">Secret Keeper</a> and he allegedly divulged the Potters' secret whereabouts to <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> and murdered their friend <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, as well as twelve <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> bystanders. Peter left a finger to prove that he has been killed with the twelve Muggles.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424033626" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="121" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C17M1 Ron dragged away Whomping Willow.png" data-image-key="B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180424033626" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424033626" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180424033626" decoding="async" width="240" height="121" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C17M1 Ron dragged away Whomping Willow.png" data-image-key="B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180424033626" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C17M1_Ron_dragged_away_Whomping_Willow.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Sirius Black captures Ron and drags him to the Whomping Willow</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After Harry completed his <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a> exam, <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Professor Trelawney</a> entered a trance and predicted that the Dark Lord's servant would return to him that night. Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> finally made peace with <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, but the trio soon learned that <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> would be executed. When they visited <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> to console him, <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a> appeared, and Ron picked him up. <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> and the executioner were making their way to Hagrid's hut, and Harry, Ron, and Hermione made their way out the back door. As they were walking up the path, they thought they heard Buckbeak executed, when all of a sudden, Scabbers bit Ron, and Ron chased him to the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>. A large dog attacked Ron and dragged him and Scabbers into a hole at the tree's base. Harry and Hermione followed, finding a tunnel leading to the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>. Inside, Harry confronted Sirius Black, who, as an unregistered, and therefore illegal, <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a>, could transform into an animal at will.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Prisoner_of_Azkaban">The Prisoner of Azkaban</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=38" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Prisoner of Azkaban">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=38" title="Edit section: The Prisoner of Azkaban"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Encounter_at_the_Shrieking_Shack" title="Encounter at the Shrieking Shack">Encounter at the Shrieking Shack</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>The Dark Lord lies alone and friendless, abandoned by his followers. His servant has been chained these twelve years. Tonight, before midnight... the servant will break free and set out to rejoin his master. The Dark Lord will rise again with his servant's aid, greater and more terrible than ever he was. Tonight... before midnight... the servant... will set out... to rejoin... his master.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Professor Trelawney's second prediction<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208053517" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="154" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Encounter in the Shrieking Shack.jpg" data-image-key="Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161208053517" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208053517" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161208053517" decoding="async" width="235" height="154" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Encounter in the Shrieking Shack.jpg" data-image-key="Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161208053517" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio encounter Sirius Black in the Shrieking Shack</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Lupin</a>, who spotted the group on the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a>, suddenly burst in and embraced his old friend Black. Confronted by <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, Lupin admitted to being a <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a>, as well as the Map's creator along with <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a>, <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James Potter.</a> Also the latter two were illegal <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagi</a>, a rat and stag respectively. Lupin and Black explained that Scabbers was actually Peter Pettigrew in his <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a> form. He was <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s servant, and he betrayed the Potters (as Black had switched his position as Secret-Keeper with Pettigrew), framing Black for the crimes.
</p><p>Harry was sceptical, until Black and Lupin forced Pettigrew back into his human form. This came as a huge shock to Harry, Ron, and Hermione, especially Ron. Black then explained he discovered that Pettigrew was still alive and escaped <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a> to seek revenge, as well as to make sure that Pettigrew could not harm Harry. Harry stopped Black and Lupin from murdering Pettigrew, believing that his father would not have wanted his two best friends to become killers.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Saving_the_innocent">Saving the innocent</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=39" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Saving the innocent">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=39" title="Edit section: Saving the innocent"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>f you succeed tonight, more than one innocent life may be spared.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Dumbledore's parting words to Harry and Hermione<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>As the group headed back to the castle, the full moon rose, causing <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Lupin</a> to turn into a <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a>. During the ensuing commotion, <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Pettigrew</a> escaped, while <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a> turned into his dog form to protect the others from Lupin. Lupin fled, leaving Black badly injured. As Dementors moved in to attack Black, Harry saw a mysterious figure in the distance cast a powerful stag-shaped <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a>, scattering the vicious creatures. Harry became convinced it was his father, or at least his father's spirit, who produced the Patronus. Black was then captured and taken to the castle where the Dementors intended to suck out his soul.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="122" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Turning time.gif" data-image-key="Turning_time.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140717051907" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140717051907" decoding="async" width="240" height="122" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Turning time.gif" data-image-key="Turning_time.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140717051907" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Turning_time.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione use the Time-Turner in order to save Buckbeak and Sirius Black</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> revealed to Harry that she was entrusted with a time-travelling device, called a <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a>, which was how she was able to attend so many classes. Prompted by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>, she and Harry travelled three hours into the past, watching themselves go through the night's previous events. They freed <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> and returned to the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>. As the Dementors were about to attack the "other" Harry and Sirius, Harry realised that the mysterious figure he saw earlier was actually himself. He cast the powerful <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> that repelled the dementors. Harry and Hermione freed Black, who escaped on Buckbeak, as they rushed back to where they were before. As they saw Dumbledore exiting the hospital wing, they completed their journey.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424014356" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C21M4 Sirius flying off on Buckbeak.png" data-image-key="B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424014356" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424014356" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424014356" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C21M4 Sirius flying off on Buckbeak.png" data-image-key="B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424014356" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione rescue Sirius and Buckbeak</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After Sirius was revealed to have once again escaped, <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> burst into the hospital wing and blamed Harry, but left when he was unable to convince anyone without any proof. Fudge said he would remove the Dementors because they tried to perform their kiss on Harry. <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> was furious that <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> escaped, while <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> was ecstatic. Professor Lupin resigned after Snape "accidentally" revealed that he was a werewolf. Harry the previous nights events Harry visited Lupin in his office, during which the map was returned to him.
</p><p>When Harry told <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> about <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Professor Trelawney</a>'s prophecy, Dumbledore encouraged him to not feel guilty about letting Pettigrew live. On the train back, Harry received a letter from Sirius, telling him that he sent him the <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">Firebolt</a>, and included a letter giving Harry permission to visit <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>. The letter was delivered by a small minute owl, which Sirius gives to Ron as a replacement for Scabbers. The owl was later named <a href="/wiki/Pigwidgeon" title="Pigwidgeon">Pigwidgeon</a> by Ginny.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fourth_year">Fourth year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=40" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Fourth year">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=40" title="Edit section: Fourth year"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>You have shown bravery beyond anything I could have expected of you.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Dumbledore regarding Harry's ecape from Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Harry wakes up from a nightmare at the Dursleys' house on <a href="/wiki/Privet_Drive" title="Privet Drive">Privet Drive</a>. He experienced a vivid dream, regarding Muggle <a href="/wiki/Frank_Bryce" title="Frank Bryce">Frank Bryce</a>. Bryce had learned of Voldemort's plans to reward <a href="/wiki/Pettigrew_family" title="Pettigrew family">Pettigrew</a> for his help in capturing <a href="/wiki/Bertha_Jorkins" title="Bertha Jorkins">Bertha Jorkins</a>. Jorkins was a Ministry employee, who Voldemort extracted information from before murdering. Frank was eventually discovered by Voldemort's snake <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>. The Dark Lord unhappy that the elderly gardener was spying on him casts the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>, ending the elderly gardener's life. After which Harry wakes up with his scar hurting and considers writing to his friends and even Dumbledore, but eventually decides to write a letter to Sirius. He does not mention the dream, just that his scar was hurting and plans to send the letter once <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a> returns.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210160707" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C5M1 playing in the garden at the Burrow.png" data-image-key="B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210160707" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210160707" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210160707" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C5M1 playing in the garden at the Burrow.png" data-image-key="B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161210160707" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C5M1_playing_in_the_garden_at_the_Burrow.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and others watching Bill and Charlie joust with tables at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The next day, a letter from <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a>  addressed to the Dursleys arrives, she asks if Harry can join Hermione and the Weasley family to go to the Quidditch World Cup final between Ireland and Bulgaria. The letter upsets Vernon and he intentionally says no, but one mention of Sirius Black is enough to convince him to let Harry go. Harry immediately writes back to Ron and on Sunday afternoon, the Weasleys attempt to use <a href="/wiki/Floo_Powder" title="Floo Powder">Floo Powder</a> to access the Dursley household. They did this unaware that the Dursleys have an electric fireplace, which results in Mr Weasley destroying half the sitting room. One of the twins purposely drops a <a href="/wiki/Ton-Tongue_Toffee" title="Ton-Tongue Toffee">Ton-Tongue Toffee</a>, as a means of product testing, which Dudley eats. Things only get worse form that point forward and results in Vernon throwing figurines at Mr Weasley.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png/revision/latest?cb=20161218065016" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C7M1 Quidditch World Cup Campsite.png" data-image-key="B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161218065016" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png/revision/latest?cb=20161218065016" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161218065016" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C7M1 Quidditch World Cup Campsite.png" data-image-key="B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20161218065016" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C7M1_Quidditch_World_Cup_Campsite.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry attends the <a href="/wiki/1994_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="1994 Quidditch World Cup">1994 Quidditch World Cup</a> with Herrmione and the Weasleys</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/25_August" title="25 August">25 August</a>, <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> Harry, the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley</a> family (besides <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a>), and Hermione Granger attended the Quidditch World Cup. At Stoatshead Hill, Cedric Diggory and his father, <a href="/wiki/Amos_Diggory" title="Amos Diggory">Amos</a> joined them. Once at the camp grounds, they met Ludo Bagman, Barty Crouch Snr with his house-elf Winky, and many other Hogwarts students and their families, including: <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>, <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wood" title="Oliver Wood">Oliver Wood</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. They were able to see the match between the Irish and <a href="/wiki/Bulgarian_National_Quidditch_team" title="Bulgarian National Quidditch team">Bulgarian</a> national teams up close, because Harry, the Weasleys, and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> had seats in the Top Box, thanks to a favour Mr Weasley had done for <a href="/wiki/Ludovic_Bagman" title="Ludovic Bagman">Ludo Bagman</a>. It was during this World Cup that Harry learned of the existence of foreign wizarding schools, something he had not given any thought to before the cup.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Reappearance_of_the_Dark_Mark">Reappearance of the Dark Mark</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=41" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Reappearance of the Dark Mark">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=41" title="Edit section: Reappearance of the Dark Mark"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Death Eaters? What are <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Bill Weasley</b>: "<i>It's what You-Know-Who's supporters called themselves. I think we saw what's left of them tonight...</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Discussion of the mysterious crowd<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180322040319" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="1994 qudditch world cup.jpg" data-image-key="1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180322040319" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180322040319" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180322040319" decoding="async" width="249" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="1994 qudditch world cup.jpg" data-image-key="1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180322040319" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:1994_qudditch_world_cup.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Death Eaters' cause a riot, attacking the Muggle <a href="/wiki/Roberts_family" title="Roberts family">Roberts</a> family</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The night after the match, while the Irish team's supporters were still celebrating, a group of black-cloaked, <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">hooded figures</a> held terrifying celebrations of their own by suspending the <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> camp site manager and his family in air like twisted marionettes probably done via <i><a href="/wiki/Levicorpus" title="Levicorpus">Levicorpus</a></i>. They also proceeded to pillage and destroy everything in sight. On Mr Weasley's orders, Harry fled into the woods near the camp site, along with Ron, Hermione, Fred, George, and Ginny. The group was separated in the woods and the trio were on their own. In the chaos Harry had lost his wand, he speculated that it most have fallen out of his pocket at some point. The trio ran into <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> in the woods, and he all but told them that his father was among the cloaked wizards. Malfoy also gave a nasty bit of advice to the trio regarding Hermione's blood status, saying that she would be safer out of the hooded figures' sight. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest?cb=20180420183844" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark.png" data-image-key="B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180420183844" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest?cb=20180420183844" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180420183844" decoding="async" width="240" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark.png" data-image-key="B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20180420183844" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The reappearance of the Dark Mark at the <a href="/wiki/1994_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="1994 Quidditch World Cup">1994 Quidditch World Cup</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Later, Harry learned that <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Barty Crouch Jnr</a> had stolen his wand from his pocket. While in a clearing in the woods, Harry, Ron, and Hermione heard someone shout the incantation <i><a href="/wiki/Morsmordre" title="Morsmordre">Morsmordre</a></i>, casting the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> — a green skull with a snake protruding from its mouth like a tongue — into the sky. Although Harry did not immediately recognise its significance, he soon learned that the Dark Mark had evil implications. Then, Barty Crouch Snr, Amos Diggory, and other <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> employees <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparated</a> into the clearing and began to question Harry, Ron, and Hermione about the Dark Mark. After Harry mentioned he had heard another voice conjure the Dark Mark, the Ministry employees searched the area and found the <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> <a href="/wiki/Winky" title="Winky">Winky</a> unconscious in the bushes. Since Harry's wand was found in Winky's hand, Mr Crouch fired her for bringing shame to his family.
</p>
<h5><span id="&quot;Mad-Eye&quot;_Moody"></span><span class="mw-headline" id=".22Mad-Eye.22_Moody">"Mad-Eye" Moody</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=42" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: &quot;Mad-Eye&quot; Moody">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=42" title="Edit section: &quot;Mad-Eye&quot; Moody"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Not pleasant. And there's no <a href="/wiki/Counter-curse" title="Counter-curse">counter-curse</a>. There's no blocking it. Only one known person has ever survived it, and he's sitting right in front of me</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry is the only known survivor of the Killing Curse<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>At the Hogwarts start-of-term feast, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a> announced that <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> would host the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, a recently revived inter-school competition in which the <a href="/wiki/Beauxbatons_Academy_of_Magic" title="Beauxbatons Academy of Magic">Beauxbatons Academy of Magic</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang Institute</a> would also participate. New rules stated that only students seventeen and older could compete, for safety reasons. Also, during the start of term feast, Dumbledore introduced <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">"Mad-Eye" Moody</a>, an ex-Auror, as the newly appointed <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor. This news was greeted with a mixture of responses, as Moody was known to be a great <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a>, a little crazy, and to have a magical eye, earning him the nickname "Mad-Eye" Moody.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000729" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C14M1 DADA Unforgivable Curses.png" data-image-key="B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000729" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000729" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000729" decoding="async" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C14M1 DADA Unforgivable Curses.png" data-image-key="B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000729" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson on the Unforgivable Curses</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the first lesson with Moody on a Thursday, he reveals tht he will only be staying for the year and decides to show the fourth-year Gryffindors the <a href="/wiki/Unforgivable_Curses" title="Unforgivable Curses">Unforgivable Curses</a>. Despite some fear amongst the students (especially Neville, who needs comfort from both the trio and Moody after the lesson; Moody later lends Neville a <a href="/wiki/Herbology" title="Herbology">Herbology</a> book to cheer him up), Moody shows the entire class the three curses using spiders as his test subjects: the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>, <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> . He also reveals the the use of these spells gain the user a one way ticket to Azkaban.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Goblet_of_Fire">The Goblet of Fire</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=43" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Goblet of Fire">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=43" title="Edit section: The Goblet of Fire"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I didn't put my name in that Goblet!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Yeah, okay.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Ron and the student body are sceptical of Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png/revision/latest?cb=20190326015217" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C16M1 Champions chosen v1.png" data-image-key="B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20190326015217" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png/revision/latest?cb=20190326015217" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20190326015217" decoding="async" width="251" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C16M1 Champions chosen v1.png" data-image-key="B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20190326015217" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C16M1_Champions_chosen_v1.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a> selects Harry as the unexpected fourth champion</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Around Hallowe'en, the students from Beauxbatons Academy of Magic and Durmstrang Institute arrived at the school. The arrival of famous international Quidditch Star Viktor Krum caused a lot of excitement, particularly among girls. <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> were all chosen to represent their respective schools in this tournament. However, Harry was mysteriously chosen as a fourth competitor. This came as a shock for all those present, due to the fact that he was under-age and that he never entered his name into the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a> during the selection process. Many people (even Ron and fellow <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindors</a>) did not believe Harry's story. They thought this to be nothing but another attempt to gain even more fame and eternal glory. This caused extreme tension between the two friends and they did not speak again for a long time. Ron started spending more time with <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a> and <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a>.
</p><p>Hermione on the other hand "<i>accepted his story without question</i>" and explains the reason behind Ron's recent actions toward Harry, stating that it steams from jealousy. She later assisted Harry in preparing for the Tournament by teaching him useful spells, such as the <a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Summoning Charm</a>. Harry used this charm in the first task of the Tournament. The champions were to face three dangerous challenges on their way to the Triwizard Cup. These challenges were in correspondence to the four elements. 
</p><p class="mw-empty-elt"></p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 298px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry-potter-goblet-rita%2C_harry%2C_and_hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718195422" class="image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-rita, harry, and hermione.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="296" height="123" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-rita, harry, and hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-rita,_harry,_and_hermione.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry-potter-goblet-rita%2C_harry%2C_and_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/296?cb=20170718195422" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry-potter-goblet-rita%2C_harry%2C_and_hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718195422" class="image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-rita, harry, and hermione.jpg" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry-potter-goblet-rita%2C_harry%2C_and_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/296?cb=20170718195422" decoding="async" width="296" height="123" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-rita, harry, and hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-rita,_harry,_and_hermione.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry-potter-goblet-rita%2C_harry%2C_and_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/296?cb=20170718195422" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-goblet-rita,_harry,_and_hermione.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p class="mw-empty-elt"></p><p>A few days after his name unexpectedly came out of the Goblet. Harry attended the <a href="/wiki/Wand_weighing_ceremony" title="Wand weighing ceremony">wand weighing ceremony</a>, where his wand was inspected. After examining the other champion's wands, Ollivander examines Harry's and deems it in perfect condition. After the champions and judges go through a long photoshoot, Harry goes to dinner and then returns to <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Gryffindor Tower</a>. Onnce in the tower Ron tells him that he has an owl and that their detention starts later. The letter is from Sirius telling Harry he will contact him on 22 November at 1:00 a.m. Harry must be alone at the fireplace in the Gryffindor common room at that time. There the notorious <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> reporter <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> asked him many leading questions, took everything he said out of context, and wrote a ludicrous article about him and Hermione.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png/revision/latest?cb=20161211010749" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C18M1 Densaugeo and Furnunculus.png" data-image-key="B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161211010749" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png/revision/latest?cb=20161211010749" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161211010749" decoding="async" width="245" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C18M1 Densaugeo and Furnunculus.png" data-image-key="B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20161211010749" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C18M1_Densaugeo_and_Furnunculus.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The result of <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco</a> and Harry's duel outside of Potions Class, after having teased Harry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>This article was titled "<i>HARRY POTTER'S SECRET HEARTACHE</i>". The piece claimed that Hermione was Harry's girlfriend and that she was toying him around by seeking the affections of <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, who himself was very much smitten with her. Harry faced even more turmoil during this time, as the majority of the student body was making everyday life difficult for him. <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuff</a> belived that Harry was stealing spotlight from their house and Draco Malfoy was doing everything in his power to make Harry even more miserable. He accomplished this by making and mass producing "POTTER STINKS" badges, which many students proceeded to wear around. Malfoy had also taking to commenting and reading aloud Rita Skeeter's articles every chance he got, making Harry very uncomfortable. 
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_First_Task">The First Task</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=44" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The First Task">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=44" title="Edit section: The First Task"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Ludo Bagman</b>: "<i>Look at that! Will you look at that! Our youngest champion is quickest to get his <a href="/wiki/Golden_egg" title="Golden egg">egg</a>! Well, this is going to shorten the odds on Mr Potter!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>McGonagall</b>: "<i>That was excellent, Potter!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry takes the lead in the Tournament after the First Task<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>In the first task, each champion needed to get past a <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragon</a> in order to collect a <a href="/wiki/Golden_egg" title="Golden egg">golden egg</a>. Harry received help from <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, who showed the dragons to him and Madam Maxime. Realising that every champion but Cedric had found out about the dragons, Harry told Cedric about the first task. He did this as a way of levelling the playing field. The newly appointed Defence Against the Dark Arts professor, Alastor Moody, witnessed Harry telling Cedric but did not report him. Instead he advised Harry to play to his strengths, hinting that he should use his <a href="/wiki/Flight" title="Flight">flying</a> ability to get the golden egg.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208133543" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Horntail – first task.png" data-image-key="Horntail_–_first_task.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133543" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208133543" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133543" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Horntail – first task.png" data-image-key="Horntail_–_first_task.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133543" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry faces a <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_Horntail" title="Hungarian Horntail">Hungarian Horntail</a> in the first task of the Triwizard Tournament</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Four different dragons were chosen for each of the champions to face. On <a href="/wiki/24_November" title="24 November">24 November</a>, Fleur ended up with the <a href="/wiki/Common_Welsh_Green" title="Common Welsh Green">Common Welsh Green</a>, Cedric with the <a href="/wiki/Swedish_Short-Snout" title="Swedish Short-Snout">Swedish Short-Snout</a>, Viktor Krum with the <a href="/wiki/Chinese_Fireball" title="Chinese Fireball">Chinese Fireball</a>, and Harry faced the Hungarian Horntail (the most dangerous of the four). Harry used a Summoning Charm to bring him his Firebolt and dodged the Hungarian Horntail to get the golden egg. Harry escaped the dangerous task with a mild cut to the arm, due to being grazed by one of the Horntail's spikes. He also proved to be the fastest when it came to capturing his egg, which earned him a compliment from Professor McGonagall. He and Viktor Krum tied for first at the end of the task. After seeing how dangerous the task was, Ron decided that Harry did not put his own name in the Goblet. He made amends with Harry.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Yule_Ball">Yule Ball</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=45" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Yule Ball">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=45" title="Edit section: Yule Ball"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Dance partners? I don't dance.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>McGonagall</b>: "<i>Oh yes, you do. That's what I'm telling you. Traditionally, the champions and their partners open the ball.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The unexpected task of finding a date<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Between the first and second tasks, the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a>, a Triwizard Tournament tradition took place on Christmas. <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, dismayed to discover that Viktor Krum had asked Hermione to go with him, called her out for "<i>consorting with the enemy</i>", though he and Hermione acted as if they had not fought the following day. Harry asked his long-time crush <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a> to attend the Yule Ball with him, but was disappointed to learn that she had already accepted an invitation from Cedric Diggory, a fellow champion. Harry and Ron ended up attending with Parvati and <a href="/wiki/Padma_Patil" title="Padma Patil">Padma Patil</a>, respectively.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Yule_ball_dance.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180322033519" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="111" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Yule ball dance.JPG" data-image-key="Yule_ball_dance.JPG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Yule_ball_dance.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180322033519" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Yule_ball_dance.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180322033519" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Yule_ball_dance.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180322033519" decoding="async" width="245" height="111" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Yule ball dance.JPG" data-image-key="Yule_ball_dance.JPG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Yule_ball_dance.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20180322033519" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Yule_ball_dance.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Parvati dancing at the Yule Ball on Christmas Day</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While at the ball both Harry and Ron ended up neglecting their dates. Harry watched Cho with Cedric and Ron was overcome with jealousy for Viktor Krum, who danced with Hermione. After the Yule Ball, Rita Skeeter struck again. She had overheard Hagrid telling <a href="/wiki/Olympe_Maxime" title="Olympe Maxime">Madame Maxime</a> about his family and his heritage. She then wrote an article exposing Hagrid as a <a href="/wiki/Half-giant" title="Half-giant">half-giant</a>, and he was so ashamed that he stopped teaching and stopped coming to meals in the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>. Dumbledore tried to bring him around by visiting his hut, but to no avail. Only after Harry, Ron, and Hermione proved that they still liked and that it did not matter to them that he was half-giant did he finally return to his post.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Harry_Prefect%27s_bathroom_1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090430172153" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Prefect&#39;s bathroom 1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Prefect&#39;s_bathroom_1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Harry_Prefect%27s_bathroom_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20090430172153" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Harry_Prefect%27s_bathroom_1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090430172153" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Harry_Prefect%27s_bathroom_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20090430172153" decoding="async" width="245" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Prefect&#39;s bathroom 1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Prefect&#39;s_bathroom_1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Harry_Prefect%27s_bathroom_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20090430172153" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Prefect%27s_bathroom_1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the prefect's bathroom working out the clue of the <a href="/wiki/Golden_egg" title="Golden egg">Golden egg</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>To prepare for the second task, Harry was told that he had to open the egg he had won from the dragon, but every time he did, it let out a horrifying screech. His rescue from that particular problem came when Cedric Diggory paid him back with the information that he would figure it out if he were to "<i>mull things over in the hot water</i>" with the egg. Harry reluctantly followed this advice and decided to take a bath in the <a href="/wiki/Prefects%27_bathroom" class="mw-redirect" title="Prefects&#39; bathroom">prefects' bathroom</a>. He had an uncomfortable exchange with <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Moaning Myrtle</a>, and on the way back to the common room, he ran into Professors <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> and Moody. The latter informed Harry of <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Senior" title="Bartemius Crouch Senior">Barty Crouch Snr</a>'s obsession with catching <a href="/wiki/Dark_Wizard" title="Dark Wizard">Dark Wizards</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Second_Task">The Second Task</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=46" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Second Task">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=46" title="Edit section: The Second Task"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Harry Potter used Gillyweed to great effect. He returned last, and well outside the time limit of an hour. However, the Merchieftainess informs us that Mr Potter was first to reach the hostages, and that the delay in his return was due to his determination to return all hostages to safety, not merely his own. Most of the judges' feel that this shows moral fibre and merits full marks.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry's performance in the Second Task<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cc/B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208133932" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C26M1 Great Lake Merpeople second task.png" data-image-key="B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cc/B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133932" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cc/B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208133932" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cc/B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133932" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C26M1 Great Lake Merpeople second task.png" data-image-key="B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cc/B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133932" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C26M1_Great_Lake_Merpeople_second_task.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry meets the Merpeople colony in the <a href="/wiki/Great_Lake" title="Great Lake">Black Lake</a> during the second task</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry learned that the second task was going into the Black Lake to rescue "<i>the thing they would miss most</i>" from the <a href="/wiki/Merpeople" title="Merpeople">merpeople</a>. Harry's new problem was how he was going to survive underwater for an hour. He got his answer in the form of <a href="/wiki/Gillyweed" title="Gillyweed">gillyweed</a> from <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>, who had come to work at Hogwarts. The second task took place on <a href="/wiki/24_February" title="24 February">24 February</a>. Harry was able to save Ron, but when he reached him he was shocked to find Hermione, Cho, and <a href="/wiki/Gabrielle_Delacour" title="Gabrielle Delacour">Gabrielle Delacour</a> (Fleur's sister), there as well. After the other hostages were rescued, Harry hung around and saved Gabrielle, as well as Ron. The judges were then informed that Harry reached to hostages first. He was outside the hour that had been allotted, although doing so earned him extra points for "moral fibre". After the second task had finished, Harry and Cedric were tied for first, Viktor was in second, and Fleur was in last place.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png/revision/latest?cb=20160529234830" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C27M1 fugitives in the cave near Hogsmeade.png" data-image-key="B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160529234830" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png/revision/latest?cb=20160529234830" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160529234830" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C27M1 fugitives in the cave near Hogsmeade.png" data-image-key="B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160529234830" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C27M1_fugitives_in_the_cave_near_Hogsmeade.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio visiting Sirius in the cave in which he's hiding</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After Harry was mysteriously entered in the Triwizard Tournament, Sirius hid in a cave near <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>, where Harry, Ron, and Hermione occasionally visited him, and provided mostly moral support to Harry during this time. Sirius warned him about <a href="/wiki/Igor_Karkaroff" title="Igor Karkaroff">Igor Karkaroff</a>, the Durmstrang headmaster, telling Harry that Karkaroff used to be a Death Eater and that he gave up a considerable number of names in exchange for his freedom. Harry told Sirius about seeing the name "Bartemius Crouch" appear on the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a> when he was working on the second clue. Sirius admitted that it was fishy, but told Harry to focus on the task at hand and leave the mystery surrounding Crouch to others.
</p><p>A month before the final task, the Champions were shown the beginnings of the challenge. Harry and Cedric both expressed horror at the sight of the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_pitch" title="Quidditch pitch">Quidditch pitch</a> being turned into the hedge maze, put were quickly reassured by <a href="/wiki/Ludovic_Bagman" title="Ludovic Bagman">Bagman</a> that it would be put right after the Tournament. They were told the third and final task was going into a maze filled with obstacles to find the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Cup" title="Triwizard Cup">Triwizard Cup</a>. On the way back to the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Castle" title="Hogwarts Castle">castle</a>, Krum took Harry aside to ask him something. Thinking that this was something important, Harry went with him.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424053809" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C28M1 Hermione opening hate mails.jpg" data-image-key="B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180424053809" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424053809" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180424053809" decoding="async" width="251" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C28M1 Hermione opening hate mails.jpg" data-image-key="B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180424053809" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione receives hate mail from in response to Skeeter's article about her and Harry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Krum then asked Harry about his relationship with Hermione, in whom Krum was deeply interested. Harry told him that there was nothing between him and Hermione and that she was just a friend. He also told Krum not to believe anything <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>, who had recently written in <i><a href="/wiki/Witch_Weekly" title="Witch Weekly">Witch Weekly</a></i> that there was a Harry-Hermione-Krum love triangle, wrote about him. This supposed love triangle also led to Hermione receiving numerous amounts of hate mail. At that moment, Barty Crouch Snr appeared in the forest disoriented and asking for Dumbledore. He disappeared when Harry went to fetch Dumbledore.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Dream_and_the_Pensieve">The Dream and the Pensieve</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=47" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Dream and the Pensieve">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=47" title="Edit section: The Dream and the Pensieve"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>I have a theory, no more then that... It is my belief that your scar hurts both when Lord Voldemort is near you, and when he is feeling a particularity strong surge of hatred.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>But... why?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Because you and he re connected by the curse that failed. That is no ordinary scar.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The reason behind Harry's vivid dreams<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180317043353" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire Pensieve.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180317043353" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180317043353" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180317043353" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire Pensieve.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180317043353" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire_Pensieve.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry prepares to enter Dumbledore's Pensieve, without permission</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During a <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a> lesson, Harry passed out and had a vision of Voldemort being informed of someone's death and him torturing <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Wormtail</a> for failing to prevent someone from escaping. Harry awoke with his scar badly hurting and pretended he needed to go to the hospital wing, he actually went to see <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>. Once in the headmaster's office, Harry overheard an argument between Dumbledore, <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Moody</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>, regarding the Barty Crouch situation: Fudge refused to believe the words that Crouch said about <a href="/wiki/Bertha_Jorkins" title="Bertha Jorkins">Bertha Jorkins</a> being dead and, while debating what had happened to Crouch, Fudge suggested that <a href="/wiki/Olympe_Maxime" title="Olympe Maxime">Madame Maxime</a> was the likely culprit given her half-giant physiology. Dumbledore then accused the Minister of acting on personal prejudice, which he ignored due to Dumbledore's friendship with <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>. Moody interrupted the debate to explain that Harry had arrived.
</p>
