<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000102" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C30M1 Wizengamot trial Pensieve memory.png" data-image-key="B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000102" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000102" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000102" decoding="async" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C30M1 Wizengamot trial Pensieve memory.png" data-image-key="B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000102" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry witnessing the trial of the Lestranges and Barty Crouch Jnr, through the pensieve</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was left alone in the office after Dumbledore, Fudge, and Moody left to examine the school grounds. While looking around, Harry noticed Dumbledore's <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">Pensieve</a>. Through curiosity, Harry peered in and ended up looking into three of Dumbledore's memories, from the days immediately after the end of the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a>. The first was the trial of <a href="/wiki/Igor_Karkaroff" title="Igor Karkaroff">Igor Karkaroff</a>, in which he renounced his support of the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> and gave the names of existing Death Eaters, including Snape. Dumbledore (in the memory) stated that Snape had defected the Death Eaters and was a spy against Voldemort and no longer a threat. The second memory showed the trial of <a href="/wiki/Ludovic_Bagman" title="Ludovic Bagman">Ludo Bagman</a>, who was accused of passing information to Voldemort, but his popularity quickly cleared him. The third was the trial of the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_family" title="Lestrange family">Lestranges</a> (<a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rodolphus_Lestrange" title="Rodolphus Lestrange">Rodolphus</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Rabastan_Lestrange" title="Rabastan Lestrange">Rabastan</a>) and Crouch's son, for the use of the Cruciatus Curse on <a href="/wiki/Alice_Longbottom" title="Alice Longbottom">Alice</a> and <a href="/wiki/Frank_Longbottom" title="Frank Longbottom">Frank Longbottom</a>. Crouch sentenced them all to a lifetime in Azkaban.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Third_Task">The Third Task</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=48" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Third Task">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=48" title="Edit section: The Third Task"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Harry was practising hexes at every available moment. He felt more confident about this task than either of the others. Difficult and dangerous though it would undoubtedly be, Moody was right: Harry had managed to find his way past monstrous creatures and enchanted barriers before now, and this time he had some notice, some chance to prepare himself for what lay ahead, </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Preparation for the Third Task<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>To prepare for the final task, Harry, Ron, and Hermione used vacant classrooms to practise spells and jinxes. In <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a> class between two of these study periods, Harry dozed off dreaming about Voldemort and left the classroom in a disturbing fashion. Rita Skeeter had witnessed this event and she wrote, on <a href="/wiki/24_June" title="24 June">24 June</a>, <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, the day of the final task, that Harry was "<i>disturbed and dangerous</i>". This did nothing to boost Harry's morale, but when he spent the day with <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a>, they cheered him up. They also came to watch the final task as his substitute family.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161211055105" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry during the maze task.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211055105" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161211055105" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211055105" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry during the maze task.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161211055105" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_during_the_maze_task.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the hedge maze with an <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperiused</a> Viktor Krum</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry successfully navigates the maze with the aid of the Four-Point Spell. He gets past both a Blast-Ended-Skrewt and a <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">Boggart</a> disguised as a <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementor</a>. Along the way, he hears Fleur scream. Harry rescues Cedric, who has been attacked by a cursed Krum; Harry manages to stun Krum and sends out a signal for Krum to be rescued before he and Cedric move on. Harry manages to pass a <a href="/wiki/Sphinx" title="Sphinx">sphinx</a>
</p><p>During this final event, Harry saved Cedric from a <a href="/wiki/Acromantula" title="Acromantula">Acromantula</a> and Cedric being grateful offered Harry the cup. Both Hogwarts champions then showed supreme sportsmanship and cooperation despite the tension brought on by the maze. They agreed to touch the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Cup" title="Triwizard Cup">Triwizard Cup</a> simultaneously, as it would be a Hogwarts victory either way, which would result in tie for first place. Harry and Cedric were unaware that the cup was actually a <a href="/wiki/Portkey" title="Portkey">portkey</a> and were transported to the graveyard in <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Rebirth_of_Lord_Voldemort">Rebirth of Lord Voldemort</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=49" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Rebirth of Lord Voldemort">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=49" title="Edit section: Rebirth of Lord Voldemort"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">Return of Lord Voldemort</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>He knew one thing only, and it was beyond fear or reason: He was not going to die crouching here like a child playing hide-and-seek; he was not going to die kneeling at Voldemort’s feet... he was going to die upright like his father, and he was going to die trying to defend himself, even if no defence was possible....</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry stands his ground against Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/Cedric%27s_Death.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120825164555" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Cedric&#39;s Death.gif" data-image-key="Cedric&#39;s_Death.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/Cedric%27s_Death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120825164555" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/Cedric%27s_Death.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120825164555" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/Cedric%27s_Death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120825164555" decoding="async" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Cedric&#39;s Death.gif" data-image-key="Cedric&#39;s_Death.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/Cedric%27s_Death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120825164555" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Cedric%27s_Death.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Cedric's murder at the hands of Peter Pettigrew and Lord Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>This graveyard was the Riddle family's final resting place, where <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> was waiting. Just as Harry and Cedric are trying to figure out what happened, someone appears and Harry's scar begins hurting again. Acting on Voldemort's orders, his servant <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Wormtail</a> murdered Cedric with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>. Harry saw a flash of green light and heard Cedric's body hit the graveyard's ground with a thud. Harry is then dragged to a large marble tombstone, with the name Tom Riddle engraved upon were he is bound. From there he was forced to witness a ritual in which Pettigrew used some of Harry's blood to <a href="/wiki/Rebirth_of_Lord_Voldemort" class="mw-redirect" title="Rebirth of Lord Voldemort">restore Voldemort's body</a>. The <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> were summoned to the cemetery.
</p><p>After his Death Eaters arrived, Voldemort spends time criticising them for failing to seek him out during these last thirteen years, even though they knew that he had found a way to escape mortal death. He then rewards Wormtail for aiding with his rebirth by creating a new silver hand for him. The Dark Lord identifies more Death Eaters and reveals that this servant who is at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> has ensured that Harry would win the tournament and be brought to the graveyard. Voldemort then frees the injured and weakened Harry and orders him to face him in a <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duel</a>, wishing to prove who among the two is stronger in front of his minions now that there is no one around to protect Harry.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190324225041" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="142" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Duel graveyard.gif" data-image-key="Duel_graveyard.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190324225041" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190324225041" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190324225041" decoding="async" width="250" height="142" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Duel graveyard.gif" data-image-key="Duel_graveyard.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190324225041" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Duel_graveyard.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry duels Voldemort in a battle of wills, triggering the effect of <i><a href="/wiki/Reverse_Spell" title="Reverse Spell">Priori Incantatem</a></i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort then tortured him by subjecting him to the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> and used the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>, but when it didn't work he tried to murder Harry using the Killing Curse. Harry fired back with the Disarming Charm. The nature of their wands' mystical connection caused their magical streams to interlock, which created an effect called <i>Priori Incantatem</i> (Reverse Spell effect). Harry and Voldemort then engaged in a battle of will. After Harry was momentarily shielded by the echoes of Lord Voldemort's previous victims, including Harry's parents and Cedric. Cedric's echo asked Harry to return his body to his parents. This bought Harry some time to grab Cedric's body and the <a href="/wiki/Portkey" title="Portkey">Portkey</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Exposure_of_Barty_Crouch_Jr">Exposure of Barty Crouch Jr</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=50" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Exposure of Barty Crouch Jr">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=50" title="Edit section: Exposure of Barty Crouch Jr"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>You're mad!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Barty Crouch Jnr</b>: "<i>Mad, am I? We'll see! We'll see who's mad, now that the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Wizard" title="Dark Wizard">Dark Lord</a> has returned, with me at his side! He is back, Harry Potter, you did not conquer him — and now — I conquer you!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Barty Crouch Jnr before trying to murder Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Chaos erupted when Harry returned to Hogwarts with Cedric's dead body in tow. It was uncovered that Barty Crouch Jnr, who had willingly taken the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> as a young man, was throughout the school year disguised as Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher Alastor Moody. Crouch (disguised as Moody) managed to usher Harry away from the panicking crowd to interrogate him about Voldemort's return. He wanted to murder Harry, but Albus Dumbledore and several other members of the Hogwarts staff arrived to stop him. Under the influence of <a href="/wiki/Veritaserum" title="Veritaserum">Veritaserum</a>, Crouch confessed everything.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest?cb=20180423221722" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal.png" data-image-key="B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423221722" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest?cb=20180423221722" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423221722" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal.png" data-image-key="B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423221722" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Minister for Magic visiting Harry in the hospital wing</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In a terrible turn of fate Crouch's soul was destroyed by the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a>, from the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementor</a> that accompanied <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>. Fudge felt that his personal safety was in jeopardy, hince why he brought the Dementor. As a result, Crouch Jnr could not give testimony and the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> began to dispute Harry's and Dumbledore's insistence that Voldemort had returned. The Minister refused to believe Harry's account of Voldemort's return, even when he was supported by Albus Dumbledore. This was due to Fudge not wanting the peace and tranquillity they worked so hard for to be destabilised by this announcement. The Ministry publicly denied the Dark Lord's return and branded Harry and Dumbledore either liars or nutters in the press. Voldemort and his Death Eaters took advantage of this to operate in secret, while Dumbledore called for a reconstitution of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fifth_year">Fifth year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=51" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Fifth year">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=51" title="Edit section: Fifth year"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Molly Weasley</b>: "<i>Watch me. You’ve given Harry plenty of information. Any more and you might just as well induct him into the Order straightaway.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Why not? I’ll join, I want to join, I want to fight —</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry's willingness to fight Voldemort and his followers<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420213240" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420213240" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with others in <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> preparing to clean</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Witnessing <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a>'s murder was very difficult for Harry, and it was not helpful that he was forced back to number <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> in the school holidays. He suffered constant nightmares and flashbacks. Also his friends, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ronald Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> seemed to block him from information and he was blocked entirely from the wizarding world except for the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> that said that Harry was wrong. To make things worse than they were already, on <a href="/wiki/2_August" title="2 August">2 August</a> someone (Dolores Umbridge) sent <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> to attack Harry in the Muggle town of <a href="/wiki/Little_Whinging" title="Little Whinging">Little Whinging</a>, in an attempt to neutralise him. He was forced to perform a <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a> in order to save Dudley and himself.
</p><p>After Harry explains to the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> about the Dementor's abilities, Vernon blames Harry and is ready to throw Harry out. He had always yearned to do so since the family received Harry, when Petunia receives a <a href="/wiki/Howler" title="Howler">Howler</a>. Before she has an opportunity to open the letter, it bursts into flames and a menacing voice says, "<i>Remember my last, Petunia</i>". Petunia then immediately convinces her husband to let Harry remain at Privet Drive and tells him that he needs to stay in his room. Harry having no idea of what's going on retreats to his room and proceeds to stay there.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Hearing">Hearing</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=52" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Hearing">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=52" title="Edit section: Hearing"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Disciplinary_hearing_of_Harry_Potter" title="Disciplinary hearing of Harry Potter">Disciplinary hearing of Harry Potter</a></i></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 182px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/1995_hearing.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160607171542" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="180" height="149" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="1995 hearing.jpg" data-image-key="1995_hearing.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/1995_hearing.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20160607171542" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/1995_hearing.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160607171542" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/1995_hearing.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20160607171542" decoding="async" width="180" height="149" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="1995 hearing.jpg" data-image-key="1995_hearing.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/1995_hearing.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20160607171542" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:1995_hearing.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's Hearing for underage magic</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure></dd></dl>
<p>Subsequently, Harry was formally accused of performing underage magic in the presence of a Muggle and was expelled, but thanks to Albus Dumbledore's intervention, this was changed to a <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_disciplinary_hearing" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter&#39;s disciplinary hearing">disciplinary hearing</a> in front of the entire <a href="/wiki/Wizengamot" title="Wizengamot">Wizengamot</a> at the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> on 12 August. In a further attempt to discredit Harry, the Ministry changed the time and location of the hearing at the last minute, but Harry was able to make it there just minutes late. He was threatened with expulsion from Hogwarts, but was exonerated with help from Dumbledore, who had a witness and legal loopholes to help him.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Dolores_Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=53" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Dolores Umbridge">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=53" title="Edit section: Dolores Umbridge"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Pheonix">"<i>He let out a gasp of pain. The words had appeared on the parchment in what appeared to be shining red ink. At the same time, the words had appeared on the back of Harry's right hand, cut into his skin as though traced there by a scalpel — yet even as he stared at the shining cut, the skin healed over again, leaving the place where it had been slightly redder than before but quite smooth...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry experiences the Black Quill for the first time<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Pheonix" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Pheonix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160606154912" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Umbridge teaching.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge_teaching.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160606154912" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160606154912" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160606154912" decoding="async" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Umbridge teaching.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge_teaching.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160606154912" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Umbridge_teaching.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Umbridge teaching a purely theoretical DADA lesson</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In retaliation against Dumbledore, <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> appointed <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>, his Senior Under-Secretary, as the new Hogwarts Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher so that she could spy on the school. She was later appointed <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_High_Inquisitor" title="Hogwarts High Inquisitor">Hogwarts High Inquisitor</a>, empowered to arbitrarily change and impose school rules whenever she chose. She made numerous rules that the students were expected to follow and if they did not harsh punishments would be enacted. Umbridge proved to be sadistic and cruel, with a personality that resembled poisioned honey.
</p><p>Harry hated her on sight and she had a deep dislike for him as well. This dislike bordered on hatred and came about because of her inability to control him. Every time Harry spoke out of turn or even mentioned Voldemort, Umbridge threw him into detention. The detentions he had with her were torturous, forcing him to write with a Black Quill. The Black Quill was of her own invention and it made him write with his own blood, scribed the message "<i>I must not tell lies</i>" onto the back of his hand. Harry had to endure numerous sessions with the quill, so many that the words are now permanently carved into his hand. These detentions however did not sway him from his opinions or make him subservient to Umbridge. They had the opposite effect and strengthen his resolve to stand by his statements of <a href="/wiki/Voldemort%27s_return" class="mw-redirect" title="Voldemort&#39;s return">Voldemort's return</a> .
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Detention_with_Dolores.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180115213425" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="111" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Detention with Dolores.jpg" data-image-key="Detention_with_Dolores.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Detention_with_Dolores.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180115213425" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Detention_with_Dolores.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180115213425" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Detention_with_Dolores.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180115213425" decoding="async" width="250" height="111" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Detention with Dolores.jpg" data-image-key="Detention_with_Dolores.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Detention_with_Dolores.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180115213425" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Detention_with_Dolores.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in detention with Umbridge, being forced to use a <a href="/wiki/Black_Quill" title="Black Quill">Black Quill</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, Umbridge presumed the message had failed to sink in, as Harry spread the word through <i><a href="/wiki/The_Quibbler" title="The Quibbler">The Quibbler</a></i> about the previous year's events, and thus he was banned from any more <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> visits. Also once Umbridge found out that he gave <i>The Quibbler</i> an exclusive interview she banned the magazine, which caused the whole student body to take an interest in it. Later in the year Ron was chosen to be a <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a>, not him. This surprised everyone, as they all believed that Harry would have gotten the badge instead of Ron. It was later revealed that Ron was chosen instead of Harry because <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> thought that Harry had "<i>enough responsibility to be going on with</i>". Harry's jealousy threatened to affect his friendship with Ron, but he felt better when he discovered that his father was also not chosen as a prefect at school. This suggests that Harry's desire in becoming prefect was to emulate his father, who was <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy_or_Girl" title="Head Boy or Girl">Head Boy</a> in his day, not to inflate a sense of his own importance.
</p>
<h5><span id="Dumbledore's_Army"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Dumbledore.27s_Army">Dumbledore's Army</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=54" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Dumbledore&#039;s Army">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=54" title="Edit section: Dumbledore&#039;s Army"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Pheonix"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>No, I agree, we’ve gone past the stage where we can just learn things out of books. We need a teacher, a proper one, who can show us how to use the spells and correct us if we’re going wrong.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>...Who, then?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Isn’t it obvious? I’m talking about </i>you<i>, Harry.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Hermione convincing Harry to teach the legal study group<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Pheonix" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Pheonix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>Because Fudge was raked with paranoia and stubbornly believed that Dumbledore was training an army to overthrow him, Umbridge had the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> class reduced to reading textbooks. This proved an ineffective teaching method and did nothing to prepare students for what was to come. Hermione proposed the idea that Harry teach the students, as he has previous experience defending himself against the Dark Arts and various monsters.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/B5C16M1.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424013714" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C16M1.png" data-image-key="B5C16M1.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/B5C16M1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424013714" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/B5C16M1.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424013714" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/B5C16M1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424013714" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C16M1.png" data-image-key="B5C16M1.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/B5C16M1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424013714" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C16M1.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The meeting of students in the Hog's Head that would become known as Dumbledore's Army</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio held a meeting at the Hog's Head to discuss with other students the possibility of Harry giving them Defence lessons. Harry is stunned at how many there are various <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindors</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaws</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuffs</a> show up. Although he harboured the suspicion that a few, such as <a href="/wiki/Zacharias_Smith" title="Zacharias Smith">Zacharias Smith</a>, only wanted to hear about the night Cedric Diggory was murdered. After some initial scepticism, the students started to list Harry's achievements: the rescue of the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> from a disembodied Voldemort, slaying of Slytherin's <a href="/wiki/Basilisk" title="Basilisk">basilisk</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> with the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a>, ability to produce a corporeal Patronus, and winning of the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore&#39;s Army learning Expelliarmus.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore&#39;s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140609152402" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140609152402" decoding="async" width="240" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore&#39;s Army learning Expelliarmus.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore&#39;s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140609152402" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry instructs <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> and others during a D.A. meeting</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Giving into Hermione's persistent urgings Harry secretly trained a group of students in practical defensive magic. In an attempt to make light of the Ministry's fears the group called themselves <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> (or the D.A.). Aware that arranging meetings and passing the word about them verbally was not a secure method of communication, Hermione bewitched several coins with a <a href="/wiki/Protean_Charm" title="Protean Charm">Protean Charm</a> one for each member of the D.A. When activated by Harry, the numbers on each coin would change to inform the bearer of the time and date of the next meeting. Feeling highly anxious and frustrated most of the time Harry found that the D.A. was now his chief source of happiness, and the thing to which he looked forward throughout his school day. This happiness was felt by most members, as all of them (particularly Neville and the <a href="/wiki/Creevey_family" title="Creevey family">Creevey</a> brothers) gained a lot of skills under Harry's tutelage.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20201109220922" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C27M1 Harry Teaching Dumbledores Army Patronus Spell.jpg" data-image-key="B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201109220922" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20201109220922" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201109220922" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C27M1 Harry Teaching Dumbledores Army Patronus Spell.jpg" data-image-key="B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201109220922" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C27M1_Harry_Teaching_Dumbledores_Army_Patronus_Spell.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry teaching the members of the D.A. the Patronus Charm</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry taught the group many different spells, ranking from the simplistic <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Disarming Charm</a> to the highly advanced Patronus Charm. The class progressed at a fair rate, practising the: <a href="/wiki/Impediment_Jinx" title="Impediment Jinx">Impediment Jinx</a>, <a href="/wiki/Reductor_Curse" title="Reductor Curse">Reductor Curse</a>, <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">Stunning Spell</a>, and various other hexes and jinxes before temporarily breaking up for Christmas break. Lessons continued during the early months of 1996, The class mastered the <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a>, and began to work on the Patronus Charm. Some members were even able to produe corporeal Patronuses, Harry thought this might have been due to the lack of <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> present, as there was nothing to make the students scared.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Occlumency">Occlumency</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=55" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Occlumency">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=55" title="Edit section: Occlumency"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>The <a href="/wiki/Headmaster" title="Headmaster">headmaster</a> has sent me to tell you, Potter, that it is his wish for you to study Occlumency this term.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Study what?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>Occlumency, Potter. The magical defence of the mind against external penetration. An obscure branch of magic, but a highly useful one.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry's mandatory extra lessons with Snape<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180215143749" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry and Cho kiss.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180215143749" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180215143749" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180215143749" decoding="async" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry and Cho kiss.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180215143749" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Cho_kiss.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Cho kiss for the first time underneath <a href="/wiki/Mistletoe" title="Mistletoe">mistletoe</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a> also became a member. During the meetings whenever Harry was near, she would become so flustered that she had difficulty casting spells correctly. Before the <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> holidays, she and Harry were discussing how she had never been able to pull of the Stunning Spell before, when the room generated mistletoe. The room did this due to sensing the tension that was present. Under the mistletoe, the two kissed for the first time. This moment was confusing to Harry, as Cho, clearly still suffering from her ex-boyfriend's death, had been crying during their kiss. Cho's crying during the kiss also caused concern in Harry. Harry later informed Hermione and Ron of his disastrous first kiss and Hermione comforted him saying that it was not his kissing that made Cho cry.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161121214826" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg" data-image-key="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161121214826" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161121214826" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161121214826" decoding="async" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg" data-image-key="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161121214826" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-8309.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's first Occlumency lesson with Snape</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, Harry took on some much more pressing worries later that night. <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, wanting a "secret weapon" against him, had heard of a <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_first_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s first prophecy">prophecy</a> hidden in the Ministry's <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a> concerning both of them. Voldemort had been obsessing over the door to the <a href="/wiki/Hall_of_Prophecy" title="Hall of Prophecy">Hall of Prophecy</a> for the past few months, and had been inadvertently allowing Harry to read his thoughts through <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimency</a>. The link between Harry and Voldemort's minds had been growing stronger for quite a while. As a result, after falling asleep on the night of his kiss with Cho, Harry witnessed <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> <a href="/wiki/Attack_on_Arthur_Weasley" title="Attack on Arthur Weasley">attack</a> Arthur Weasley in his dream, and felt almost as if he had been the snake. Realising what could happen if the link grew more powerful, Dumbledore commissioned Snape to train Harry in Occlumency in an effort to prevent further problems.
</p><p>Critically injured, Arthur was taken to <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo&#39;s Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries</a>. Harry, Ron, Ginny, Fred, and George took a portkey to Grimmauld Place. When they arrive at headquarters, they were greeted by Sirius, who ordered them to stay put and wait for news. Mrs Weasley stated that Arthur survived the attack and was grateful towards Harry. Even though Arthur survived, he was required to take a <a href="/wiki/Blood-Replenishing_Potion" title="Blood-Replenishing Potion">Blood-Replenishing Potion</a> at regular intervals. Mr Weasley also shared the ward with a man who had been bitten by a <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a> and a woman with a massive chunk out of her leg who refused to tell the <a href="/wiki/Healer" title="Healer">Healers</a> what had bitten her, arousing suspicions she had been handling something illegal.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest?cb=20151217020301" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C23M1 Christmas at St Mungo&#39;s.png" data-image-key="B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo&#39;s.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151217020301" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest?cb=20151217020301" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151217020301" decoding="async" width="245" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C23M1 Christmas at St Mungo&#39;s.png" data-image-key="B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo&#39;s.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151217020301" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio and Ginny see Lockhart in the <a href="/wiki/Janus_Thickey_Ward" title="Janus Thickey Ward">Janus Thickey Ward</a> for spell damage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione joined Harry and the Weasleys at Grimmauld Place for Christmas, and <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy</a> sent back his Weasley jumper, which made his mother cry. Hermione, Ron and Ginny discovered that Neville's parents were insane and living at St Mungo's. They were informed of this by Neville's grandmother, who made it known that Frank and Alice were tortured by Death Eaters for information regarding Voldemort. They also saw their former <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a>. Also Harry finally admitted that he knew what happened to Neville's parents.
</p><p>Unfortunately, Harry did not enjoy having his mind peered into and did not focus on using Occlumency, having indeed been extremely curious about the door himself. During a lesson in Occlumency, Snape stepped out of the room, and Harry's curiosity got the best of him. He looked into the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve" class="mw-redirect" title="Albus Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve">pensieve</a>, which contained Snape's memories, and, to his dismay, Harry found images of his father bullying Snape and of his mother rushing to his defence. Harry found himself siding with his mother, agreeing that James' treatment of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> was wrong and it bordered on being almost cruel.<sup id="cite_ref-80" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-80">&#91;80&#93;</a></sup> The conflict escalated to the point where Snape called Lily a "Mudblood," an act that cost him his friendship with her. Snape himself discovered Harry's spying. <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> refused to give him any more <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a> lessons, something that Harry was not particularly concerned about and something he did not inform anyone of. Uncovering the source behind Snape's hatred for <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> left Harry seeing his father in a slightly different light. He also found comfort in the fact that at least his mother appeared to be person of strong morals while wondering why she ever agreed to marry James in the first place.
</p>
<h5><span id="Dumbledore's_escape"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Dumbledore.27s_escape">Dumbledore's escape</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=56" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Dumbledore&#039;s escape">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=56" title="Edit section: Dumbledore&#039;s escape"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>Dumbledore’s Army, <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius</a>. Not Potter’s Army. </i>Dumbledore’s Army<i>.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Dumbledore takes the fall for Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180423215252" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C27M3 Dumbledore&#39;s escape.jpg" data-image-key="B5C27M3_Dumbledore&#39;s_escape.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423215252" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180423215252" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423215252" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C27M3 Dumbledore&#39;s escape.jpg" data-image-key="B5C27M3_Dumbledore&#39;s_escape.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423215252" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in the Headmaster's office, just prior to Dumbledore's escape from Hogwarts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As the second term progressed, Harry's relationship with Cho became more strained. While the two did like each other, Cho was mistakenly jealous of <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> due to the latter's closeness with Harry, and Harry still felt awkward about Cho's feelings over Cedric. When Cho's friend, <a href="/wiki/Marietta_Edgecombe" title="Marietta Edgecombe">Marietta Edgecombe</a>, betrayed the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> to Umbridge, the members were all punished and forced to end their meetings. Harry was furious with Marietta but Cho insisted on defending her friend. Cho even claimed that it was not Marietta's fault because she was being pressured by her mother. At this point, Cho's and Harry's relationship "fell apart", and the two no longer saw each other romantically. Umbridge is appointed <a href="/wiki/Headmaster" title="Headmaster">Headmistress</a> and imposes even tighter control. Fred and George Weasley rebelled against the new authority at the school. On one occasion, the twins released enchanted fireworks through the castle.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 236px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/James_harry_Lily.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20170314003736" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="234" height="156" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="James harry Lily.PNG" data-image-key="James_harry_Lily.PNG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/James_harry_Lily.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/234?cb=20170314003736" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/James_harry_Lily.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20170314003736" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/James_harry_Lily.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/234?cb=20170314003736" decoding="async" width="234" height="156" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="James harry Lily.PNG" data-image-key="James_harry_Lily.PNG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/James_harry_Lily.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/234?cb=20170314003736" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:James_harry_Lily.PNG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A memory Harry sees featuring <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">Lily Evans</a> standing up to James Potter</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Fred and George took it easy during the Easter holidays, but then took their rebellion to a new level. They turned a corridor of the school into a swamp to create a diversion for Harry to access the fireplace in Umbridge's office in an attempt to contact <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a>, and were cornered by Umbridge and members of the <a href="/wiki/Inquisitorial_Squad" title="Inquisitorial Squad">Inquisitorial Squad</a>. In a final act of defiance, the twins summoned their brooms, openly mocked Umbridge's authority, struck the Squad members with a variety of jinxes, and escaped the school behind to pursue a career in their joke shop, with the money Harry lent them.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Careers_Advice_and_Grawp">Careers Advice and Grawp</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=57" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Careers Advice and Grawp">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=57" title="Edit section: Careers Advice and Grawp"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Rubeus Hagrid</b>: "<i>They were bullyin' him, Hermione, 'cause he's so small!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Small? Small?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Rubeus Hagrid</b>: "<i><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, I couldn't leave him. See — he's my brother!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Hagrid introduces Grawp to Harry and Hermione<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>The fifth years begin the sessions on the advice of what they'll need to do to prepare for the careers they'll pursue after graduation. During Harry's career advice session with Professor McGonagall, he tells her that he wants to be an <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a>. During this admission they are rudely interrupted several times by <a href="/wiki/Umbridge_family" title="Umbridge family">Umbridge</a>; she remarks against Harry's ambition of becoming an Auror. She stating that applicants can not have a criminal record, these constant interruptions angered McGonagall. The meeting ends with <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a> supporting him, and having a screaming argument with Umbridge.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180319043113" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hagrid introduces the trio to Grawp.jpg" data-image-key="Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180319043113" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180319043113" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180319043113" decoding="async" width="249" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hagrid introduces the trio to Grawp.jpg" data-image-key="Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20180319043113" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hagrid_introduces_the_trio_to_Grawp.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hagrid intoducing the trio to the sixteen foot giant <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the final Quidditch match of the year — in which Harry did not play as Umbridge had banned him for life — <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, who had returned to the school months into the term and very badly beaten, decided to show Harry and Hermione why he was so badly injured. This caused them to miss much of <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> 's Quidditch match. Hagrid also relayed to the trio were he had been during those months that he was away. He along with <a href="/wiki/Olympe_Maxime" title="Olympe Maxime">Madam Maxime</a> were given a mission to the Giant Colony, in order to persuade them to join Dumbledore and his cause. This mission proved to be a failure to the Order, as the giants chose to align with the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, due to their shared love of violence and killing.
</p><p>Hagrid had dragged a <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giant</a> back with him from his mission over the summer. It transpired that the giant (named Grawp) was Hagrid's half-brother on his mother's side, and that Hagrid had been attempting to civilise the giant, but with few results. He made Harry and Hermione promise that they would look after Grawp, should Hagrid be forced to leave the school for any reason. Hagrid was attacked and left the school during <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> examinations, and thus Harry never had to go down to Grawp in the forest.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_in_the_Forbidden_Forest">Skirmish in the Forbidden Forest</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=58" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Skirmish in the Forbidden Forest">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=58" title="Edit section: Skirmish in the Forbidden Forest"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Neville Longbottom</b>: "<i>We were all in the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> together. It was all supposed to be about fighting You-Know-Who, wasn’t it? And this is the first chance we’ve had to do something real — or was that all just a game or something?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>“No — of course it wasn’t —</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The six D.A. members prepare to depart to the Ministry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817234257" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="105" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="False vision - Voldemort tortures Sirius Black.jpg" data-image-key="False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20190817234257" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817234257" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20190817234257" decoding="async" width="251" height="105" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="False vision - Voldemort tortures Sirius Black.jpg" data-image-key="False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20190817234257" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:False_vision_-_Voldemort_tortures_Sirius_Black.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's <i>false</i> vision of Voldemort torturing <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> in the Hall of Prophecy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Eventually, late in the <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> examinations on <a href="/wiki/18_June" title="18 June">18 June</a>, while taking his History of Magic exam Harry dozed off. He received a vision of Voldemort torturing Sirius and ordering him to get the prophecy. Harry was prepared to go to the Ministry immediately, but Hermione advised him to check <a href="/wiki/Grimmauld_Place" title="Grimmauld Place">Grimmauld Place</a> first to see if Sirius was still there. Harry used the <a href="/wiki/Floo_Network" title="Floo Network">Floo Network</a> in Umbridge's office to peer into Grimmauld Place, where <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> stated that Sirius was gone. Unfortunately, Umbridge caught Harry and his friends in the act.
</p><p>Umbridge asked Snape to extract information from Harry through the use of <a href="/wiki/Veritaserum" title="Veritaserum">Veritaserum</a>, but Snape claimed to have none left in his stocks. Umbridge then resorted to the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>, revealing that it was she who set the Dementors loose on Harry. Hermione managed to save him by luring Umbridge into the Forbidden Forest. Once in the forest Umbridge attempted to harm Harry and Hermione, but was dragged off by <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">centaurs</a> for calling them "<i>filthy half-breeds! Beasts!</i>" and <i>"creatures of near-human intelligence"</i>. Harry and Hermione escaped when Grawp stumbled into the centaur camp looking for Hagrid. The trio, along with D.A. members <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, Neville Longbottom, and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> — who had assisted in Harry's attempt to contact Grimmauld Place — used <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">Thestrals</a> to fly to London.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=59" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Battle of the Department of Mysteries">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=59" title="Edit section: Battle of the Department of Mysteries"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;The start of the Battle of the Department of Mysteries"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Don’t do anything. Not yet —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Bellatrix Lestrange</b>: "<i>You hear him? You hear him? Giving instructions to the other children as though he thinks of fighting us!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Lucius Malfoy</b>: "<i>Oh, you don’t know Potter as I do, Bellatrix. He has a great weakness for heroics; the Dark Lord understands this about him. Now give me the prophecy, Potter.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I know Sirius is here. I know you’ve got him!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Lucius Malfoy</b>: "<i>It’s time you learned the difference between life and dreams, Potter. Now give me the prophecy, or we start using wands.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The start of the Battle of the Department of Mysteries<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140425151948" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="125" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Neville threatening Bellatrix GIF.gif" data-image-key="Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140425151948" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140425151948" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140425151948" decoding="async" width="245" height="125" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Neville threatening Bellatrix GIF.gif" data-image-key="Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140425151948" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Neville_threatening_Bellatrix_GIF.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Death Eaters surround the six D.A. members in an attempt to retrieve the <a href="/wiki/Prophecy" title="Prophecy">prophecy</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After reaching the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>, Harry led them all through various rooms in search of Sirius, without finding him. The group became doubtful until they came across a room filled with crystal balls, later to be known as prophecies. One of the prophecies had Harry's name on it, and he picked it up, much to the displeasure of <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>. Upon picking up the prophecy <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> appeared, revealing that it was all a ruse to bring him there. Harry then attempts to buy time by fully mocking Voldemort in front of his Death Eaters, which infuriates <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix</a>, yet Lucius stops her from hurting Potter, not through defence, but so that they can protect the prophecy.
