Harry still refuses to hand over the prophecy, so <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius</a> then begins to tease him that the prophecy holds the answer to his scar, why Voldemort wishes to kill him, and the cause of the Second Wizarding War.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616001030" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="OOTP Death Chamber Sirius Harry Antonin Lucius.gif" data-image-key="OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140616001030" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616001030" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140616001030" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="OOTP Death Chamber Sirius Harry Antonin Lucius.gif" data-image-key="OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140616001030" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:OOTP_Death_Chamber_Sirius_Harry_Antonin_Lucius.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Sirius duelling Death Eaters Lucius Malfoy and <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Just then, on Harry’s signal, the six D.A. members all use the <a href="/wiki/Reductor_Curse" title="Reductor Curse">Reductor Curse</a> to smash the shelves of prophecies, distracting the Death Eaters so that they could flee. Ron, <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a> had taken another path and Harry, Hermione, and Neville did not know where they were. Chaos ensued, Harry's group was chased through various rooms. When in he Death Chamber, all but Harry and Neville were incapacitated in the fighting. Then reinforcements from the Order of the Phoenix, alerted by Snape, arrived to help aid in the battle. In the ensuing fighting, Sirius Black was murdered by a killing curse from his cousin, <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, and fell through a mysterious <a href="/wiki/Veil" title="Veil">stone arch</a>. Harry pursued Bellatrix, using the Cruciatus Curse, but he was unable to kill her.
</p><p>Voldemort appeared, angered by the failures of his Death Eaters. For the second time, he attempted to fatally curse Harry, who was too transfixed to even defend himself, but Dumbledore's sudden arrival saved him. Voldemort then fully possessed Harry, hoping that <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> would sacrifice Harry in order to kill Voldemort. However, Voldemort was forced to leave Harry's body when Harry's grief for Sirius became too overwhelming to bear, as Voldemort did not understand the concept of love. Voldemort then grabbed Bellatrix and <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Disapparated</a>, but not before the <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Minister</a> and Ministry employees saw him and finally accepted that he was back.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_prophecy">The prophecy</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=60" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The prophecy">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=60" title="Edit section: The prophecy"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>The one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches... Born to those who have thrice defied him, born as the seventh month dies... and the Dark Lord will mark him as his equal, but he will have power the Dark Lord knows not... and either must die at the hand of the other for neither can live while the other survives...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Sybill Trelawney</a>'s first prophecy<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718223647" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg" data-image-key="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718223647" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718223647" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718223647" decoding="async" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg" data-image-key="Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718223647" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Order-of-the-phoenix-movie-screencaps.com-14891.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore telling Harry the whole prophecy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Back at Hogwarts, Harry appeared in Dumbledore's office and tried to get out after <a href="/wiki/Phineas_Nigellus_Black" title="Phineas Nigellus Black">Phineas Nigellus Black</a> mentioned Sirius, only to find the door locked. Harry was none too pleased about Dumbledore's name being mentioned by the portraits. When the Headmaster returned, Harry lost his temper and started destroying Dumbledore's possessions, trying to get Dumbledore to let him out; Dumbledore refused, asking Harry to sit down and listen to what Dumbledore needed to say.
</p><p>Dumbledore explained to Harry the real reason why Voldemort tried to kill him as an infant. A prophecy stated that he was destined to defeat the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Wizard" title="Dark Wizard">Dark Lord</a>, for he had powers Voldemort did not: the ability to <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a>, something that the Department of Mysteries was trying to research in a locked room. As a result of the battle, the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> realised that Lord Voldemort had indeed returned, and Harry and Dumbledore were vindicated along with Sirius (though he didn't live long enough to enjoy his freedom, but was honoured as hero by the Ministry). Serious steps were taken following this change in policy, such as the dismissal of Umbridge. However, this was not a sea of change, as the Ministry still had a mistrust of Dumbledore.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sixth_year">Sixth year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=61" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Sixth year">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=61" title="Edit section: Sixth year"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince"><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>So, Harry. You have been wondering, I am sure, what I have planned for you during these — for want of a better word — lessons?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Yes, sir.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Well, I have decided that it is time, now that you know what prompted Lord Voldemort to try and kill you fifteen years ago, for you to be given certain information.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>You said, at the end of last term, you were going to tell me everything. Sir.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Dumbledore and Harry speak of their upcoming lessons together <sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half_Blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>In the wake of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a> Harry was sent home to <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> for the summer holidays. There, he obsessed and brooded over his godfather's death where he hardly left his room and refused meals. As the battle had taken place at one point in the famed <a href="/wiki/Hall_of_Prophecy" title="Hall of Prophecy">Hall of Prophecy</a>, many in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding community</a> including the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> began to speculate about the relationship between Harry and that place, leading to, accidentally correct reports calling Harry "the Chosen One", the one destined to defeat Lord Voldemort once and for all. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214532" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="142" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" data-image-key="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20141122214532" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214532" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20141122214532" decoding="async" width="235" height="142" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" data-image-key="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20141122214532" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore and Harry searching for <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Early in his summer, Dumbledore requested that Harry join him in some unknown adventure. He arrived to pick Harry up at <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> on a Friday, late in the evening. Harry had not informed his aunt and uncle of this development and it came as a great surprise to them. However, they could not depart immediately, because there was a piece of business to attend to: <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_will" title="Sirius Black&#39;s will">Sirius's will</a>. Much to his rage, Harry inherited his godfather Sirius Black's estate. This included: 12 Grimmauld Place, the Black family vault, and the Blacks' irritating and half-crazed house elf, <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>. Harry still retained animosity towards Kreacher after his involvement in Sirius' death a few months previous. He also gave Dumbledore permission to continue to use Grimmauld Place as <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order</a> headquarters. Afterwards they were off, and Dumbledore <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparated</a> Harry to the small village of <a href="/wiki/Budleigh_Babberton" title="Budleigh Babberton">Budleigh Babberton</a>, where Harry was introduced to Horace Slughorn.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Halfblood-00290.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141225174131" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Halfblood-00290.jpg" data-image-key="Halfblood-00290.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Halfblood-00290.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141225174131" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Halfblood-00290.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141225174131" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Halfblood-00290.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141225174131" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Halfblood-00290.jpg" data-image-key="Halfblood-00290.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/73/Halfblood-00290.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141225174131" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Halfblood-00290.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry meets Horace Slughorn, the former Hogwarts <a href="/wiki/Potions_Master" title="Potions Master">Potions Master</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In their time together, Harry and Slughorn discussed some of the professor's old students and the improved security at Hogwarts. When Harry and Dumbledore made to leave, Slughorn agreed to return to the school if he got a raise and a larger office. Following their visit, Dumbledore dropped Harry off at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>, where Harry spent the rest of the summer playing two-sided <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a>, but not before informing Harry that he was to be given special lessons by Dumbledore himself. Later in the summer Harry learned that he had achieved seven <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a>: one '<a href="/wiki/Outstanding" title="Outstanding">Outstanding</a>'<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup>, five '<a href="/wiki/Exceeds_Expectations" title="Exceeds Expectations">Exceeds Expectations</a>'<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup>, and one '<a href="/wiki/Acceptable" title="Acceptable">Acceptable</a>'<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup>. He also received a surprise when he was made <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Captain#Hogwarts_Quidditch_Captains" title="Quidditch Captain">Captain</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a>, which put him on equal standing with prefects.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="N.E.W.T._classes">N.E.W.T. classes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=62" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: N.E.W.T. classes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=62" title="Edit section: N.E.W.T. classes"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>This Book is the Property of the Half-Blood Prince.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry finds the signature inside the book<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>Having learned of Professor Slughorn's propensity for hand-picking favourites. Harry experienced this first-hand. He and many others were invited to join Horace Slughorn's <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a>, during the ride to Hogwarts aboard the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>. Harry did not enjoy the experience, and made to leave as soon as he possibly could. Instead of returning to his previous compartment, Harry made to eavesdrop upon <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. Malfoy's precipitation in meeting weeks earlier had led Harry to believe he had taken the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a>. What he heard did nothing to dispel his suspicions.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 238px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209003714" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="236" height="157" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Slughorn rewarding Harry 2.jpg" data-image-key="Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/236?cb=20161209003714" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209003714" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/236?cb=20161209003714" decoding="async" width="236" height="157" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Slughorn rewarding Harry 2.jpg" data-image-key="Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/236?cb=20161209003714" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Slughorn_rewarding_Harry_2.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Professor Slughorn</a> giving Harry the vial of <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Arriving late to the Welcoming Feast, due to an encounter with Malfoy, Harry learned that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> had been promoted to Defence Against the Dark Arts professor. While this disappointed Harry greatly, his career as an Auror reopened, as Professor Slughorn would accept his 'Exceeds Expectations' score in Potions. Harry proceeded to take five classes this year: <a href="/wiki/Charm" title="Charm">Charms</a>, <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>, <a href="/wiki/Herbology" title="Herbology">Herbology</a>, <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfiguration</a>. As Harry had not bothered to buy a text book, Slughorn allowed Harry to borrow an old one from the supply cabinet. When Harry examined it, he found that it once had belonged to a student identified only as the "<a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Half-Blood Prince</a>". The book contained copious handwritten notes that helped Harry excel in Potions for once. In fact, his skills won him a prize from Slughorn — a small vial of <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>, also known as "liquid luck".
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Private_lessons">Private lessons</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=63" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Private lessons">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=63" title="Edit section: Private lessons"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_Albus_Dumbledore%27s_private_lessons" title="Harry Potter and Albus Dumbledore&#39;s private lessons">Harry Potter and Albus Dumbledore's private lessons</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>I told you everything I know. From this point forth, we shall be leaving the firm founda-tion of fact and journeying together through the murky marshes of memory into thickets of wildest guesswork. From here on in, Harry, I may be as woefully wrong as <a href="/wiki/Humphrey_Belcher" title="Humphrey Belcher">Humphrey Belcher</a>, who be-lieved the time was ripe for a cheese cauldron.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Assumptions regarding Riddle's plans<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>As promised <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> begins the private series of lessons with Harry concerning Lord Voldemort. In the first lesson, Dumbledore shows Harry the first of a number of memories he has collected concerning Voldemort's past using his <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">pensieve</a>. These lessons regarding Riddle's past were in order to learn his secrets and weaknesses. Dumbledore promised Harry that this information would help him survive and would prove crucial to the eventual defeat of Lord Voldemort.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141113235408" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry pensinive.gif" data-image-key="Harry_pensinive.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141113235408" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141113235408" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141113235408" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry pensinive.gif" data-image-key="Harry_pensinive.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141113235408" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_pensinive.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A private lesson with Dumbledore, Harry about to view a <a href="/wiki/Memory" title="Memory">memory</a> in the Pensieve</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In their first lesson the pair delved into the origin of the boy Tom Riddle, by viewing the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Gaunt" title="House of Gaunt">Gaunt family</a> that once lived around <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>. It shows a former Head of the Magical Law Enforcement Patrol, <a href="/wiki/Bob_Ogden" title="Bob Ogden">Bob Ogden</a> visiting a man named Marvolo Gaunt in order to summon his son Morfin to a Ministry hearing in connection with an attack on a Muggle named <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle_Senior" title="Tom Riddle Senior">Tom Riddle Snr</a>. A huge commotion occurs: Morfin attacks Ogden, with Marvolo stoutly defending his son's actions. <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt" title="Marvolo Gaunt">Marvolo</a> also tries to attack his daughter <a href="/wiki/Merope_Riddle" title="Merope Riddle">Merope</a> after finding out that she has an intense infatuation with Riddle. 
</p><p>After viewing this memory, Dumbledore tells Harry that both Marvolo and Morfin were sentenced to six months and three years imprisonment respectively in <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a> due to their behaviour. During this lesson Harry also learned who Tom Riddle's parents were and how they came to be married. He also learned what kind of mindset of the Gaunt family possessed. How Marvolo and <a href="/wiki/Morfin_Gaunt" title="Morfin Gaunt">Morfin</a> believed strongly in blood supremacy, something the Voldemort's mother (Merope) did not share.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Quidditch_Captain">Quidditch Captain</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=64" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Quidditch Captain">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=64" title="Edit section: Quidditch Captain"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I dunno why the team's this popular all of a sudden.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Oh, come on, Harry. It's not <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> that's popular, it's you! You've never been more interesting, and frankly, you've never been more fanciable.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry as the new captain and his increased popularity<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720143429" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720143429" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720143429" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720143429" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720143429" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-half-blood-captain.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Quidditch Captain Harry supervising Gryffindor tryouts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The Saturday following Harry's first lessons, while in the Great Hall the trio find out (courtesy of the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i>) that <a href="/wiki/Stanley_Shunpike" title="Stanley Shunpike">Stan Shunpike</a> has been arrested for supposed Death Eater activity. Apparently he was over heard talking about the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> secret plans while in a pub. Harry believed that Stan most likely knew nothing regarding secret plans, as Stan had a habit of greatly exaggerating. Afterwards Harry, as the new <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> Quidditch Captain held trials to select the team for the annual Quidditch Cup. Due to Harry's popularity, it proves to be extremely taxing and difficult, with even first-years, <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaws</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuffs</a> turning up for the trials.
</p><p>The first test he administered was a basic flying test, something that proved to be a good idea as it became clear to Harry that most of the students present where not adapt flyers. After an arduous morning of tantrums, foolishness, and many complaints Harry picked the members of his team. The three <a href="/wiki/Chaser" title="Chaser">Chasers</a>, one of which was <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> (who out flew all her competition and scored seventeen goals), two <a href="/wiki/Beater" title="Beater">Beaters</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> as <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a>. Ron had only survived the tryouts with Hermione's help, who <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">confunded</a> his competition, <a href="/wiki/Cormac_McLaggen" title="Cormac McLaggen">Cormac McLaggen</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080327155537" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="157" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The trio relaxing in the common room.jpg" data-image-key="The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20080327155537" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080327155537" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20080327155537" decoding="async" width="235" height="157" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The trio relaxing in the common room.jpg" data-image-key="The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20080327155537" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_trio_relaxing_in_the_common_room.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry becomes increasingly fascinated with the <a href="/wiki/Half-Blood_Prince%27s_copy_of_Advanced_Potion-Making" class="mw-redirect" title="Half-Blood Prince&#39;s copy of Advanced Potion-Making">Half-Blood Prince's textbook</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In studying the Half-Blood Prince's book, Harry discovered numerous hand-written spells that the Prince supposedly invented himself, such as <i><a href="/wiki/Levicorpus" title="Levicorpus">Levicorpus</a></i> and <a href="/wiki/Muffliato_Charm" title="Muffliato Charm"><i>Muffliato</i></a>. He tried these spells and became increasingly fascinated with the book, going as far as having it on him at all times. This was something that his friends were quick to comment on, stating that "<i>all he does is read that bloody book"</i> and that he "<i>practically sleeps with it</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-82" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-82">&#91;82&#93;</a></sup> Harry even considered the book to be almost a friend, a teacher and sort of guide.
</p><p>Hermione disapproved of the book, partly because some of its spells have a dark nature, but mainly because it allows Harry to outperform her in potions. Three times, Slughorn attempts to invite Harry to one of his Slug Club parties, but Harry avoids them. Throughout the autumn, Harry used Quidditch to dodge Professor Slughorn's <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a> events, doing this because he disliked the idea and because it was kinder than leaving Ron alone as Hermione had been invited as well.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Opal_Necklace">The Opal Necklace</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=65" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Opal Necklace">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=65" title="Edit section: The Opal Necklace"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I think Draco Malfoy gave Katie that necklace, <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a>.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Minerva McGonagall</b>: "<i>That is a very serious accusation, Potter. Do you have any proof?</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry's suspensions regarding Malfoy<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20201109220728" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C12M1 Cursed Katie Bell.jpg" data-image-key="B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201109220728" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20201109220728" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201109220728" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C12M1 Cursed Katie Bell.jpg" data-image-key="B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201109220728" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C12M1_Cursed_Katie_Bell.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio watch as <a href="/wiki/Katie_Bell" title="Katie Bell">Katie Bell</a> is subjected to the curse on the Opal Necklace while in Hogsmeade</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In October, during a Hogsmeade visit, Katie Bell was nearly killed after being <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">bewitched</a> to carry a <a href="/wiki/Opal_Necklace" title="Opal Necklace">cursed necklace</a> to Dumbledore. Remembering seeing the same necklace in Borgin's shop, Harry voices his suspicions of Malfoy to Professor McGonagall. But she (like Ron and Hermione) rubbishes his theory, stating that Malfoy did not go to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> as he had a detention with her, and that there is no proof that he bought the necklace. Harry felt annoyance towards Ron and Hermione, as they did not back him up, but he did not give up on his theory.
</p><p>Harry's lessons were quite sporadic that autumn, and he did not have another one until after tragedy befell someone at Hogwarts. In this lesson, Harry first sees <a href="/wiki/Caractacus_Burke" title="Caractacus Burke">Caractacus Burke</a> talking about <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin&#39;s Locket">Slytherin's Locket</a> which a pregnant and desperate Merope had sold him, her husband having abandoned her when she stopped giving him love potion. Dumbledore then focused on Tom Riddle just as he was on the cusp of his Hogwarts years, and Harry discovered a troubled orphan who consciously used his magic to bully and intimidate the other children. Also Harry shared his suspicions of Malfoy with <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> during their lesson, only to be rebuffed.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180320182541" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320182541" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180320182541" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320182541" decoding="async" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f8/Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320182541" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-Potter-Quidditch.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry playing as Seeker in the first match of the season</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Not long after that meeting, <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> season was upon them. In preparation for their first game, Harry replaced the injured Katie Bell with <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>. The change produced some results, both expected, as the team excelled on the pitch, and unexpected, as Harry found himself in a jealous rage after seeing Dean kissing Ginny after practice. The team's only problem was Ron, who was suffering from a lack of confidence. In an attempt to boost Ron's confidence, Harry blatantly acted as if he had spiked Ron's pumpkin juice with <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>. Ron took the bait and played a flawless match; however, Hermione took the bait as well and acted unkindly toward Ron and Harry. While she made up with Harry when he told her of the ruse, Ron's sudden relationship with <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a> led to continued strife, as it spiked jealousy in Hermione.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="A_Frosty_Christmas">A Frosty Christmas</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=66" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: A Frosty Christmas">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=66" title="Edit section: A Frosty Christmas"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Rufus Scrimgeour</b>: "<i>Dumbledore's man through and through, aren't you, Potter?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Yeah, I am. Glad we straightened that out.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry's refusal to be used by the Ministry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>While Harry attempted to reconcile his best friends, the Christmas holidays were fast approaching and with them the <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club_Christmas_party" title="Slug Club Christmas party">Slug Club Christmas party</a> out of which Harry could not wrangle. Since "the Chosen One" rumours had been printed, Harry had received an unnatural amount of attention from the young ladies at Hogwarts. Specifically a fourth year named <a href="/wiki/Romilda_Vane" title="Romilda Vane">Romilda Vane</a>, who's attention bordered on obsession. As Harry could not ask Ginny to the party, he was left to ask <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> to attend with him as a friend. This made Luna extremely happy and hugely disappointed the gaggles of giggling girls who awaited Harry below every doorway with mistletoe, they gave him resentful looks.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214628" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="124" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry in Hallway.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_in_Hallway.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141122214628" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214628" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141122214628" decoding="async" width="240" height="124" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry in Hallway.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_in_Hallway.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141122214628" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_in_Hallway.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry overhears a strange conversation between <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> and <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At the party, Harry was surprised to learn that Hermione attended with <a href="/wiki/Cormac_McLaggen" title="Cormac McLaggen">Cormac McLaggen</a>, a large <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> seventh year whom Ron despised. Hermione confesed that she did this soley on the fact that fact that it would annoy Ron the most. He told her that it served her right when McLaggen was less than gentlemanly, only talking about himself and Quidditch. Harry was then forced to endure a conversation with both Snape and Slughorn in regards to his potion making skills and his future career choice. Later, after Malfoy was apprehended "gate-crashing" the party by <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Filch</a>, Harry learned that Malfoy was indeed up to something. He also learned that Professor Snape had made the <a href="/wiki/Unbreakable_Vow" title="Unbreakable Vow">Unbreakable Vow</a> with <a href="/wiki/Narcissa_Malfoy" title="Narcissa Malfoy">Narcissa</a> in order to protect him.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/64/Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817164156" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas at the Burrow.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/64/Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817164156" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/64/Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817164156" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/64/Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817164156" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas at the Burrow.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/64/Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817164156" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-half-blood-christmas_at_the_Burrow.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry discussing the overheard conversation between Snape and Malfoy during <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> holidays</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's Christmas was less than enjoyable, as he was cornered by the new <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>. Scrimgeour had been hoping to speak with Harry for months and used <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy Weasley</a> as his in. The Minister interrupted the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a> Christmas. He tried pitching Harry on becoming the Ministry's mascot, an idea that Harry was not prepared to accept. During the meeting Harry proceeded to tell the Scrimgeour why he would not offer the Ministry his support. The main reasons for his lack of support being: the Ministry's ineffectiveness in dealing with the Death Eater threat, the knowledge that <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> still held a position within the Ministry, the Ministry's refusal to come to his aid when he tried to inform the wizarding community of Voldemort's return the following year, and the mere fact that Harry had no desire to be used. This discussion left Harry and Scrimgeour on increasingly bad terms.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Poisoned_mead">Poisoned mead</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=67" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Poisoned mead">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=67" title="Edit section: Poisoned mead"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>Half our family does seem to owe you their lives, now I stop and think about it... well, all I can say is that it was a lucky day for the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasleys</a> when Ron decided to sit in your compartment on the Hogwarts Express, Harry.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> expressing his gratitude<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>Upon returning to Hogwarts, Harry's sporadic lessons with Dumbledore continued. Early in January, Harry delved into a memory that all but proved that Riddle had murdered his own paternal family after his fifth year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. Then Dumbledore showed Harry a most curious memory, a memory that Professor Slughorn had apparently tampered with, and he gave Harry his first homework assignment: to get the real memory from Slughorn. After impressing Slughorn using a <a href="/wiki/Bezoar" title="Bezoar">bezoar</a> in class, Harry tried the direct approach only to be instantly shot down.
</p><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 248px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720144619" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="246" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter saving a poisoned Ronald Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20180720144619" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720144619" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20180720144619" decoding="async" width="246" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter saving a poisoned Ronald Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20180720144619" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry saving Ron, after the latter ingested poisoned mead</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>By <a href="/wiki/1_March" title="1 March">1 March</a>, Harry had still not acquired Slughorn's true memory and had begun to grow more obsessed with Draco Malfoy. That morning he awoke to find Ron under the influence of a very powerful <a href="/wiki/Love_Potion" class="mw-redirect" title="Love Potion">Love Potion</a>, and he took him to Slughorn, only for Ron to end up <a href="/wiki/Plot_to_assassinate_Albus_Dumbledore" title="Plot to assassinate Albus Dumbledore">poisoned</a>. Harry managed to act quickly and save him with a Bezoar. This was enough for Hermione to overcome her animosity toward Ron, and the three became friends again. Ron survived, but was not fit for the upcoming Quidditch match, so he was replaced by McLaggen. This turned out to be a bad choice, as McLaggen accidentally knocked Harry unconscious mid-match. Upon his recovery, Harry had yet another lesson with the Headmaster.
</p>
<h5><span id="One_funeral,_two_memories"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="One_funeral.2C_two_memories">One funeral, two memories</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=68" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: One funeral, two memories">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=68" title="Edit section: One funeral, two memories"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>But you won't help her son. <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">She</a> gave me her life, but you won't give me a memory.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Horace Slughorn</b>: "<i>Don't say that. It isn't a question... If it were to help you, of course... but no purpose can be served...</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>It can. Dumbledore needs information. I need information. I am the Chosen One. I have to kill him. I need that memory.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Retrieving the true memory from Slughorn<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png/revision/latest?cb=20180104160129" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Slughorns Memory HBP.png" data-image-key="Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180104160129" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png/revision/latest?cb=20180104160129" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180104160129" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Slughorns Memory HBP.png" data-image-key="Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180104160129" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Slughorns_Memory_HBP.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry retrieves the true <a href="/wiki/Memory" title="Memory">memory</a> from Slughorn</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In his lesson with the Headmaster Harry was upbraided by Dumbledore for not completing his assignment, witnessed the young Tom Riddle murder <a href="/wiki/Hepzibah_Smith" title="Hepzibah Smith">Hepzibah Smith</a> for the famous artefacts (<a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin&#39;s Locket">Slytherin's Locket</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>) she owned, and jinx the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> post at Hogwarts. However, Harry still could not figure out how to obtain the memory and focused on Malfoy. His interest was bordering on obsession. It was Ron who came up with the solution to Harry's dilemma with Slughorn. He suggested Felix Felicis, liquid luck. In the evening, Harry took the potion and not only managed to obtain the memory, but also solved many of his and his friends's problems, including breaking up not only Ginny Weasley and Dean Thomas, but also Ron and his overly clingy girlfriend Lavender Brown.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/Half-blood_lessons.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160730125257" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Half-blood lessons.jpg" data-image-key="Half-blood_lessons.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/Half-blood_lessons.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160730125257" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/Half-blood_lessons.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160730125257" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/Half-blood_lessons.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160730125257" decoding="async" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Half-blood lessons.jpg" data-image-key="Half-blood_lessons.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/47/Half-blood_lessons.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160730125257" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Half-blood_lessons.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Dumbledore prepare to witness Slughorn's true memory</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Even though it was after midnight, Harry immediately went to Dumbledore with the new memory. It confirmed Dumbledore's theory that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> had created not one but multiple Dark magical objects called Horcruxes to ensure his <a href="/wiki/Immortality" title="Immortality">immortality</a>. Together, they theorised that the Dark Lord had created Horcruxes out of special objects such as <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">Riddle's diary</a> and Slytherin's locket. Before Harry left, Dumbledore promised to let Harry join him if he found another Horcrux. With the memory found, Harry had only Quidditch and Malfoy on his mind.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Sectumsempra">Sectumsempra</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=69" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Sectumsempra">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=69" title="Edit section: Sectumsempra"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>Harry looked around; there was Ginny running toward him; she had a hard, blazing look in her face as she threw her arms around him. And without thinking, without planning it, without worrying about the fact that fifty people were watching, Harry kissed her. After several long moments — or it might have been half an hour — or possibly several sunlit days — they broke apart.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry and Ginny kiss for the first time<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>Meanwhile, a recovered Katie had returned to the school, causing Harry to ask her who gave her the necklace. She states that someone <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperiused</a> her in the girl's bathroom at The Three Broomstick. In the week before the final Quidditch match, Harry discovered Malfoy crying in the toilet and a duel ensued. With Malfoy on the verge of using an <a href="/wiki/Unforgivable_Curses" title="Unforgivable Curses">Unforgivable Curse</a>, Harry cast <i><a href="/wiki/Sectumsempra" title="Sectumsempra">Sectumsempra</a></i>, a curse with unknown effects that he found in the <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape%27s_copy_of_Advanced_Potion-Making" title="Severus Snape&#39;s copy of Advanced Potion-Making">Half-Blood Prince's book</a>. The curse nearly killed Malfoy and earning Harry indefinite Saturday detentions with Snape and a telling off from McGonagall.
</p><figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/94/Harry%26Ginny.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140625205208" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="125" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry&amp;Ginny.gif" data-image-key="Harry&amp;Ginny.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/94/Harry%26Ginny.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140625205208" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/94/Harry%26Ginny.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140625205208" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/94/Harry%26Ginny.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140625205208" decoding="async" width="245" height="125" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry&amp;Ginny.gif" data-image-key="Harry&amp;Ginny.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/94/Harry%26Ginny.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140625205208" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%26Ginny.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ginny kiss for the first time, thus beginning their <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">romantic</a> relationship</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Unable to play in the final match, Harry waited with anticipation as he sat through his first detention. When the dentition was finally over he arrived back at <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Gryffindor Tower</a> and was happy to discover that the team had won the <a href="/wiki/Inter-House_Quidditch_Cup" title="Inter-House Quidditch Cup">Quidditch Cup</a> without him. Harry having learned previously that Ginny and Dean had split up and having come to terms with his feelings, was still unwilling to ask her out, fearing Ron's reaction. So in the heat of the moment he spontaneously kissed Ginny while over fifty people watched, about whom he had been thinking quite often. He kissed her after she embraced him in the post-match elation; this marked the beginning of their relationship.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_in_the_Horcrux_Cave">Skirmish in the Horcrux Cave</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=70" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Skirmish in the Horcrux Cave">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=70" title="Edit section: Skirmish in the Horcrux Cave"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Second_skirmish_at_the_Horcrux_cave" class="mw-redirect" title="Second skirmish at the Horcrux cave">Second skirmish at the Horcrux cave</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>If I tell to to leave me and save yourself, you will do as I tell you</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Yes, Sir.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Dumbledore makes a request of Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/30_June" title="30 June">30 June</a>, Dumbledore led Harry out of the castle in search of a <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>. Before they left, Dumbledore made Harry swear to obey any order given him, regardless of his feelings about said order. From <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>, they Apparated to a <a href="/wiki/The_Cave" title="The Cave">sea-side cave</a>, where Tom Riddle had traumatised two young children from his orphanage in his youth. Once inside, Dumbledore attempted to locate the Horcrux's second line of defence. He spoke in a whispered tongue and found a hidden doorway which only opened when it received an offering of blood. The cave was difficult to enter with a toll paid in blood, and to get to the island in the centre of the cave there was only a small boat.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png/revision/latest?cb=20180720154449" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry and Dumbledore in the cave.png" data-image-key="Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720154449" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png/revision/latest?cb=20180720154449" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720154449" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry and Dumbledore in the cave.png" data-image-key="Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720154449" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Dumbledore_in_the_cave.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore and Harry arrive in the the <a href="/wiki/The_Cave" title="The Cave">Crystal Cave</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They next found themselves in a vast chamber containing an underground lake, with a solitary island at its centre from which a faint green light was visible. After a failed attempt by Harry at <a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Summoning</a> the Horcrux, Dumbledore located a carefully concealed boat that would allow them safe passage across the lake. During the crossing, Harry learned another of the Horcrux's lines of defence. The lake was filled with <a href="/wiki/Inferius" title="Inferius">Inferi</a> (animated corpses of Voldemort's previous victims) which would attack anyone who touched the lake's water. Dumbledore instructed Harry on the use of fire as the weapon of choice against the Inferi, should it become necessary. Inferi fear both light and warmth. The thought of the Inferi hidden below caused Harry unease, but was quickly reassured by Dumbledore.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e7/Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180320205729" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green potion.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e7/Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320205729" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e7/Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180320205729" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e7/Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320205729" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green potion.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e7/Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320205729" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-half-blood-movie-green_potion.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry forcing Dumbledore to continue drinking the emerald potion within the stone basin</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once on the island, Dumbledore found a stone basin from which he could not remove the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>, without drinking the <a href="/wiki/Emerald_Potion" title="Emerald Potion">Emerald Potion</a> that the Horcrux resided in. Harry was reluctant that either one of them drink it, as they did not know its effects, but there was no way to avoid it. Dumbledore extracted a promise from Harry that he would force him to drink, no matter how much he tried to persuade him not to. With this promise, Dumbledore drank and Harry watched as Dumbledore was driven out of his mind, but upheld his promise.
</p><p>Dumbledore drank and experienced intense stomach pains, dehydration and saw visions that mentally tortured him. Harry later thought that Dumbledore saw the duel between him, <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Grindelwald</a>. Harry managed to get the potion down Dumbledore's throat. When they finally finished the potion, Dumbledore fell unconscious. When he was revived by Harry he asked for water. Harry attempted to conjure water for Dumbledore with a <a href="/wiki/Water-Making_Spell" title="Water-Making Spell">Water-Making Charm</a>, but this proved ineffective as the water disappeared before Dumbledore could drink it. This being another defence designed by Voldemort. In desperation Harry filled a cup with water from the lake, triggering the army of Inferi that were waiting below.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d3/Harry_inferi.gif/revision/latest?cb=20151211124858" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="92" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry inferi.gif" data-image-key="Harry_inferi.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d3/Harry_inferi.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151211124858" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d3/Harry_inferi.gif/revision/latest?cb=20151211124858" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d3/Harry_inferi.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151211124858" decoding="async" width="250" height="92" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry inferi.gif" data-image-key="Harry_inferi.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d3/Harry_inferi.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151211124858" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_inferi.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry is overwhelmed by Voldemort's army of <a href="/wiki/Inferius" title="Inferius">Inferi</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As he splashed the water on Dumbledore's face, Harry felt something ice cold on his arm and saw a disgusting hand and the Inferi climbing up from the lake. Harry panicked and attempted to fight back with a multitude of spells and curses, including <a href="/wiki/Impediment_Jinx" title="Impediment Jinx"><i>Impedimenta</i></a> and <i><a href="/wiki/Sectumsempra" title="Sectumsempra">Sectumsempra</a></i>. None of the spells worked, since the Inferi were too numerous and could not feel pain. He was overwhelmed and dragged under.
</p><p>Dumbledore, having regained consciousness, created a <a href="/wiki/Firestorm" title="Firestorm">ring of fire</a> around them that repelled the Inferi. He pocketed the Locket and drove the Inferi back into the lake while he and Harry escaped in the boat. Harry then proceeded to <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparate</a> them back to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=71" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Battle of the Astronomy Tower">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=71" title="Edit section: Battle of the Astronomy Tower"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>The lightning-struck tower. Calamity. Disaster. Coming nearer all the time.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Prediction of the battle<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004100" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C27M1 Dumbledore defeated.png" data-image-key="B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004100" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004100" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004100" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C27M1 Dumbledore defeated.png" data-image-key="B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004100" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C27M1_Dumbledore_defeated.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry witnesses Albus Dumbledore's death at the hands of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After a short broomstick ride through the village they landed atop the <a href="/wiki/Astronomy_Tower" title="Astronomy Tower">Astronomy Tower</a>. Once on the tower they discovered that Hogwarts had been invaded by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, but Harry's friends Ron, Hermione, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>, <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, and Ginny, who had been ordered by Harry to watch the school lest Malfoy accomplish his nefarious goal.
