The D.A. members battled alongside the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, on the floor below Harry and Dumbledore, with some help from the remainder of Harry's vial of Felix Felicis. Dumbledore had stopped Harry from fighting and frozen him against a wall with a <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a>, hidden underneath his <a href="/wiki/Invisibility_cloak" title="Invisibility cloak">invisibility cloak</a>, so all he could do was helplessly watch and wait. While waiting Harry witnessed the death of Albus Dumbledore at the hands of Severus Snape.
</p><p>Dumbledore's body plummeted from the tallest tower at Hogwarts. With Dumbledore dead, Harry was free of the spell that petrified him. He immediately set off after Snape, petrifying a Death Eater and seeking revenge. As the Death Eaters made their way out of Hogwarts Castle and on to the grounds, trying to reach the border where they would be able to <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparate</a> again, Harry pursued and faced off against Snape. Harry tried many times to defeat Snape, even weakly attempting the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> and Snape's own hand crafted spells, all with no effect. In the process, Snape identified himself as the Half-Blood Prince, and escaped Hogwarts with <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> and the other Death Eaters.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20170210163726" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="105" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry and Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="Harry_and_Dumbledore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170210163726" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20170210163726" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170210163726" decoding="async" width="245" height="105" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry and Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="Harry_and_Dumbledore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20170210163726" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Dumbledore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry kneeling net to the body of the recently deceased <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> found Harry and together they managed to extinguish the fire that burnt Hagrid's hut (caused by <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a>) with the Water-Making Charm. Harry then told Hagrid that "<i>Snape killed Dumbledore</i>", but Hagrid refused to believe him. Harry and Hagrid returned to the castle to find people staring at Dumbledore's crippled and lifeless body. Harry moved forward the base of the Astronomy Tower and found his mentor's body lying still upon the ground and Hagrid finally believed him. Harry proceeded to stay next to Dumbledore's body thinking that everything that previously happened that night had been all for naught. Harry started crying over Dumbledore’s corpse as well as straightening his half-moon spectacles upon his crooked nose and Harry wiping a trickle of blood from the dead Headmaster’s mouth with his (Harry’s) own sleeve. Hagrid tried many times to get Harry to move, but did not succeed. It was only when he was comforted by Ginny that Harry finally consented to move.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/RAB_note.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180721173201" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="101" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="RAB note.jpg" data-image-key="RAB_note.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/RAB_note.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180721173201" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/RAB_note.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180721173201" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/RAB_note.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180721173201" decoding="async" width="250" height="101" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="RAB note.jpg" data-image-key="RAB_note.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/RAB_note.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180721173201" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:RAB_note.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione read the note from Regulus Black inside the fake locket</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry remembering the locket, took it from Dumbledore's robes. He was absolutely beside himself when he learned it was just a plain bit of jewellery. It was in fact a decoy; there was a note inside the locket that revealed the real Horcrux was taken by someone called '<a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">R.A.B.</a>'. It appeared to Harry that Dumbledore had died in vain and that they had achieved nothing that night. Harry was still processing this information while Ginny escorted him to the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> on <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a>'s orders, all the while holding his hand as means of comfort. Later at the end of the year, Harry would inform Hermione and Ron of the decoy locket.
</p><p>Once in the Hospital Wing he found a injured Neville apparently asleep in bed, as well as: Ron, Hermione, Luna, <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Tonks</a>, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Lupin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a>, and Ron's brother <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley.</a> At some point during the battle Bill had been horribly scarred by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a>. When Ginny announced that Dumbledore was dead, everyone appeared horrified. Lupin actually lost control for a moment, while Madam Pomfrey burst into tears and McGonagall was weak-kneed. Harry explained to everyone what had happened on the Astronomy Tower and when he was finished, they were all shocked by what he had said. Harry also revealed Dumbledore's apparent reasons for trusting Snape and allowing him a second chance.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore">Funeral of Albus Dumbledore</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=72" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Funeral of Albus Dumbledore">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=72" title="Edit section: Funeral of Albus Dumbledore"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>And he knew, without knowing how he knew it, that the <a href="/wiki/Phoenix" title="Phoenix">phoenix</a> had gone, had left Hogwarts for good, just as Dumbledore had left the school, had left the world... had left Harry.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Fawkes leaving represents Dumbledore's departure<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><p>After leaving the hospital wing McGonagall questions Harry about what he and Dumbledore were doing, but Harry under orders from Dumbledore not to tell anyone except <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, refuses. The teachers then discuss the future of <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, and plans for Dumbledore's funeral. Harry turns his back on the Half-Blood Prince's book, and regrets ever possessing it. Hermione and Ron comfort him, stating that nothing in the book ever indicated that he was capable of murder.
</p><dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="Funeral of Albus Dumbledore">Funeral of Albus Dumbledore</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004341" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004341" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry attending Dumbledore's funeral (left side, sixth row)</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Following the death of Albus Dumbledore, his <a href="/wiki/Funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="Funeral of Albus Dumbledore">funeral</a> was carried out. Harry was disgusted to see that <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> and <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> had the nerve to attend his funeral, but he did not want to make a scene at Dumbledore's funeral and bit his tongue. Knowing that he would have to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter&#39;s Horcrux Hunt">hunt down</a> Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> and, fearing for her safety, Harry took Ginny aside, and broke off their romance. Ginny told him that she did not care about the danger of being his girlfriend, but Harry still thought it was best if the two stopped seeing each other. He then spoke to Ron and Hermione, who committed to forgoing their final year at Hogwarts in order to accompany him, despite his protests.
</p>
<h3><span id="Horcrux_hunt_(1997-1998)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Horcrux_hunt_.281997-1998.29">Horcrux hunt <span class="template-c">(1997-1998)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=73" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Horcrux hunt (1997-1998)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=73" title="Edit section: Horcrux hunt (1997-1998)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>You said to us once before that there was time to turn back if we wanted to. We've had time, haven't we?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>We're with you, whatever happens mate.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; A vow to help Harry with his hunt for Horcruxes<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151028162401" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="123" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Petunia saying goodbye.jpg" data-image-key="Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151028162401" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151028162401" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151028162401" decoding="async" width="245" height="123" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Petunia saying goodbye.jpg" data-image-key="Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20151028162401" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Petunia_saying_goodbye.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Petunia saying their goodbyes to each other</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>'s death (Dumbledore was the one who began the hunt in July 1996) at the hands of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a>, the mission fell to Harry Potter to complete. He had to complete it if he was to finally defeat Voldemort. He was joined by Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley. With four Horcruxes remaining (plus the unknown soul fragment residing inside Harry) the trio made plans.
</p><p>Harry, Hermione, and Ron all remained committed to their goal to locate and destroy <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. To protect their families Hermione altered her parents' memories so that they forgot they had a daughter, then instructed them to move to Australia, and with some help from Fred, George, and their father, Ron transfigured the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family_ghoul" title="Weasley family ghoul">family ghoul</a> to resemble himself with <a href="/wiki/Spattergroit" title="Spattergroit">Spattergroit</a>. Harry's <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">aunt</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">uncle</a> were taken into hiding by several members of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, such as <a href="/wiki/Dedalus_Diggle" title="Dedalus Diggle">Dedalus Diggle</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hestia_Jones" title="Hestia Jones">Hestia Jones</a>, despite many misgivings on the part of the Dursleys.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=74" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Battle of the Seven Potters">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=74" title="Edit section: Battle of the Seven Potters"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>I told them you'd take it like this.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>If you think I'm going to let six people risk their lives —&#160;!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>— because it's the first time for all of us.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The trio arguing over the seven Potters plan<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/87/Seven-potters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209004611" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="139" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Seven-potters.jpg" data-image-key="Seven-potters.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/87/Seven-potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161209004611" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/87/Seven-potters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209004611" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/87/Seven-potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161209004611" decoding="async" width="235" height="139" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Seven-potters.jpg" data-image-key="Seven-potters.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/87/Seven-potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161209004611" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Seven-potters.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The seven Potters</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry stayed at <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> for a time, but the Order of the Phoenix needed to evacuate him to the Burrow before he turned seventeen. On <a href="/wiki/27_July" title="27 July">27 July</a> the Order sent the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> into hiding first. Harry was surprised by <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a>'s gratitude towards him for saving his soul and his sincere goodbye. Six out of thirteen of Harry's escorts took <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> to take on Harry's appearance in order to be diversions if they were attacked, despite Harry's protests. Harry also secretly thought that he wished they would respect his body more. Upon leaving, the group was attacked by over thirty cloaked <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>. Harry rode with <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> on his godfather <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_motorcycle" class="mw-redirect" title="Sirius Black&#39;s motorcycle">Sirius' old motorbike</a>, that had been modified. They were attacked by multiple Death Eaters, including an Imperiused <a href="/wiki/Stanley_Shunpike" title="Stanley Shunpike">Stan Shunpike</a> and eventually Lord Voldemort himself, who had invented and mastered <a href="/wiki/Unsupported_flight" title="Unsupported flight">unsupported flight</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/02/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140408223005" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Battle of the Seven Potters.gif" data-image-key="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/02/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140408223005" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/02/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140408223005" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/02/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140408223005" decoding="async" width="245" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Battle of the Seven Potters.gif" data-image-key="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/02/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140408223005" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">Harry's wand</a> retaliated automatically against Voldemort during the battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's owl <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a> was hit by a stray <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> a Death Eater sent Harry's way. When <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> caught up with them, Harry thought this was the end, but his wand acted on its own to strike out at the man who was both "<i>kin and mortal enemy</i>", destroying Voldemort's borrowed wand. The chaos ended when Harry and Hagrid passed the protective enchantments placed over the house of <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>' parents, although Harry was still completely grief-stricken over the death of his beloved owl. After finding Hagrid safe and sound, the pair took a <a href="/wiki/Portkey" title="Portkey">Portkey</a> to the Burrow, where he found a worried <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> standing watch outside in the darkness.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150112004206" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="249" height="129" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="After the battle of 7 potters.jpg" data-image-key="After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20150112004206" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150112004206" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20150112004206" decoding="async" width="249" height="129" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="After the battle of 7 potters.jpg" data-image-key="After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20150112004206" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:After_the_battle_of_7_potters.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and others safely at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">the Burrow</a> after participating in the sky battle earlier that night</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was relieved to see that Hermione and Ron were fine, but was shocked when <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> arrived with <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a>, who had lost an ear. Everyone else arrived safely, but <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a> who had been murdered by Voldemort and <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a>, who had <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Disapparated</a> as soon as the fight started. Many amongst those gathered at the Burrow believed that they had been betrayed, but Harry refused to believe any of those he loved would sell him to Voldemort, much to the chagrin of Remus Lupin. Harry then stormed outside, where he was struck by a vision of Voldemort torturing <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Ollivander</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Time_at_the_Burrow">Time at the Burrow</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=75" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Time at the Burrow">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=75" title="Edit section: Time at the Burrow"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Rufus Scrimgeour</b>: "<i>Remembered you're not at school, have you? Remembered that I am not Dumbledore, who forgave your insolence and insubordination? You may wear that scar like a crown, Potter, but it is not up to a seventeen-year-old boy to tell me how to do my job! It's time you learned some respect!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>It's time you earned it.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; A row during the reading of <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore's will</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Once settled in at the Burrow, Harry, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> helped prepare the wedding ceremony of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>. The day before the wedding, the group celebrated Harry's seventeenth birthday. Harry received a watch from Mr and Mrs Weasley, a traditional coming-of-age gift. Ginny also gave him the most passionate kiss they have ever shared. It was something to remember her by in case he "<i>meets some veela</i>" during the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter&#39;s Horcrux Hunt">Horcrux hunt</a>. Harry responded by saying that "<i>dating opportunities will be thin</i>". The pair was then interrupted by Ron and Hermione.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128225544" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="160" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20190128225544" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128225544" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20190128225544" decoding="async" width="240" height="160" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20190128225544" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Scrimgeour</a> gives the first Snitch Harry caught, willed to him by Albus Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At the party that night, <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> Rufus Scrimgeour arrived to release the contents of Albus Dumbledore's will. Harry was left the <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_first_Golden_Snitch" title="Harry Potter&#39;s first Golden Snitch">first Snitch</a> he had ever caught in a Quidditch match and <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a>; Scrimgeour withheld this second gift, claiming that it was a historical magical item and was not exclusively Harry's property. Noting that Harry, Ron, and Hermione were the only students mentioned by name in the will, he asked the trio why this was; the three were unable to give him an answer.
</p><p>On <a href="/wiki/1_August" title="1 August">1 August</a>, Harry attended Bill and Fleur's wedding disguised as a distant <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley</a> cousin, Barny Weasley. They used polyjuice potion and the hairs of a red-haired Muggle boy from the village to disguise him. During the party, Harry met Luna Lovegood's father, Xenophilius, (who wore a necklace bearing an Triangle-Eyed symbol) and Viktor Krum, (who dislikes the symbol for it is synonymous with the dark wizard Grindelwald, who attended Krum's school, Durmstrang). The reception was interrupted when the <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> of <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a> arrived and announced the <a href="/wiki/Fall_of_the_Ministry_of_Magic" title="Fall of the Ministry of Magic">fall of the Ministry of Magic</a> and the death of Rufus Scrimgeour. Chaos erupted and guests started to flee, while Harry and Hermione drew their wands and grabbed Ron before Disapparating to <a href="/wiki/Tottenham_Court_Road" title="Tottenham Court Road">Tottenham Court Road</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Stupefy.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120519160947" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Stupefy.gif" data-image-key="Stupefy.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Stupefy.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120519160947" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Stupefy.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120519160947" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Stupefy.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120519160947" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Stupefy.gif" data-image-key="Stupefy.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Stupefy.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120519160947" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Stupefy.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio duelling Antonin Dolohov and Thorfinn Rowle in <a href="/wiki/Luchino_Caffe" title="Luchino Caffe">Luchino café</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>There, Hermione revealed that she had planned ahead, packing supplies in her bag, which had an <a href="/wiki/Extension_Charm" title="Extension Charm">Undetectable Extension Charm</a> on it. Ron changed, and Harry put on his <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility cloak</a>, and the three then entered a nearby café to hang low for a while. Whilst at the café, Ron and Hermione discussed the events of the wedding and Voldemort's coup. They unwittingly broke the <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo curse</a> that had been placed on Voldemort's name when the Death Eaters overthrew the Ministry of Magic, alerting Death Eaters <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> and <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a> to their location. After a <a href="/wiki/Luchino_Caffe_Duel" title="Luchino Caffe Duel">brief skirmish</a>, the trio defeated the Death Eaters, whose memories Hermione wiped at Harry's suggestion. Harry, Ron, and Hermione then found refuge at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Infiltrating_the_Ministry_of_Magic">Infiltrating the Ministry of Magic</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=76" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Infiltrating the Ministry of Magic">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=76" title="Edit section: Infiltrating the Ministry of Magic"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Infiltration_of_the_British_Ministry_of_Magic" class="mw-redirect" title="Infiltration of the British Ministry of Magic">Infiltration of the British Ministry of Magic</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>You're going to leave here with us. Go home, grab your children, and get out, get out of the country if you've got to. Disguise yourselves and run. You've seen how it is, you won't get anything like a fair hearing here.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry freeing <a href="/wiki/Muggle-borns" class="mw-redirect" title="Muggle-borns">prisoners</a> from the Muggle-Born Registration Commission<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215131" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="238" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Undesirable no. 1.jpg" data-image-key="Undesirable_no._1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20141122215131" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215131" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20141122215131" decoding="async" width="150" height="238" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Undesirable no. 1.jpg" data-image-key="Undesirable_no._1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20141122215131" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Undesirable_no._1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry labelled as "Undesirable No. 1" by the Ministry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Having found no leads regarding the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> over the summer, Harry discovered <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">R.A.B.</a> during the trio's first morning at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>. Once Hermione remembered that the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_locket" class="mw-redirect" title="Slytherin&#39;s locket">locket</a> had been in the house during its occupation by the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, Harry summoned <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>, and they learned that it had been stolen by <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a>. When the trio questioned him about it, he revealed that it was now in the possession of <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>. On the same day, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> had been to visit. He asked Harry if he could join them, but once Harry found out that <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Tonks</a> was pregnant, he refused. This caused a temporary rift between the two of them.
</p><p>For the following month, the trio would take turns under the Invisibility cloak to watch the Ministry entrance. On 2 September after formulating their plans, they managed to infiltrate the Ministry. Using <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> Harry transformed into Albert Runcorn. Once inside the Ministry it became apparent that the <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">trio</a> did not plan well enough, as they focused all their attention on how to get in and not what they were going to do once inside. Harry searched Umbridge's office but did not find the locket. He did, however, take <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody%27s_magical_eye" title="Alastor Moody&#39;s magical eye">Moody's eye</a> from her door. Finding Umbridge trying Muggle-borns for "stealing" magic, Hermione managed to trick Umbridge into revealing the locket, and she lied about how she obtained it.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424032414" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter&#39;s Patronus saving Marry Cattermole.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter&#39;s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424032414" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424032414" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424032414" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter&#39;s Patronus saving Marry Cattermole.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter&#39;s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424032414" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry casting his stag Patronus at Dementors, right before capturing Slytherin's locket</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Furious, Harry stunned both her and <a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Yaxley</a>. He and Hermione freed the Muggle-borns who were being held by the <a href="/wiki/Muggle-Born_Registration_Commission" title="Muggle-Born Registration Commission">Muggle-Born Registration Commission</a>, and Hermione <a href="/wiki/Doubling_Charm" title="Doubling Charm">conjured a copy</a> of the locket while they took the real thing. They met up with Ron again and escaped, though Yaxley grabbed Hermione’s arm while they were Disapparating. She evaded him with a <a href="/wiki/Revulsion_Jinx" title="Revulsion Jinx">Revulsion Jinx</a>, but the location of 12 Grimmauld Place was revealed to him, and they were forced to abandon it as a hide-out. But instead Hermione took them to the woods that were once the location of the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_World_Cup" title="Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a>.
</p>
<h4><span id="Ron's_departure"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron.27s_departure">Ron's departure</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=77" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Ron&#039;s departure">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=77" title="Edit section: Ron&#039;s departure"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I thought you knew what you’d signed up for.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>Yeah, I thought I did too.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>So what part of it isn't living up to your expectations? Did you think we’d be staying in five-star hotels? Finding a <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> every other day? Did you think you’d be back to Mummy by Christmas?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>We thought you knew what you were doing! We thought Dumbledore had told you what to do, we thought you had a real plan!</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry and Ron have a nasty row before the latter's departure<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>After securing <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_locket" class="mw-redirect" title="Slytherin&#39;s locket">Slytherin's locket</a>, the three friends took turns wearing it, to ensure it was not lost. The locket had a negative influence on all of them, straining relations and causing them to all act moody and inclined to get into petty arguments. They overheard a <a href="/wiki/Goblin" title="Goblin">goblin</a> saying that the sword protected by <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> was a fake. They learned that the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a> in Snape's office was a copy of the real sword, and that they would have to trace the location of the real sword.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry ron fight.gif" data-image-key="Harry_ron_fight.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140905115741" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140905115741" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry ron fight.gif" data-image-key="Harry_ron_fight.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140905115741" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_ron_fight.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> row before Ron abandons the hunt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> were excited at knowing what object they could use to destroy Horcruxes, but the locket's negative energy pushed Ron over the edge. Knowing that they now had something they were not close to destroying, Ron and Harry got into a horrible row. Ron accused Harry of not knowing what he was doing and not being very concerned when they learned that <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> had been punished for attempting to steal Gryffindor’s sword for them, along with <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>. Ron then abandoned his friends accusing Hermione of preferring Harry to himself.
</p><p>Ron’s departure left both Harry and Hermione depressed. After some listless time in which they accomplished nothing, they decided to head to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, as Harry wanted to visit his parents graves, and Hermione had convinced herself that <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> might have entrusted the Sword of Gryffindor to <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>, a magical historian who lived there and who had been friendly with the <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">Potters</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore_family" title="Dumbledore family">Dumbledores</a>.
</p>
<h4><span id="Attack_at_Godric's_Hollow"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Attack_at_Godric.27s_Hollow">Attack at Godric's Hollow</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=78" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Attack at Godric&#039;s Hollow">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=78" title="Edit section: Attack at Godric&#039;s Hollow"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1997)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1997)">Attack at Godric's Hollow (1997)</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Meanwhile, we went to Godric's Hollow and, let's think, what happened there, Harry? Oh yes, You-Know-Who's snake turned up, it nearly killed both of us and then <a href="/wiki/You-Know-Who" class="mw-redirect" title="You-Know-Who">You-Know-Who</a> himself arrived and missed us by about a second.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>What?</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Hermione recounts the attack at Godric's Hollow<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Godric%27s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209020022" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Godric&#39;s Hollow graveyard Pottermore.png" data-image-key="Godric&#39;s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Godric%27s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020022" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Godric%27s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209020022" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Godric%27s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020022" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Godric&#39;s Hollow graveyard Pottermore.png" data-image-key="Godric&#39;s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/99/Godric%27s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020022" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Godric%27s_Hollow_graveyard_Pottermore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione visiting James' and Lily's grave while in <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They arrived on <a href="/wiki/24_December" title="24 December">Christmas Eve</a>. After seeing the <a href="/wiki/Potter_memorial" title="Potter memorial">memorial</a> dedicated to his parents and himself, Harry and Hermione searched the graveyard for the <a href="/wiki/James_and_Lily_Potter%27s_grave" title="James and Lily Potter&#39;s grave">Potters's grave</a> and came across the grave of <a href="/wiki/Kendra_Dumbledore" title="Kendra Dumbledore">Kendra</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ariana_Dumbledore" title="Ariana Dumbledore">Ariana Dumbledore</a> and that of <a href="/wiki/Ignotus_Peverell" title="Ignotus Peverell">Ignotus Peverell</a>. Harry was filled with regret that Dumbledore had not shared this connection with him. Upon discovering Harry's parents's grave Hermione called out to him and comforted Harry when he reached the grave. After placing a conjured wreath of flowers on his parents’s graves, the two then met <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>, who motioned for them to follow her into her home. Believing Bathilda wanted to give him Gryffindor's Sword, Harry accompanied her upstairs alone when she indicated that Hermione should stay downstairs.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest?cb=20130219230228" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="NaginiCombat.gif" data-image-key="NaginiCombat.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20130219230228" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest?cb=20130219230228" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20130219230228" decoding="async" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="NaginiCombat.gif" data-image-key="NaginiCombat.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20130219230228" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:NaginiCombat.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Nagini attacking Harry in Bathilda Bagshot's cottage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once there, she questioned Harry in what he did not realise was <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>, revealing herself to in fact be <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, Voldemort's snake. Voldemort had murdered Bathilda and animated her corpse to hide Nagini, who attacked Harry, biting and coiling herself around Harry. <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> raced upstairs and repelled the snake, while Harry's scar burned, alerting him to Voldemort’s approach. The pair managed to <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">escape</a>, but Harry was knocked unconscious and such a close call with Voldemort caused the connection to re-open and Harry had a vision of his parents' demise. And in the scuffle, <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">Harry's wand</a> was accidentally broken by Hermione's <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a>.
</p>
<h4><span id="Ron's_return_and_obtaining_the_Sword_of_Gryffindor"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron.27s_return_and_obtaining_the_Sword_of_Gryffindor">Ron's return and obtaining the Sword of Gryffindor</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=79" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Ron&#039;s return and obtaining the Sword of Gryffindor">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=79" title="Edit section: Ron&#039;s return and obtaining the Sword of Gryffindor"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Ron, stab it, </i>STAB IT!<i> </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry and Ron confronting Voldemort's locket Horcrux<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912132225" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Patronus doe.gif" data-image-key="Patronus_doe.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912132225" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912132225" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912132225" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Patronus doe.gif" data-image-key="Patronus_doe.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912132225" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Patronus_doe.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry being led by a <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">doe Patronus</a> to the hiding place of the Sword of Gryffindor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After escaping Voldemort, Harry and Hermione camped out in the <a href="/wiki/Forest_of_Dean" title="Forest of Dean">Forest of Dean</a>, where Hermione healed Nagini’s bite with <a href="/wiki/Dittany" title="Dittany">Dittany</a>. When they were camped out there, Harry and Hermione read parts of <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>'s biography of Dumbledore, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore">The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore</a></i> which Hermione had stolen from the home of Bathilda Bagshot. Upon reading, Harry felt betrayed, because <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> had not shared this information with him. Hermione tried to convince Harry that Dumbledore had his best interests at heart, but Harry became quite disillusioned.
</p><p>A couple nights later, while standing guard outside the tent, Harry was lead by a silver doe Patronus to a frozen pool into which someone had placed the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a>, which leads Harry to strip to his underwear and jump in the pool. While trying to acquire the sword, the locket attempted to strangle him, but he was rescued by <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, who had returned through the use of his <a href="/wiki/Deluminator" title="Deluminator">Deluminator</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Locket destruction.gif" data-image-key="Locket_destruction.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140807061926" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140807061926" decoding="async" width="245" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Locket destruction.gif" data-image-key="Locket_destruction.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140807061926" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Locket_destruction.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron destroying the locket Horcrux with the Sword of Gryffindor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the <a href="/wiki/Destruction_of_Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Destruction of Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Locket">brief intense skirmish</a>, the Horcrux created disturbing imagery, as a last line of defence. Ron was showed his deepest fears, such as spiders and telling him that he was the least loved by his mother who craved a daughter. The final taunt was creating apparitions of Harry and Hermione. The naked Harry and Hermione began to kiss passionately angering Ron, who then destroyed the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> with the sword, casting the two away. As Ron had saved his life, Harry forgave him for leaving and after seeing the Horcrux torture Ron, explained that he had no feelings for <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> beyond that of a sibling. Hermione, who had been inside the tent during the destruction of the Horcrux, was angry with Ron for a longer period.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Visit_to_the_Lovegood_House">Visit to the Lovegood House</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=80" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Visit to the Lovegood House">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=80" title="Edit section: Visit to the Lovegood House"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>‘There were once three brothers who were travelling along a long, winding road at twilight — </i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>Midnight, our mum always told us. Sorry, I just think it’s a bit spookier if it’s midnight!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Yeah, because we really need a bit more fear in our lives.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The reading of <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard </a></i> at the Lovegood House<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141031144607" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141031144607" decoding="async" width="245" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20141031144607" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio speaking with Xenophilius Lovegood at his home, near the village of <a href="/wiki/Ottery_St_Catchpole" title="Ottery St Catchpole">Ottery St Catchpole</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/30_December" title="30 December">30 December</a> at Hermione's request, the three friends travelled to <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>’s <a href="/wiki/Lovegood_House" title="Lovegood House">home</a> to question <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a>. They asked about a triangular symbol Dumbledore had left them to decipher in the book he bequeathed to Hermione. After learning of the Deathly Hallows, Harry, Ron, and Hermione discovered that Xenophilius summoned <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> in an attempt to persuade them to return his abducted daughter. The trio <a href="/wiki/Ambush_at_the_Lovegood_House" title="Ambush at the Lovegood House">escaped</a> the Death Eaters when Hermione blasted the floor open to show them Harry, but managed to keep Ron's alibi of being sick at home with <a href="/wiki/Spattergroit" title="Spattergroit">spattergroit</a> intact by covering him with the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility Cloak</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c2/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811152758" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c2/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811152758" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c2/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811152758" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c2/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811152758" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c2/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811152758" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-harry_hermione.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione arguing with a listless Harry over his obsession with the Deathly Hallows</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry soon became obsessed by the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>. He spent everyday brooding over the possibilities, forgetting about his responsibilities. With Harry's new found obsession with the Hallows, he became more and more withdrawn and listless. He came to believe that the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> was enclosed within the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a> bequeathed to him by Dumbledore. He also surmised that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> was abroad in a search for the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>. This obsession troubled his friends, and with the drop in Harry's attentiveness Ron's leadership qualities flourished.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=81" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=81" title="Edit section: Skirmish at Malfoy Manor"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>You're a lying, you filthy Mudblood, and I know it! You have been inside my vault at Gringotts! Tell the truth, </i>tell the truth!<i> What else did you take? What else have you got? Tell me the truth or, I swear, I shall run you through with this knife! What else did you take, what else? ANSWER ME! </i>CRUCIO<i>!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Overheard parts of Bellatrix's interrogation of Hermione Granger<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>After listening to a broadcast of <i><a href="/wiki/Potterwatch" title="Potterwatch">Potterwatch</a></i> around Easter 1998, Harry determined that Voldemort was seeking the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>, and accidentally broke the <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo</a> on Voldemort's name. Captured by a gang of Snatchers led by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a>, the trio were questioned about who they were. <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> had previously hit Harry in the face with a <a href="/wiki/Stinging_Jinx" title="Stinging Jinx">Stinging Hex</a> in an attempt to conceal their true identities, but it all amounted to nothing as the Snatchers then found the Sword of Gryffindor. After Greyback and <a href="/wiki/Scabior" title="Scabior">Scabior</a> realised that they had caught Harry Potter, the trio were taken to <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a> in Wiltshire. The Snatchers decided to forgo taking Harry to the Ministry, but instead to Voldemort directly.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622054635" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="136" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Bellatrix duels Snatchers.gif" data-image-key="Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20140622054635" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622054635" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20140622054635" decoding="async" width="235" height="136" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Bellatrix duels Snatchers.gif" data-image-key="Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20140622054635" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Bellatrix_duels_Snatchers.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Bellatrix Lestrange incapacitating <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a> at Malfoy Manor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> learned that Harry had been caught, she immediately sought to summon Voldemort. She planned to do this, until she noticed one of the Snatchers had the Sword of Gryffindor, which was supposed to be in her vault at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a>. From her drastic change in tone of voice and her worries that they would all perish, Harry determined that another Horcrux was hidden there, as well. Bellatrix isolated Hermione for interrogation based on the knowledge that she was <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a>, stating that she wished to talk "girl to girl with her" and proceeded to brutally torture her with the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>. While being tortured Hermione lied, claiming that the Sword was just a copy. Harry convinced <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> (a goblin prisoner) to support this story, knowing that Bellatrix would interrogate Griphook next, as she would want a goblin's opinion on the Sword.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209020454" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C23M1.jpg" data-image-key="B7C23M1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020454" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209020454" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020454" decoding="async" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C23M1.jpg" data-image-key="B7C23M1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020454" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C23M1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> dropping the chandelier, allowing the prisoners time to escape</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In panic as Hermione screamed in pain upstairs, and Ron sobbed at hearing her, Harry called out for help — a cry heard by <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a> through a fragment of a two-way mirror in the cellar. Aberforth sent Dobby the house-elf to rescue the prisoners. Harry had him take <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a> to <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>, while he and Ron went to rescue Hermione. On the way, they had to fight <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, whose silver hand strangled him to death when he hesitated to hurt Harry, who reminded him that he had once saved his life. A skirmish ensued upstairs, during which Harry took <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy%27s_wand" title="Draco Malfoy&#39;s wand">Draco Malfoy's wand</a> from him, and he and Ron saved Hermione and Griphook with Dobby's assistance.
</p>
<h4><span id="Dobby's_death"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Dobby.27s_death">Dobby's death</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=82" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Dobby&#039;s death">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=82" title="Edit section: Dobby&#039;s death"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i><a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>, no, don't die, don't die —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Dobby</b>: "<i>Harry... Potter....</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Dobby's final moments in Harry's arms<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
