</div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest?cb=20180811153728" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dobby death.gif" data-image-key="Dobby_death.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811153728" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest?cb=20180811153728" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811153728" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dobby death.gif" data-image-key="Dobby_death.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811153728" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dobby_death.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dobby dying in Harry's arms on the beach at Shell Cottage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As they escaped <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a> by Apparition, <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> threw a silver dagger to where they were Disapparating. Harry was initially relieved to realise he had managed to apparate to <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a> with Ron, Hermione, and Dobby in tow, but was horrified to see the knife protruding from the elf's chest. Harry managed to lie him on the grass, where Dobby collapsed and died in Harry's arms his last words being Harry's name. Luna (whom he saved) told him it was better to close his eyes so he'd be sleeping.
</p><p>Harry decided that he would not dig <a href="/wiki/Dobby%27s_grave" title="Dobby&#39;s grave">Dobby's grave</a> with magic, opting instead to do so manually, using a shovel. This was his way of both repaying Dobby's bravery and ebbing his own grief, as his time, effort, and sweat went into the grave. As he dug, he got glimpses of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> furiously punishing Bellatrix Lestrange, the Malfoys, and the others that were present in the manor for their failure to keep him in their custody and allowing him and the other prisoners to escape.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Shell_cottage_grave.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811140929" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Shell cottage grave.jpg" data-image-key="Shell_cottage_grave.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Shell_cottage_grave.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811140929" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Shell_cottage_grave.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811140929" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Shell_cottage_grave.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811140929" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Shell cottage grave.jpg" data-image-key="Shell_cottage_grave.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Shell_cottage_grave.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811140929" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Shell_cottage_grave.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in front of Dobby's grave after having dug it without the use of <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry, his scar now burning temptingly threatening to have Voldemort's thoughts engulf him, was finally able to learn control of denying Voldemort's entry into his mind. He attributed this to his grief and love for Dobby. While digging the grave, more understanding came to Harry. He realised that though the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> were tempting objects, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> had tasked him with destroying <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. He decided to trust Dumbledore, reaffirming his faith in his mentor. During the <a href="/wiki/Funeral_of_Dobby" title="Funeral of Dobby">funeral</a>, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> gave a short eulogy to Dobby, and Harry managed to say his final goodbye to one of his most loyal friends.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shell_Cottage_and_Gringotts_break-in">Shell Cottage and Gringotts break-in</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=83" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Shell Cottage and Gringotts break-in">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=83" title="Edit section: Shell Cottage and Gringotts break-in"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>He can have it after we've used it on all of the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. I'll make sure he gets it then. I'll keep my word... I won't be lying... really.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger </b>: "<i>I don't like it.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Nor do I, much.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The solution to Griphook's demand for the Sword of Gryffindor<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108172400" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108172400" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108172400" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108172400" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108172400" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-255.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry speaking with Griphook about what lies within the Lestrange vault at Gringotts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Following the death of Dobby, Harry, Ron, and Hermione stayed at <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a> for some time. During their stay, the trio formed a plan to break into the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a> to obtain the Horcrux within, with the help of <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a>. Due to the fact that Griphook would only help in exchange for Godric Gryffindor's Sword, Harry decided to word his request so that the handover would not take place until after Harry had used it to dispose of the remaining Horcruxes. Harry also found out information regarding the Elder Wand from <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Ollivander</a>. He learned that his hunch that <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a> was real and that Voldemort was going abroad to search for it was correct. Harry also learned some complex <a href="/wiki/Wandlore" title="Wandlore">wandlore</a>, such as what happens when a wand's allegiance changes to that of another individual and that a wand's allegiance doesn't necessarily have to change hands through murder, as most (including <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>) believed.
</p><p>Although feeling guilty for the deception, Harry knew that the sword was their only known weapon against the Horcruxes. The other residents of Shell Cottage could not fail to notice the trio's behaviour. <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> took Harry aside and advised Harry to be cautious when making deals with Griphook who Harry was increasingly disliking. Around the same time, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> came to Shell Cottage bearing tidings of new birth. He asked Harry to be the godfather of his newborn child, <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Edward Lupin</a>. It seemed as if the incident between them at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> had never occurred.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Break-In_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" class="mw-redirect" title="Break-In of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)">Break-In of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<p>The trio and Griphook left Shell Cottage early on the morning of 1 May to break into Gringotts. Hermione disguised herself as notorious Death Eater <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, using <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a>. The goal was to try and fool the goblins at Gringotts into believing that it was really Bellatrix who was entering the vault. The trio had Bellatrix's wand that Harry had captured at Malfoy Manor as further proof for the disguise. Ron was <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfigured</a> to look like a foreign wizard named Dragomir Despard, and Harry had Griphook on his shoulders; both were under the Invisibility Cloak.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Hermione_%26_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160808233726" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione &amp; Ron In Disguise.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_&amp;_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Hermione_%26_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160808233726" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Hermione_%26_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160808233726" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Hermione_%26_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160808233726" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione &amp; Ron In Disguise.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_&amp;_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Hermione_%26_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160808233726" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_%26_Ron_In_Disguise.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione impersonating Bellatrix Lestrange (Harry and Griphook under the <a href="/wiki/Invisibility_cloak" title="Invisibility cloak">Invisibility cloak</a>)</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Their plan proceeded reasonably well; Hermione made a convincing Bellatrix, despite a close encounter with a <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eater</a> named <a href="/wiki/Travers" title="Travers">Travers</a>, whose suspicions seemed to be eased and accompanied the group to Gringotts. Two human guards there had <a href="/wiki/Probity_Probe" title="Probity Probe">Probity Probes</a> that detected concealment charms, and Harry used a <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confundus Charm</a> on them to get Hermione passed unchecked. Inside, the Goblins requested Bellatrix's identification. When Hermione hesitated, one nervously said that her wand was sufficient proof, though Hermione claimed it was new. Harry suspected the goblins knew that Bellatrix's wand was stolen and were looking for an impostor.
</p><p>Griphook told Harry to use the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>, he complied and <a href="/wiki/Bogrod" title="Bogrod">Bogrod</a> then accepted the wand as being correct. Bogrod requested the <a href="/wiki/Clankers" title="Clankers">Clankers</a>, and then led the trio, Griphook, and Travers into a passageway. The door slammed shut, and Harry sent Travers away to hide. Bogrod, still under the Imperius curse, summoned a cart that descended deep within Gringotts. After many twists and turns, the cart passed through <a href="/wiki/Thief%27s_Downfall" title="Thief&#39;s Downfall">Thief's Downfall</a>, a security waterfall that washed away all illusion charms. When the cart overturned and dumped them out, Hermione and Ron had been reverted to themselves. Griphook believed the other Goblins knew they were impostors, but Harry wanted to continue and cursed Bogrod again.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 243px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306203301" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="241" height="121" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Lestrange Vault searching.gif" data-image-key="Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140306203301" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306203301" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140306203301" decoding="async" width="241" height="121" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Lestrange Vault searching.gif" data-image-key="Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ef/Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20140306203301" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Lestrange_Vault_searching.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry searches for Hufflepuff's Cup inside the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_vault" class="mw-redirect" title="Lestrange vault">Lestranges' vault</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio and Griphook found the vault guarded by an aged, half-blind dragon. Griphook subdued it using the Clankers. Hearing pursuit approaching, Harry forced Bogrod to open the vault, which was filled with precious objects. Hermione screamed in pain, and they discovered that the vault's protective charms included the <a href="/wiki/Flagrante_Curse" title="Flagrante Curse">Flagrante</a> and <a href="/wiki/Doubling_Charm" title="Doubling Charm">Gemino curses</a>: the contents would multiply and become searing hot every time something was touched. Harry spotted <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, the Horcrux, but it was out of reach. Hermione levitated Harry by the ankle and he snagged the Cup by using Gryffindor's Sword, as to not be burned by the metal. Meanwhile Hermione, Ron, Griphook, and Bogrod all struggled to stay above the searing-hot rapidly multiplying objects below.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png/revision/latest?cb=20170204081124" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="122" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ukrainian Ironbelly .png" data-image-key="Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170204081124" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png/revision/latest?cb=20170204081124" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170204081124" decoding="async" width="240" height="122" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ukrainian Ironbelly .png" data-image-key="Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170204081124" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ukrainian_Ironbelly_.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio escaped Gringotts on the back of a half-blind Ukrainian Ironbelly</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As Harry was setting himself down, he dropped both the Sword and the Cup. Griphook grabbed <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" class="mw-redirect" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword">Gryffindor's Sword</a>, and flipped Hufflepuff's cup up into the air. Harry caught it, ignoring the searing heat. Borne by a treasure avalanche spilling from the now-opened vault, Griphook ran off with Gryffindor's Sword, yelling that thieves were in the vault. Harry, Hermione, and Ron hurled curses at the Goblin throng. Harry released the <a href="/wiki/Ukrainian_Ironbelly" title="Ukrainian Ironbelly">half-blind dragon</a> and the three jumped on its back. The freed dragon took flight, the three blasting holes into the ceiling for it to fly through as they made their escape.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_Hogwarts"><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=84" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Battle of Hogwarts">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=84" title="Edit section: Battle of Hogwarts"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Dumbledore left the three of us a job, and we weren't supposed to tell — I mean, he wanted us to do it, just the three of us.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Neville Longbottom</b>: "<i>We're his army. Dumbledore's Army. We were all in it together, we’ve been keeping it going while you three have been off on your own... Everyone in this room’s been fighting and they’ve been driven in here because the Carrows were hunting them down. Everyone in here’s proven they’re loyal to Dumbledore — loyal to </i>you<i>.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The trio's return to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> and the D.A.'s loyalty to Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20161206055316" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="154" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-image-key="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161206055316" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20161206055316" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161206055316" decoding="async" width="235" height="154" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-image-key="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161206055316" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hogsmeade.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio Apparate into <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> before the start of the final battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>A vision from Voldemort helped Harry realise that the third Horcrux, whilst unbeknownst to him at the time, <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Ravenclaw&#39;s Diadem">Ravenclaw's Diadem</a>, remained at Hogwarts. Harry, Ron, and Hermione set out on their final mission to return to the school and obtain the diadem, inadvertently tripping the <a href="/wiki/Caterwauling_Charm" title="Caterwauling Charm">Caterwauling Charm</a> upon Apparating to Hogsmeade and thereby alerting the waiting <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> to their presence. Due to the trio being under the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility cloak</a>, however, the Death Eaters resorted to unleashing <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> into the streets to try to force the intruders out of hiding.
</p><p>Having no choice, Harry conjured his <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> to protect himself and his friends, automatically giving away their position and confirming their identities (the Death Eaters having been pre-warned that Harry Potter's Patronus took the form of a stag). As Death Eaters began to close in on the still invisible trio, <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a> emerged from the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head" class="mw-redirect" title="Hog&#39;s Head">Hog's Head</a>, hurriedly telling the three to enter his pub. While Harry, Ron, and Hermione did so, Aberforth remained outside, proclaiming to the Death Eaters that it was he who tripped the alarm (by letting his cat out) and conjured the Patronus to ward off the Dementor threat; mockingly contradicting a Death Eater, saying that what he had seen was a goat Patronus rather than a stag. The incensed Death Eaters believed this and retreated.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/D.a._in_1998.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912131959" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="D.a. in 1998.gif" data-image-key="D.a._in_1998.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/D.a._in_1998.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912131959" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/D.a._in_1998.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912131959" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/D.a._in_1998.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912131959" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="D.a. in 1998.gif" data-image-key="D.a._in_1998.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/D.a._in_1998.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140912131959" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:D.a._in_1998.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> members in the Room of Requirement welcome Harry back on 1 May</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After Aberforth re-entered his pub and home, he scolded them for coming to Hogsmeade advising them to leave the country. After Harry engaged in a brief and fierce argument with him, he led the grateful trio directly into Hogwarts through a secret entrance behind the portrait of his deceased sister, <a href="/wiki/Ariana_Dumbledore" title="Ariana Dumbledore">Ariana Dumbledore</a>. <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> (acting as their escort) then guided them into the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a>, where they were enthusiastically greeted by the reconstituted Dumbledore's Army; most of which were beaten and bruised, yet ready to fight the Death Eaters controlling the school. Harry tried to tell them that he, Ron, and Hermione only returned to find something, but Neville contacted other allies with a call to arms. Harry was initially reluctant to allow the others to help, as he had developed trust issues. But in an attempt to be a better man than Dumbledore (whom he feared he was turning into) and after some discussion with Ron and Hermione, he allowed it.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161205042523" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="157" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" data-image-key="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161205042523" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161205042523" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161205042523" decoding="async" width="235" height="157" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" data-image-key="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161205042523" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Luna entering <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw_Tower" title="Ravenclaw Tower">Ravenclaw Tower</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry hesitantly asked the room at large if they had ever heard of any sort of legendary artefact belonging to one of the Founders of Hogwarts. <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> then elaborated on the fabled Diadem of Ravenclaw, pronouncing that a statue in Ravenclaw Tower depicted <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw" title="Rowena Ravenclaw">Rowena Ravenclaw</a> wearing a diadem. Harry, having no idea of what the diadem looked like, was led by Luna to the Ravenclaw Common Room to observe the statue. Here the pair were ambushed by <a href="/wiki/Alecto_Carrow" title="Alecto Carrow">Alecto Carrow</a> who pressed her Dark Mark immediately upon noticing Harry, summoning Voldemort, before Luna stunned her from under the Invisibility cloak. <a href="/wiki/Amycus_Carrow" title="Amycus Carrow">Amycus Carrow</a> attempted to force his way through the common room door, designed only to open after the door-knocker's question was correctly answered, by seeking the help of <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>, who easily allowed him entry by solving the door's riddle herself; by that time, Harry had managed to rejoin Luna under the Invisibility cloak.
</p><p>Amycus (in fear of his master's wrath) suggested framing Alecto's apparently mistaken summoning of the former on the <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaw</a> students; as he did, he spontaneously devised a lie that made it seem as though the students had forced Alecto to touch her <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> at wand-point. In her outrage, McGonagall strongly insinuated that Amycus was a coward for proposing such an idea and that she would not allow it. Carrow spat in McGonagall's face in retaliation, utterly enraging Harry who suddenly revealed himself while momentarily casting the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on the surprised Carrow. The curse sent Amycus flying backwards into the wall where he crumpled and fell unconscious. Harry then told McGonagall about the mission Dumbledore had left him, and she offered to hold Voldemort and his invading forces off, buying him the time he needed to search for the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>. All students of age, the D.A., and the members of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> who had arrived to fight prepared themselves for the impending siege. The Battle of Hogwarts began as Voldemort and his army approached the outer boundaries of the school.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140901002635" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH2 Minerva Molly suits of armour.gif" data-image-key="DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140901002635" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140901002635" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140901002635" decoding="async" width="245" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH2 Minerva Molly suits of armour.gif" data-image-key="DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140901002635" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH2_Minerva_Molly_suits_of_armour.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">McGonagall, Mrs Weasley, and the suits of armour prepare for battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/2_May" title="2 May">2 May</a>, <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> upon arrival at Hogwarts, demanded that the school turn over Harry, and the Battle of Hogwarts began. Harry realised that the positioning of Alecto Carrow in Ravenclaw Tower confirmed the Horcrux's identity. It was the lost diadem of Ravenclaw. After thinking on it for some seconds, he went to ask the <a href="/wiki/Helena_Ravenclaw" title="Helena Ravenclaw">Grey Lady</a> about the diadem. From her information, Harry surmised that the Horcrux had been hidden in the Room of Requirement. Harry, in the meantime, was worried about Hermione and Ron, who seemed to have disappeared. They had gone into the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>, where Hermione destroyed <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup">Helga Hufflepuff’s Cup</a> with basilisk fangs, which were one of the few weapons able to destroy Horcruxes.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_the_Room_of_Requirement" title="Skirmish at the Room of Requirement">Skirmish at the Room of Requirement</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Harry_and_Draco.png/revision/latest?cb=20170204081554" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="97" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry and Draco.png" data-image-key="Harry_and_Draco.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Harry_and_Draco.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170204081554" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Harry_and_Draco.png/revision/latest?cb=20170204081554" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Harry_and_Draco.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170204081554" decoding="async" width="240" height="97" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry and Draco.png" data-image-key="Harry_and_Draco.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Harry_and_Draco.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20170204081554" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Draco.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio escaping from <a href="/wiki/Fiendfyre" title="Fiendfyre">Fiendfyre</a> that was cast by Vincent Crabbe</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio quickly headed for the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> where Harry remembered seeing the Diadem the previous year. However, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a> ambushed them. After a skirmish, the entire room was destroyed by the cursed fire Crabbe unleashed but could not control. Harry managed to fly himself and Malfoy out, while Ron and Hermione grabbed Goyle, but Crabbe perished in the flames that also destroyed the diadem. With one Horcrux remaining, Harry, Ron, and Hermione continued their pursuit of <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, but before they could go search for it, they witnessed the death of <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a>. This incensed Ron and Harry, but Hermione reminded them that only they could finish Voldemort and that to obtain the final Horcrux they would have to do their share of fighting.
</p>
<h4><span id="Snape's_death"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Snape.27s_death">Snape's death</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=85" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Snape&#039;s death">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=85" title="Edit section: Snape&#039;s death"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Finally, the truth. Lying with his face pressed into the dusty carpet of the office where he had once thought he was learning the secrets of victory, Harry understood at last that he was not supposed to survive. His job was to walk calmly into Death's welcoming arms.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry comes to the realisation that he must die by Voldemort's hand<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215347" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="126" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" data-image-key="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141122215347" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215347" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141122215347" decoding="async" width="240" height="126" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" data-image-key="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20141122215347" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a>'s last moments, during which he gives Harry his memories</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They fought their way to the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>. Along the way, Harry witnessed many scenes of horror. On the grounds, Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> were waiting. After having seen so much pain and death, Harry could not summon the happiness required to conjure a <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a>. In fact, Harry welcomed the oblivion that would come with the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a>. But, after seeing the patronuses conjured by <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ernest_Macmillan" title="Ernest Macmillan">Ernie Macmillan</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a>, Harry summoned the will to conjure his and managed to drive the Dementors away.
</p><p>Once the trio arrived at the Shrieking Shack, they witnessed Voldemort order Nagini to kill Snape, as he believed that Snape was preventing him from being the true owner of the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>. Dumbledore was the previous owner of the wand, and as Snape killed him, Voldemort believes with Snape's demise, he will finally gain true mastery of the wand. Before he died, Snape gave Harry memories to view in the Pensieve and asked him to look into his eyes. Upon returning to the castle, Harry saw the corpses of <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a> near Fred's, and he felt devastated. He left his friends behind to use Albus Dumbledore's Pensieve, welcoming the time in another's head to distract him from what was happening in his own.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209050615" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter DH using Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore&#39;s_Pensieve.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209050615" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209050615" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209050615" decoding="async" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter DH using Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore&#39;s_Pensieve.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/25/Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209050615" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_DH_using_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry using <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve" class="mw-redirect" title="Albus Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve">Dumbledore's Pensieve</a> to view Snape's memories during the one-hour armistice</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During a one-hour ceasefire, Harry viewed the memories given by a dying Snape, which revealed to him that he had inadvertently been turned into a <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> himself. This occurred when Voldemort attempted to murder him as a baby. Because Lily Potter's loving sacrifice made Voldemort's Killing Curse rebound and a fragment of his soul latched itself onto the only living thing it could find: Harry himself. This led to the awful truth being revelled, that Voldemort had to kill him in order to be rendered <a href="/wiki/Immortality" title="Immortality">mortal</a>. Harry was unwillingly tethering Voldemort to life.
</p><p>Harry also learned that Snape was, all along, with Dumbledore because he loved <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">Lily Evans</a>, since before they started school. It was clear that Harry's life span had always been determined by how long it took to get rid of the Horcruxes, and that it was an elegant plan not to waste any more lives but to give the tasks to the boy who had already been marked for death, and whose death would not be tragic but simply another blow against <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>. Heavy of heart, Harry courageously slipped off on his own to carry out this dreadful task. He felt ghostly as he strode through the castle's empty halls, feeling as if he was already dead.
</p>
<h4><span id="Harry's_&quot;Death&quot;"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Harry.27s_.22Death.22">Harry's "Death"</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=86" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Harry&#039;s &quot;Death&quot;">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=86" title="Edit section: Harry&#039;s &quot;Death&quot;"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>As Harry passed the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>, he could not see <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, or the other <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasleys</a>, nor <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>. He felt he would have given anything for one last look at them, but then he thought he would never be able to stop looking. He also came to realise that Luna had become one of his closest and dearest friends. During his way to Voldemort, he saw the corpse of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a>, who snuck back into the castle to fight despite being underage and remarked that Colin looked "tiny in death". Harry in a moments decision told <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a> to slay <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, if he could, as Ron and Hermione might be too busy to do so. He passed Ginny, who was comforting a small girl, and almost wished she could have seen him, but under the Invisibility cloak, this was impossible. As he passed Hagrid's hut on the Grounds, he emotionally remembered his trips there, particularly rock cakes, Ron vomiting slugs, and baby dragon <a href="/wiki/Norberta" title="Norberta">Norbert</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry&#39;s sacrifice.gif" data-image-key="Harry&#39;s_sacrifice.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140616170544" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140616170544" decoding="async" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry&#39;s sacrifice.gif" data-image-key="Harry&#39;s_sacrifice.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140616170544" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry willingly lets Voldemort hit him with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry then entered the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, where he managed to open the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a>, which said on it, "<i>I open at the close</i>"; and the words to open it were, "I'm about to die"; this revealed the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> contained within. Harry used it to speak to the spirits of his parents, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, and Remus Lupin, who gave him comfort and courage before he met Voldemort and offered to shield him from the Dementors. They set off, and the Dementor's chill did not overcome him; his companions acted like Patronuses, and Harry continued deeper in the forest to find Voldemort. As Harry approached the Death Eater camp, he dropped the Resurrection Stone. Harry offered no resistance as Voldemort struck him with the Killing Curse. His last thoughts were of Ginny: her red hair, blazing looks, and the feel of her lips upon his before everything went black.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Limbo">The Limbo</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=87" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: The Limbo">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=87" title="Edit section: The Limbo"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215404" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry and Albus limbo.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215404" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215404" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215404" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry and Albus limbo.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215404" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">limbo</a> speaking with a deceased Albus Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, the "death" he met was not permanent: the blood Voldemort had taken from Harry to restore his physical form in 1995 still contained the <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">Bond of Blood</a>, anchoring him to life and protecting Harry from Voldemort's curse, and his willingness to die triggered <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">protections</a> on the people of Hogwarts similar to the protections he received from his mother's sacrifice. Also, since he had part of Voldemort's soul in him, Voldemort's Killing Curse unknowingly destroyed the part of Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Soul" title="Soul">soul</a>, leaving one Horcrux left. Harry entered a state of limbo, where he met the spirit of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> and the piece of Voldemort's soul that had just been destroyed. Dumbledore explained everything to Harry saying that he had "<i>no more secrets from Harry</i>". After reconciling with his mentor, Harry made the choice to return to the physical world rather than go on to the afterlife with Dumbledore.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Endgame">Endgame</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=88" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Endgame">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=88" title="Edit section: Endgame"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>There are no more <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. It's just you and me. Neither can live while the other survives, and one of us is about to leave for good.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Lord Voldemort</b>: "<i>One of us? You think it will be you, do you, the boy who has survived by accident, and because Dumbledore was pulling the strings?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>You won't be killing anyone else tonight. You won't be able to kill any of them ever again.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; The final confrontation between two mortal enemies<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215447" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="108" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" data-image-key="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215447" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215447" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215447" decoding="async" width="250" height="108" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" data-image-key="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215447" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Narcissa_Malfoy" title="Narcissa Malfoy">Narcissa Malfoy</a> telling Voldemort and the gathered Death Eaters that Harry is "dead"</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry woke up, but feigned death. He was assisted in this by Narcissa Malfoy, who had secretly turned against Voldemort by telling him Harry was dead in order to protect her <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">son</a>, because she knew the only way she would be permitted to enter Hogwarts was with the rest of the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> in their victory march. Voldemort then triumphantly disgraced Harry's "dead" body with the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> then forced <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> to carry Harry's body back to Hogwarts, proclaiming Harry dead and demanding surrender. At first, the surviving fighters were heartbroken, especially Ron, Hermione, Ginny, and Professor McGonagall. They screamed abuse at the Death Eaters in anger, remaining defiant. Harry's apparent death had spurred the defenders of Hogwarts on.
</p><p><a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> courageously stood up to Voldemort, and when the latter offered Neville a rank in his Death Eater society, Neville proudly refused and screamed to the high heavens, "<i>Dumbledore's Army!</i>" Voldemort cast the <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a>, then Summoned the Sorting Hat and placed it upon Neville's head. After he announced that there would be no houses and that the school colours would be those loyal to <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>, he caused the hat to burst into flames. As Neville cried in pain, a distant uproar came from the direction of the school boundaries. <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">Centaurs</a>, <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">thestrals</a>, <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> the <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriff</a>, Hagrid's half brother <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a>, and the families of the Hogwarts students who remained to fight, plus the shop and home keepers of Hogsmeade joined the fight with a flourish.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160608040611" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="139" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hogwarts Big Battle at Hogwarts Moment Pottermore.jpg" data-image-key="Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160608040611" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160608040611" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160608040611" decoding="async" width="245" height="139" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hogwarts Big Battle at Hogwarts Moment Pottermore.jpg" data-image-key="Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160608040611" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hogwarts_Big_Battle_at_Hogwarts_Moment_Pottermore.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort gloating over Harry's 'death', Neville slays <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, and the second half of the battle breaks out</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>This distracted Voldemort and his Death Eaters, and Neville was able to pull off the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a>, and from its depths he received the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a> and sliced off Nagini's head in one swift, fluid motion. Harry slipped away in the ensuing mêlée under the Invisibility Cloak. Death Eaters started to fold under sheer weight of numbers as the house-elves in the kitchens joined the battle, with <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> at its front, declaring war against the Dark Lord in the name of brave <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">Regulus Black</a>. Using his Invisibility Cloak, Harry protected the defenders of Hogwarts from attack, deflecting Voldemort's curses. Soon, only Voldemort and Bellatrix Lestrange were the only two remaining and fighting, with Voldemort duelling <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a>, <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Slughorn</a>, and Kingsley at once, and Bellatrix duelling <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>. Harry was torn between the two until he saw a Killing Curse aimed at Ginny, the latter missing death by a mere inch.
</p><p>Harry redirected his path to Bellatrix, until being roughly knocked aside by <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a>, who duelled and ultimately killed Bellatrix. Voldemort's fury at the fall of his last, best lieutenant exploded with the force of a bomb and Harry turned in to see McGonagall, Slughorn, and Kingsley blasted backwards in pain and Voldemort directing his wand at Molly. Harry then cast a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a> to protect her from Voldemort's wrath, revealing himself for the final duel.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Voldemort%27s_Last_Stand" title="Voldemort&#39;s Last Stand">Voldemort's Last Stand</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" decoding="async" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's final defeat of Lord Voldemort and the end of the Second Wizarding War</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Unbeknownst to Voldemort, mastery of the Elder Wand, which he had stolen from Dumbledore's grave, had not been taken from Dumbledore by Snape, but by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, because Draco had disarmed Dumbledore on the night of his murder, before Snape killed him. Thus, when Harry had disarmed Malfoy in <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a> weeks earlier, he had become the true master of the Elder Wand.
</p><p>When Harry and Voldemort faced off for the last time, Harry tried to tell him this and about the other mistakes he had made. Harry also asked him to feel some remorse for his actions, which Voldemort instantly rejected. Voldemort cast the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>, and Harry countered with the <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Disarming Charm</a>. The Elder Wand refused to attack its master, and the Killing Curse rebounded, destroying Voldemort once and for all.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ea/After_battle.gif/revision/latest?cb=20180811150046" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="After battle.gif" data-image-key="After_battle.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ea/After_battle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811150046" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ea/After_battle.gif/revision/latest?cb=20180811150046" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ea/After_battle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811150046" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="After battle.gif" data-image-key="After_battle.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ea/After_battle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811150046" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:After_battle.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The battle-worn trio the morning after the battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Immediately, Harry was surrounded by overjoyed fellow fighters; Hermione and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> reached him first, and then Ginny, Neville, and Luna. Victory celebrations began and Harry was an indispensable part of the grief and celebration. 
</p><p>The trio visited <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore%27s_portrait" title="Albus Dumbledore&#39;s portrait">Albus Dumbledore's portrait</a>, and along the way he explained everything to his two best friends. Harry decided to prevent the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> from ever being reunited again by keeping the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a>, leaving the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> where it lay in the Forbidden Forest, and returning the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a> to Dumbledore's grave, but not before using it to fix his wand.
</p><p>When Voldemort destroyed the piece of his soul residing in Harry, Harry lost the ability to speak <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-83" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-83">&#91;83&#93;</a></sup> It is possible, however, that he regained the ability later.
</p>
<h3><span id="After_Hogwarts_(1998-2006)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="After_Hogwarts_.281998-2006.29">After Hogwarts <span class="template-c">(1998-2006)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=89" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: After Hogwarts (1998-2006)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=89" title="Edit section: After Hogwarts (1998-2006)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Accio Quote!">"<i>Harry and his friends have their own history depicted on Chocolate Frogs cards.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;The trio are honoured with their own Chocolate Frog Cards<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Accio_Quote!" title="Accio Quote!">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest?cb=20140628034720" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="152" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Potter family1.png" data-image-key="Potter_family1.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140628034720" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest?cb=20140628034720" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140628034720" decoding="async" width="240" height="152" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Potter family1.png" data-image-key="Potter_family1.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140628034720" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potter_family1.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ginny Potter with their three children</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry ensured that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>'s portrait was hung in the <a href="/wiki/Headmaster%27s_office" class="mw-redirect" title="Headmaster&#39;s office">Headmaster's office</a> at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-84" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-84">&#91;84&#93;</a></sup> He also made occasional visits to the school to give lectures to the students on <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>. At some point the trio were featured on <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog_Card" title="Chocolate Frog Card">Chocolate Frog Cards</a> for their accomplishments.
</p><p>Harry was also on "Christmas card" terms with his cousin <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley Dursley</a> and his family, and occasionally visited him, which were occasions dreaded by his own children.<sup id="cite_ref-85" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-85">&#91;85&#93;</a></sup> Harry also made peace with his former rival <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, something that his father and his friends were never able to do with Severus Snape. They were civil towards each other; however, their schoolboy enmity meant that they were still not friends at this stage.
</p><p>Also following the war, he aided in the care of his godson, <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a>, thus fulfilling the role that his own godfather, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, never got to play. Harry and Teddy eventually became very close. Harry's children commented that they wanted Teddy to move in with the family, Harry mentioned that Teddy had already been coming to their home for dinner four times a week, and that he was practically living with them as it was.<sup id="cite_ref-86" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-86">&#91;86&#93;</a></sup> The <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">Potters</a> were also thrilled at the idea that Teddy, who was seen snogging <a href="/wiki/Victoire_Weasley" title="Victoire Weasley">Victoire Weasley</a> (the eldest daughter of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Weasley</a>) might officially become a part of their family.
</p>
<h3><span id="Career_as_an_Auror_(2007-2016)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Career_as_an_Auror_.282007-2016.29">Career as an Auror <span class="template-c">(2007-2016)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=90" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Career as an Auror (2007-2016)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=90" title="Edit section: Career as an Auror (2007-2016)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Accio Quote!">"<i>Harry and Ron utterly revolutionised the Auror Department in — at the Ministry of Magic. So they — I mean, they are now the consummate — they are experts... And by the time — 19 years later — I would imagine that Harry is heading up that department, which is not corrupt in any way. </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> regarding Harry's career after the war<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Accio_Quote!" title="Accio Quote!">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>At the end of the Second Wizarding War, Harry was recruited by the new <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a> and became an Auror at the Ministry of Magic. Kingsley permitted those who had fought in the final battle to become Aurors without getting their <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.s</a>, as surviving such a battle satisfied the skill and character requirements.<sup id="cite_ref-Pottercast_87-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Pottercast-87">&#91;87&#93;</a></sup> Along with his friend <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>, Harry was considered an expert and helped reform and revolutionise the Auror department and the rest of the Ministry, along with <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, who became a high ranking official in the Department of Magical Law Enforcement.<sup id="cite_ref-TODAY_57-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-TODAY-57">&#91;57&#93;</a></sup> In <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Harry became the Head of the Auror Office at the age of 26 or 27.<sup id="cite_ref-WOTM_56-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WOTM-56">&#91;56&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="2014_Quidditch_World_Cup">2014 Quidditch World Cup</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=91" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: 2014 Quidditch World Cup">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=91" title="Edit section: 2014 Quidditch World Cup"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png/revision/latest?cb=20180318021353" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="166" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The Potters at the 2014 Quidditch World Cup final.png" data-image-key="The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20180318021353" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png/revision/latest?cb=20180318021353" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20180318021353" decoding="async" width="235" height="166" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The Potters at the 2014 Quidditch World Cup final.png" data-image-key="The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20180318021353" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_Potters_at_the_2014_Quidditch_World_Cup_final.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and his children at the <a href="/wiki/2014_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="2014 Quidditch World Cup">2014 Quidditch World Cup</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had married Ginny likely sometime before 2005, but certainly by 2014.<sup id="cite_ref-88" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-88">&#91;88&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-PM_89-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-89">&#91;89&#93;</a></sup> By 2017, the couple had three children of their own: two sons <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius</a> and <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a>, and one daughter <a href="/wiki/Lily_L._Potter" title="Lily L.
