Potter">Lily Luna</a>. Harry attended the final of the 427th Quidditch World Cup in early July of 2014 in the <a href="/wiki/Patagonian_Desert" title="Patagonian Desert">Patagonian Desert</a>. Harry, James, and Albus joined Ginny Potter, who had been in Patagonia since the start of the Cup, in her capacity of special <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> correspondent to the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-90" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-90">&#91;90&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Harry along with his family (including Teddy Lupin) and <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> were granted access to the VIP section of the campsite. Harry embraced <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, who was competing again after being retired for a few years, upon meeting him and introduced him to his sons, James and Albus.<sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_91-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-91">&#91;91&#93;</a></sup> He supported Bulgaria in the match together with the rest of his family (save for Albus) and looked "emotional" when Viktor Krum and his team had won the match. While at the game Harry also sported a nasty cut over his right cheekbone, which was a result of his top-secret work for the <a href="/wiki/Auror_Office" title="Auror Office">Auror Office</a>.
</p><p>On <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a>, <a href="/wiki/2014" title="2014">2014</a> Rita Skeeter launched a book at <a href="/wiki/Flourish_and_Blotts" title="Flourish and Blotts">Flourish and Blotts</a> titled <i>Dumbledore's Army: The Dark Side of the Demob</i>, regarding the lives of the members of Dumbledore's Army. The book according to Rita's description, seemed to focus on the D.A. members "imperfections". Harry and Ginny were featured on the front cover, Harry trying to hide their faces behind his hand. Rita also wrote a mostly fictionalised biography about Harry, with an unnamed title.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Calamity">Calamity</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=92" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Calamity">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=92" title="Edit section: Calamity"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814032717" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="130" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Potter family.gif" data-image-key="Potter_family.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140814032717" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814032717" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140814032717" decoding="async" width="245" height="130" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Potter family.gif" data-image-key="Potter_family.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140814032717" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potter_family.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with his family at King's Cross Station in 2017 escorting his sons to <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform 9¾</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On 1 September, 2017 Harry and Ginny took their three children to <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a> to see James and Albus off to Hogwarts. There, they met Ron and Hermione and their two children, Harry's niece <a href="/wiki/Rose_Granger-Weasley" title="Rose Granger-Weasley">Rose</a> and nephew <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Granger-Weasley" title="Hugo Granger-Weasley">Hugo</a>. When Albus expressed a fear that he might be Sorted into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Houses" title="Hogwarts Houses">House</a>, Harry told his son that Albus was named after two Hogwarts Headmasters of whom one was a Slytherin and "<i>probably the bravest man</i> [he] <i>ever knew.</i>" Harry assured him that his parents would be proud of him regardless of where he was Sorted. He also told him that the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> would take his preferences into consideration, which happened to him when he was being Sorted. This was a secret he had never shared with his other children.
</p><p>Shortly after, Harry was the leader of the members of the <a href="/wiki/Statute_of_Secrecy_Task_Force" title="Statute of Secrecy Task Force">Statute of Secrecy Task Force</a>, an emergency response team established by the <a href="/wiki/International_Confederation_of_Wizards" title="International Confederation of Wizards">International Confederation of Wizards</a> with the help of the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a> to deal with a series of large-scale breaches of the <a href="/wiki/International_Statute_of_Wizarding_Secrecy" title="International Statute of Wizarding Secrecy">International Statute of Wizarding Secrecy</a> known as the <a href="/wiki/Calamity" title="Calamity">Calamity</a>, who pursued a career as an Auror, congratulating those who decided to chose the profession of an Auror for their brilliant choice but warning them that it could either be the best or worst job depending on their abilities. He would introduce to the Aurors the common <a href="/wiki/Weakening_Hex" title="Weakening Hex">Weakening Hex</a> which lowers the damage their enemies cause along with practising duelling in sessions, where although he was able to outmatch them, their valiance allowed them to come out with increased power in their spells. For those pursuing a Profession as Magizoologists, Harry gave them a lesson on maintaining confidence that eventually resulted in him teaching them the <a href="/wiki/Bravery_Charm" title="Bravery Charm">Bravery Charm</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-92" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-92">&#91;92&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>After an article about his work with the Task Force was published in the <i>Daily Prophet</i>, several of Harry's belongings became foundables. Hermione suspected that this had to do with the article.<sup id="cite_ref-93" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-93">&#91;93&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id="Head_of_the_Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement_(2017-)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Head_of_the_Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement_.282017-.29">Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement <span class="template-c">(2017-)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=93" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement (2017-)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=93" title="Edit section: Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement (2017-)"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Cursed Child">"<i>Love blinds. We have both tried to give our sons, not what they needed, but what we needed. We've been so busy trying to rewrite our own pasts, we've blighted their present.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry realising his mistakes in regards to his second son<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Cursed_Child" title="Harry Potter and the Cursed Child">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rising_tensions">Rising tensions</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=94" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Rising tensions">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=94" title="Edit section: Rising tensions"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>When Harry picked Albus up from <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross" class="mw-redirect" title="King&#39;s Cross">King's Cross</a>, who had returned from a year at Hogwarts, he was surprised to find Albus distant and colder. This distance was in direct response to the pressure Albus felt regarding Harry's legacy and the expectations that others put on him because of it. Albus and Scorpius Malfoy became fast friends during the year, as they were kindred spirits — they both carry a burden stemming from their family identity and feel that they are misfits and “losers” in comparison with the other students at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. Harry did not like this and he questioned why Albus was content to have only the one friend. Their relationship would stay strained for the next couple of years to come.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Platform_farewell.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802023303" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Platform farewell.jpg" data-image-key="Platform_farewell.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Platform_farewell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160802023303" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Platform_farewell.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802023303" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Platform_farewell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160802023303" decoding="async" width="245" height="108" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Platform farewell.jpg" data-image-key="Platform_farewell.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Platform_farewell.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160802023303" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Platform_farewell.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry seeing James, Lily, and Rose off to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, while Albus stands off to the side</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/September" title="September">September</a> <a href="/wiki/2018" title="2018">2018</a>, Harry took Albus to King's Cross again. He was hurt when Albus told him he wanted to be alone. This stemmed from all the pedestrians watching the two, Albus felt as though they were watching the famous Harry Potter and "his disappointing son". Harry told him not to be bothered by people looking and thought his friendship with <a href="/wiki/Scorpius_Malfoy" title="Scorpius Malfoy">Scorpius Malfoy</a>, the child of his rival, was the reason why Albus wanted nothing to do with him. Harry then demanded Albus sever their friendship, but his son refused.
</p><p>In September 2019, Harry took Albus to King's Cross yet again where he gave Albus the permission slip he needed to visit Hogsmeade. Albus destroyed the slip by burning it, stating that he had no wish to go to Hogsmeade and left his father behind. This in turn caused Harry to become angry with him. Their father-son relationship continues to deteriorate, going from bad to worse.
</p><p>By late summer of <a href="/wiki/2020" title="2020">2020</a>, Harry had been made Head of the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Department of Magical Law Enforcement</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-CC152_94-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CC152-94">&#91;94&#93;</a></sup> After hearing a rumour about an illegal and very powerful <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a>, Harry and his team of Aurors raid the Nott residence and confiscate it. The Time-Turner was supposedly made by Nott for Lucius Malfoy, who was paying him for his services. Harry turns over the Time-Turner to Hermione, the Minister for Magic, for safekeeping. While in his office, laden with paperwork he and Hermione spoke about recent activity among Voldemort's former allies and how action must be taken.
</p>
<h4><span id="Amos_Diggory's_request"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Amos_Diggory.27s_request">Amos Diggory's request</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=95" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Amos Diggory&#039;s request">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=95" title="Edit section: Amos Diggory&#039;s request"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/63/Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png/revision/latest?cb=20160801032349" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="235" height="164" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry gives blanket to Albus.png" data-image-key="Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/63/Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20160801032349" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/63/Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png/revision/latest?cb=20160801032349" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/63/Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20160801032349" decoding="async" width="235" height="164" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry gives blanket to Albus.png" data-image-key="Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/63/Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20160801032349" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_gives_blanket_to_Albus.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry gifting Albus with his old baby blanket</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was later visited at home by <a href="/wiki/Amos_Diggory" title="Amos Diggory">Amos Diggory</a>, who had heard he might have the Time-Turner. Whom he supposedly learned this information from is unknown. While Albus and <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphi Diggory</a> (who claimed to be Amos' carer and niece) listened in, Amos demanded Harry go back in time and save Cedric. Amos proceeded to tell Harry that Cedric was more then a spare and that he deserved a chance to life a full life. However, Harry refused due to the implications of intervening greatly with the past, as changing the past can have severe consequences on the future. This caused Amos to react negatively, calling Harry cold. Later that night Harry attempted to reconcile with Albus.
</p><p>Harry's relationship with Albus had strained increasingly since he had left for Hogwarts. In an effort to mend things, Harry spoke to Albus and tried to give him the old baby blanket he received from his mother <a href="/wiki/Lily" title="Lily">Lily</a>. He did this in the hope a reminder of what happened would make him change his behaviour. This was a significant and sentimental gift on Harry's part, as it was the only physical piece of his mother that he had. When Albus rejected the gift, it led to an argument in which they both expressed the wish that they were not related. Harry regretted what he said, but it was too late to take it back.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Harry_nightmare.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802020855" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="136" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry nightmare.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_nightmare.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Harry_nightmare.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802020855" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Harry_nightmare.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802020855" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Harry_nightmare.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802020855" decoding="async" width="240" height="136" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry nightmare.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_nightmare.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Harry_nightmare.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802020855" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_nightmare.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's awoken from a nightmare after his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">scar</a> pains him for the first time in many years</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry began to experience nightmares and pains in his scar, something that he had not experienced since his final defeat of Voldemort. Ginny tried to comfort him and proceeded to ask what was wrong. When Harry explained, they decided to let <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> know. Harry took his scar hurting to be an ominous sign and it left him with many worries concerning his son and the outcome of the future.
</p><p>He and Hermione held a public meeting, but the community was not convinced there is a threat, as they were not willing to accept that danger was once again imminent. Draco accused Harry of only wanting his name in the papers and proceeded to storm out of the public meeting. Later on Harry, <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, and Draco then learnt that Albus and Scorpius were missing. This prompted Draco to start a duel with Harry, Ginny was quick to interrupt it, before it got out of hand. They had decided to retrieve the Time-Turner and help Amos save Cedric. Ginny concluded Albus ran away after his argument with Harry, and <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco</a> was upset that Scorpius had been pulled into their family issues.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Searching_for_Albus_Potter">Searching for Albus Potter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=96" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Searching for Albus Potter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=96" title="Edit section: Searching for Albus Potter"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Albus and Scorpius's time-travelling antics created two separate alternate timelines. This was something that could have disastrous effects for everyone. In one, Harry received a dream revealing Albus's location in the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>. As he and the others searched, Harry came across the centaur <a href="/wiki/Bane" title="Bane">Bane</a>. Bane warned him that a "dark cloud" haunted Albus. He took this "dark cloud" to mean Scorpius and his doubts regarding his son's friendship with him strengthened even more. He, Ron, and Ginny found the boys just after they return from the past. Scorpius was uninjured, but Albus sustained a broken arm.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Harry_dumbledore%27s_portrait.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802021138" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="141" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry dumbledore&#39;s portrait.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_dumbledore&#39;s_portrait.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Harry_dumbledore%27s_portrait.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802021138" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Harry_dumbledore%27s_portrait.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802021138" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Harry_dumbledore%27s_portrait.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802021138" decoding="async" width="240" height="141" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry dumbledore&#39;s portrait.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_dumbledore&#39;s_portrait.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Harry_dumbledore%27s_portrait.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802021138" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_dumbledore%27s_portrait.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry conversing with the portrait of Albus Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Albus was brought to the school's hospital wing, where Harry conversed with a portrait of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>. After Harry aired decades of pent-up emotion left over from the horrors of his childhood and Dumbledore reassuring him he did what he though was best for Harry's well being at the time, the portrait advised him to see Albus as he is. Harry demanded that Albus break off his association with Scorpius. He even went so far as to bully Headmistress <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a> into using the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a> to keep them apart. This was something that he would not normally do. Harry's worry for his son had intensified so much that it blinded him to the bigger picture.
</p><p>When Albus and Scorpius went time travelling again, Harry and Ginny received a visit from Draco. He and Harry argued about their children, which resulted in a premature wizards' <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duel</a>. When Ginny intervened and reminded them their children were missing, Draco surprised them by explaining how lonely he was at Hogwarts and how lucky Harry was to have such great friendships.
</p><p>Harry and Draco finally gained a mutual respect for one another, and looked upon each other as friends. When Draco speaks of the great bond and sacrifices he has made for Scorpius and his late wife, Harry finally realised he was dangerously isolating Albus. They returned to Hogwarts, where Harry apologised to <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> and they attempted to locate the boys, ultimately discovering that they had the Time-Turner.
</p><p>However, in the other timeline, Albus and Scorpius had created a world where Harry had died at the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>. Fortunately, with the help of the alternate Hermione, Ron and <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, Scorpius managed to salvage the original timeline and returned both Harry, and Albus to life. Harry visited Albus in his dormitory where despite his anger, he manages to plant the seed for a reconciliation with Albus.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 242px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/Harry_Albus_argue.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802021000" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="240" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Albus argue.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Albus_argue.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/Harry_Albus_argue.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802021000" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/Harry_Albus_argue.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802021000" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/Harry_Albus_argue.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802021000" decoding="async" width="240" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Albus argue.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Albus_argue.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/Harry_Albus_argue.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20160802021000" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Albus_argue.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry visiting Albus in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> and the two begin to reconcile</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Later, Harry and his friends learn that Albus and Scorpius were missing again and were last seen with Delphi. They went to see Amos to find out what he knows, and found out he had been <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confunded</a> by Delphi into believing she was his niece and carer.
</p><p>Searching the room for clues to find out Delphi's true identity, they stumbled upon a prophecy that, if fulfilled, would enable the return of Voldemort, and realised Delphi's true identity as Voldemort's secret daughter with <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>. However, since they did not know where in time Delphi, Albus, and Scorpius were, they could only bide their time and wait.
</p>
<h4><span id="Skirmish_at_St_Jerome's_Church"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_at_St_Jerome.27s_Church">Skirmish at St Jerome's Church</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=97" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Skirmish at St Jerome&#039;s Church">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=97" title="Edit section: Skirmish at St Jerome&#039;s Church"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_St_Jerome%27s_Church" title="Skirmish at St Jerome&#39;s Church">Skirmish at St Jerome's Church</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<p>At home, Harry looked at the blanket he had tried to give Albus. He noticed writing on it, and found out it was a message sent by Albus from the past. He and Ginny noticed the date, being 30 October, 1981 — one day before the night that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> murdered Harry's parents. They alerted Ron and Hermione. Draco, who joined in, secretly revealed to them that his family had a Time-Turner that would be more potent and valuable than the one seized by the Ministry, which was merely a prototype and thus not as desirable to a true <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eater</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802231655" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="131" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Potterplay.jpg" data-image-key="Potterplay.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160802231655" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802231655" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160802231655" decoding="async" width="245" height="131" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Potterplay.jpg" data-image-key="Potterplay.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20160802231655" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potterplay.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, Ron, Draco, and others travelling back in time to assist Albus and Scorpius</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They travelled back in time to join Albus and Scorpius. However, under Ginny's prodding, they realised that Delphi did not to want to kill baby Harry, but rather to stop Voldemort from doing so in the hope he would live and his reign would continue. Delphi thought she could make her father stronger as he would know love when he met her, which its lacking was what had originally led to his downfall.
</p><p>Everyone agreed they had to <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">transfigure</a> Harry to look like Voldemort in the hope that they could fool Delphi and hinder her in saving the real Voldemort. They picked Harry because he not only knew Voldemort well through the connection they shared when he was a Horcrux, but he now also understood Parseltongue again.
</p><p>Delphi pleaded with her "father" to recognise her, which Harry managed before the transfiguration spell came undone. However, when Delphi sees she had been set up, she engaged in a fierce duel with Harry, who is later joined by his friends and Albus. They managed to subdue her and she pleaded that she only wants to know her father. A surprised Harry explained that this would not be possible; they cannot change the past.
</p><p>Upon hearing the real Voldemort arrive to kill Harry's parents, Delphi tried calling out to him, but Hermione and Malfoy silenced her and sent her back to present day. Harry decided to watch the scene of his parents' murder once more, with Albus by his side, to provide a sense of closure for them. They later returned to the present when a devastated <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> arrived at the scene to bring Harry to the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Visiting_the_dead">Visiting the dead</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=98" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Visiting the dead">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=98" title="Edit section: Visiting the dead"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Back at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, Albus is asked by Harry to join him one afternoon for a hike up a steep hill. Harry revealed that he had brought Albus to Cedric Diggory's grave, which he regularly visits so he could apologise for his role in his death.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Physical_appearance">Physical appearance</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=99" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Physical appearance">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=99" title="Edit section: Physical appearance"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Accio Quote!">"<i>Harry has his father's and mother's good looks.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> comments on Harry's appearance<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Accio_Quote!" title="Accio Quote!">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 151px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150725151406" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="149" height="208" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/149?cb=20150725151406" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150725151406" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/149?cb=20150725151406" decoding="async" width="149" height="208" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/149?cb=20150725151406" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first year</a>, age 11</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was a near-spitting image of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(disambiguation)" title="James Potter (disambiguation)">his father</a>, having inherited his untidy jet-black hair. However, his almond-shaped startlingly green eyes were identical to those of <a href="/wiki/Lily_J._Potter" title="Lily J. Potter">his mother</a>. This strong resemblece was often remarked on by those who had known his parents.  
</p><p>Harry's physique as a boy was described as "small and skinny", with a thin face and knobbly knees. This skinniness was due to his poor quality of life in his childhood. Despite the neglect he suffered, Harry seems to have grown at the same rate as James. When he was fifteen he was within an inch of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> at the same age, and when he was seventeen he was exactly the same height his father was, and James was often described as tall. Harry was so much like his father that Harry mistook his future self for him while saving Sirius’s life from the Dementors, although his father was then dead. 
</p><p>Harry wore round-rimmed glasses, peculiarly similar to his father's glasses. During his time hunting Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux-making_spell" title="Horcrux-making spell">Horcruxes</a>, Harry's black hair grew shoulder length as was described when he saw his reflection in <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a>. This was due to his preoccupation with the hunt for the Horcruxes and his lack of interest in his physical appearance, it is the longest his hair has ever been.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 154px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180528175859" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="152" height="207" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter movies hbp promostills 6.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/152?cb=20180528175859" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180528175859" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/152?cb=20180528175859" decoding="async" width="152" height="207" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter movies hbp promostills 6.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/152?cb=20180528175859" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his <a href="/wiki/Sixth_year" title="Sixth year">sixth year</a>, age 16</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Upon Harry's forehead, covered by his unruly black hair, was a <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">scar</a> shaped like a lightning bolt. The scar was a result of the failed (and famed) <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> cast on him by <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> when he was an infant. It burned painfully whenever Voldemort was near Harry or feeling particularly strong emotions, but this stopped after Voldemort's death and was reduced into an ordinary scar.
</p><p>Harry also had a faint scar on the back of his right hand which said, <i>"I must not tell lies".</i> This scar was caused while Harry spent detentions with <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>, who forced him to use the <a href="/wiki/Black_Quill" title="Black Quill">Black Quill</a> that carved the words into the back of his hand. In addition, Harry has an oval-shaped scar over his heart where the locket-Horcrux seared his skin during the confrontation with <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> in <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>'s house, <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>.
</p><p>When possessed by Lord Voldemort at the end of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, Harry's eyes became somewhat glassy green in appearance, and his voice became a mixture of his own and Voldemort's.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 143px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150811184025" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="141" height="220" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Epilogue 1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/141?cb=20150811184025" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150811184025" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/141?cb=20150811184025" decoding="async" width="141" height="220" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Epilogue 1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dc/Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/141?cb=20150811184025" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Epilogue_1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Middle aged Harry Potter</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had "great skin" and never suffered from zits.<sup id="cite_ref-couric_95-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-couric-95">&#91;95&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>At age 33, Harry already had "<i>a couple of threads of silver</i>" in his hair, according to <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> gossip columnist <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_91-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-91">&#91;91&#93;</a></sup> In the summer of <a href="/wiki/2014" title="2014">2014</a>, Harry made an appearance in the <a href="/wiki/Patagonian_Desert" title="Patagonian Desert">Patagonian Desert</a>, where he would attend the final of the <a href="/wiki/2014_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="2014 Quidditch World Cup">427th Quidditch World Cup</a> with his family, sporting a nasty cut over his right cheekbone, which was a result of his top-secret work for the <a href="/wiki/Auror_Office" title="Auror Office">Auror Office</a>. At the age of 40, it is cited by Moaning Myrtle that Harry seems to have gotten more handsome in his older age.<sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_91-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-91">&#91;91&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personality_and_traits">Personality and traits</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=100" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Personality and traits">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=100" title="Edit section: Personality and traits"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Accio Quote!">"<i>I see Harry as someone who is struggling to do the right thing, who is not without faults, who acts impetuously as you would expect someone of his age to act, but who is ultimately a very loyal person, and a very very courageous person. So, in as much as he has qualities that I admire most I would say he is a good role model. That doesn't mean that he is saintly, but then frankly, who is? But I think you do see enough of Harry’s inner life, the workings of his mind in the books to know that he is ultimately human, struggling to do the right thing, which I think is admirable.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> on why Harry's an excellent role model<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Accio_Quote!" title="Accio Quote!">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Harry was an extremely brave, loyal, and selfless person who possessed tremendous strength of character. He willingly went to what he truly believed to be his death, because he believed that this was the only way to defeat the Dark Lord. Harry was also marked by what <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> once deemed a "<i>weakness for heroics</i>" — he would go to great lengths and take great risks in order to help others, particularly his loved ones. Notably, this was taken advantage of by Voldemort in 1996, when he lured Harry to the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a> by making him believe that his <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">godfather</a> was in danger.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP32_96-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP32-96">&#91;96&#93;</a></sup> Harry was also very strong-willed and unafraid to stand up for himself. The fact that he was capable of repelling the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a> suggests that he had an unusually strong sense of himself and his morals.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF34_97-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF34-97">&#91;97&#93;</a></sup> Dumbledore once made parallels between Harry's traits and qualities that <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a> looked for in his own hand-picked students. He also noted that Harry's choice not to draw on those qualities really defined who he was, rather than the simple fact that he had them.<sup id="cite_ref-COS18_98-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS18-98">&#91;98&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 241px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_vault.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161215133659" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="239" height="159" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH2 Harry Potter in Bellatrix Lestrange&#39;s vault.jpg" data-image-key="DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange&#39;s_vault.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_vault.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/239?cb=20161215133659" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_vault.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161215133659" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_vault.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/239?cb=20161215133659" decoding="async" width="239" height="159" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH2 Harry Potter in Bellatrix Lestrange&#39;s vault.jpg" data-image-key="DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange&#39;s_vault.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8f/DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_vault.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/239?cb=20161215133659" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH2_Harry_Potter_in_Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_vault.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry resourcefully using the Sword of Gryffindor, as a way of retrieving Hufflepuff's cup from mounds of burning treasure</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure> 
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>Hmm. Difficult. Very difficult. Plenty of courage, I see. Not a bad mind either. There's talent, oh my goodness, yes — and a nice thirst to prove yourself, now that's interesting... So where shall I put you?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;The <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> looking into Harry's mind<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Harry was perfectly prepared to put his friends' needs and best interests first, shown by how he ended his relationship with <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, due to his concern for her well being (even though being with her was one of the best things that ever happened to him).<sup id="cite_ref-HBP30_99-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP30-99">&#91;99&#93;</a></sup> The amount of trust that Harry put into his friends was so strong that he absolutely refused to consider that any of them would betray him to Voldemort. Considering that Harry knew a person (<a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>) who had betrayed all of his closest friends to Voldemort, this proves Harry's ability to <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a> so unequivocally.
</p><p>The closeness that Harry felt for many was great enough for him to behave violently if any of them were harmed.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP36_100-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP36-100">&#91;100&#93;</a></sup> When his godfather was murdered by <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, Harry attacked her in a grief-stricken rage of righteous anger and attempted to use the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on her. He also attacked <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> after the latter murdered Dumbledore. Ironically, the only people with whom Harry ever initiated a duel were Snape and Bellatrix and he only desired to do so right after they killed someone he loved. This highlights Harry's bravery even further because Harry was fully aware that Snape and Bellatrix were two very skilled and experienced duellists, but did not hesitate to harm them as soon as he was pushed into it. This can also happen if a loved one of his is, even if it isn't true, insulted in front of him, as he so enraged he was seriously considering attacking <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> himself when he stated he believed Sirius was wrong to have treated Kreacher the way he did and that he was trying to keep Sirius alive by keeping him in 12 Grimmauld Place, as Harry believed that Dumbledore had no right, despite knowing fully well he was completely outmatched by Dumbledore, who he acknowledged to be the greatest wizard in history, but fortunately for Harry Dumbledore did not resort to such means and calmly levelled with him.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Listen to me, Harry. You happen to have many qualities Salazar Slytherin prized in his hand-picked students. His own very rare gift, <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>; resourcefulness; determination; a certain disregard for the rules...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Dumbledore discussing some of Harry's personality traits<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>However, Harry was also accused of being arrogant, in particular by Severus Snape (although Snape's perspective was skewed due to his poor relationship with James Potter, and Harry often found being famous and admired very difficult), and could be hot-tempered and impulsive. This could sometimes make him rude to authority figures such as Professor Snape and <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>. In contrast, Dumbledore stated that "<i>many teachers report that</i> [Harry's] <i>modest, likeable, and reasonably talented</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-DH_47-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-47">&#91;47&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161120064508" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg" data-image-key="Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161120064508" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161120064508" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161120064508" decoding="async" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg" data-image-key="Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161120064508" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathly-hallows1-Harry-snitch.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry brooding over the Snitch, left to him in Dumbledore's will</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was prone to moodiness and unkind remarks towards even his friends during his adolescence, though this is likely the result of the great emotional stress and trials he endured during this period. Harry displayed many signs of clinical depression throughout his mid-to-late teens, however this extended to his older life. In his mid-to-late teens, Harry showed signs of these symptoms: general discontent, guilt, hopelessness, mood swings, insomnia (nightmares), agitation, irritability, social isolation and even lack of concentration. These symptoms were continued to be well into his mid ages. It was clear that Harry received limited assistance in his depression during his adolescence, although this was possibly improved in his later life.
</p><p>Harry was also not one to let bygones be bygones. He had a vindictive streak that made him vengeful at best and spiteful at worse towards those who did him wrong. This varied from wanting to murder/torture those who had performed unforgivable acts like: Bellatrix, Voldemort, and <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> to a desire for pettiness towards: <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>, Draco Malfoy, Snape, and the Dursley's. Harry even wanted Sirius (before learning of his innocence) and Pettigrew to suffer the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_kiss" class="mw-redirect" title="Dementor&#39;s kiss">Dementor's kiss</a> for their crimes and spent the entirety of the Horcrux hunt angry at Dumbledore for the latter's lack of trust.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>You're a sharp boy, Potter.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Barty Crouch Jnr</a>'s opinion of Harry's intelligence<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Harry possessed an instinctual, intuitive intelligence. This intelligence allowed him to make intellectual leaps,  as opposed to the logical intelligence of Hermione. For example, Harry divined the truth about the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> well before Hermione would accept it.<sup id="cite_ref-DH22_101-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH22-101">&#91;101&#93;</a></sup> And although he was clever, Harry lacked intellectual curiosity. He rarely put forth effort into school work; for instance, he relied on the notes of the <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Half-Blood Prince</a> to get ahead in his sixth year <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> class rather than devoting time to studying.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_102-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-102">&#91;102&#93;</a></sup> Although he did study reasonably hard for his <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">Ordinary Wizarding Levels</a>, the only set of wizarding qualifications he sat at Hogwarts. Harry generally did his best magical work when tackling practical exams rather than theoretical ones. This could be a result of the lack of confidence that Harry developed from growing up with the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>.
</p><p>Barty Crouch Jnr (disguised as Alastor Moody) remarked that Harry possessed a streak of pride and independence that almost cost him the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>. His pride didn't allow him to ask for help regarding the problem of breathing underwater for an hour, which was required for the Second task that took place in the <a href="/wiki/Great_Lake" title="Great Lake">Black Lake</a>, was what almost cost him the competition.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF34_97-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF34-97">&#91;97&#93;</a></sup> Harry was also known for wanting to tackle challenges and obstacles on his own, without the aid or interference of others. His friends had to frequently remind him that he needed their assistance and that he "<i>did not always have to go it alone</i>".
</p><p>Harry also seemed to have a bit of an obsessive personality, a trait he shared with his arch enemy Lord Voldemort. He could be somewhat nosy and was known for sleuthing around and getting involved in things that did not concern him. For instance, during his sixth year Harry became intensely preoccupied with finding out what Malfoy was doing in his free time.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_102-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-102">&#91;102&#93;</a></sup> He also developed on unhealthy obsession with the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>, to the point where he was listless with longing for the three artefacts. This period of listlessness lasted for many weeks during the hunt for Lord Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 247px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5f/Harry_%26_Ginny_kiss.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140704030548" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="245" height="115" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry &amp; Ginny kiss.gif" data-image-key="Harry_&amp;_Ginny_kiss.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5f/Harry_%26_Ginny_kiss.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140704030548" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5f/Harry_%26_Ginny_kiss.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140704030548" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5f/Harry_%26_Ginny_kiss.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140704030548" decoding="async" width="245" height="115" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry &amp; Ginny kiss.gif" data-image-key="Harry_&amp;_Ginny_kiss.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5f/Harry_%26_Ginny_kiss.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/245?cb=20140704030548" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_%26_Ginny_kiss.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and his <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a> for Ginny Weasley, his then ex-girlfriend and future wife</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's greatest strength was his ability to feel love, despite having a miserable childhood of neglect. Harry was extremely loyal to and protective of his loved ones and that love was what allowed him to overcome Voldemort. Dumbledore noted that Harry's strength of will at resisting the temptation of the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark Arts</a>, even when granted a direct insight into Voldemort's mind and methods was due to Harry's ability to love. Harry even claimed that he felt sorry for Voldemort because of his inability to feel or understand love. Ginny, his wife, commented that he was the kindest and most loving man anyone would ever meet.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP23_103-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP23-103">&#91;103&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Albus Dumbledore noted that Harry was unfailingly kind and compassionate. This is shown by how he freed <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> from the Malfoys and by standing up for <a href="/wiki/Muggle-borns" class="mw-redirect" title="Muggle-borns">Muggle-borns</a>, <a href="/wiki/Half-blood" title="Half-blood">half-bloods</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Half-breeds" class="mw-redirect" title="Half-breeds">half-breeds</a> (like Hagrid). This is likely attributable to his childhood, during which the Dursleys deprived him of compassion and discriminated against him due to his <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magical</a> abilities. His compassionate led him to spare the life of <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphi</a>, the daughter of Lord Voldemort, despite the history between himself and the Dark Lord. Also, Harry was not a cruel person and he never wished anyone harm. He rarely initiated duels, instead fighting in self-defence. Even after Bellatrix Lestrange had murdered his godfather, Harry failed to cast the Cruciatus Curse on her. Bellatrix noted the he had failed to cast the curse properly because he had cast it out of righteous anger and not malicious intent.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP36_100-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP36-100">&#91;100&#93;</a></sup> However, he did use the Cruciatus Curse more effectively on <a href="/wiki/Amycus_Carrow" title="Amycus Carrow">Amycus Carrow</a> after he spat at and insulted <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>. In addition, he saved Peter Pettigrew from being killed by his (Pettigrew's) former friends Sirius Black and Remus Lupin, though this was not done for humanitarian reasons but for the memory of his father.
</p><p>Remus Lupin once noted that Harry had very good and nearly always right instincts.<sup id="cite_ref-DH22_101-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH22-101">&#91;101&#93;</a></sup> Harry had a strong awareness of the incalculable power of certain acts, which is never more apparent than when he refused to allow Lupin to accompany him and leave his wife and child at home and realised that Ron Weasley was meant to destroy <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_locket" class="mw-redirect" title="Slytherin&#39;s locket">Slytherin's locket</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 243px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/Harry_temper.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141002142648" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry temper.gif" data-image-key="Harry_temper.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/Harry_temper.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20141002142648" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/Harry_temper.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141002142648" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/Harry_temper.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20141002142648" decoding="async" width="241" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry temper.gif" data-image-key="Harry_temper.gif" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/03/Harry_temper.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/241?cb=20141002142648" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_temper.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry loses his temper with <a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">"Aunt" Marge</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In some ways, Harry can become extremely intimidating toward people such as: <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a>, <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a>, Hermione Granger, and Ron Weasley. It is seen that Harry can become extremely frightening when pushed to the point of anger or extreme annoyance. When in a bad mood and argumentative, even Harry's closest friends have been shown to be wary of him, usually replying to his angry tone in a calm and appeasing voice. The only person who does not appear to be afraid of him when he is angry (other than his teachers and other authority figures in his life) is Ginny Weasley. Dumbledore is a special case, as he acts fatherly towards Harry and has managed to successfully calm him down whenever he got angry with him.
</p><p>Harry seems to have good and long memory, as he remembers the motorbike ride to Privet Drive with Hagrid when he was eleven and could remember the deaths of his mother and Voldemort's laughter when the events occurred ten years earlier.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_49-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-49">&#91;49&#93;</a></sup> Despite needing glasses, Harry possessed a tremendous eyesight as well, he was able to locate the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a> (which was approximately the size of a golf ball) in a massive Quidditch field. Harry also cared very much for his children. He comforted his daughter, <a href="/wiki/Lily_L._Potter" title="Lily L. Potter">Lily Potter</a> when she was upset about not going to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. He also made sure his younger son <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Potter</a> would not be teased a lot by Harry's older son, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Potter</a>.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>Do you remember me telling you we are practising nonverbal spells, Potter?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Yes.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>Yes </i>sir<i>.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>There's no need to call me 'sir,' Professor.</i>"</dd>
<dd>&#8212; Harry being cheeky to Snape during a DADA lesson<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Although never as given to sarcasm or humour as his best friend Ron, Harry often displayed a dry wit. For instance, on finding out that <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> intended to take twelve O.W.Ls, he asked her if she planned to eat or sleep at all that year. This humour often became more cutting when applied to people Harry disliked. When threatened by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> and his cronies after the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, Harry remarked that he supposed that "<i>Lord Voldemort's just a warm-up act compared to you three?</i>", responding to Malfoy's threat that he was dead by casually commenting "<i>funny, you'd think I'd have stopped walking around</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP38_6-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP38-6">&#91;6&#93;</a></sup> Harry also displayed wittiness when he first encountered <a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a>, remarking that he was either "<i>a very large cat or quite a small tiger</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-POA4_104-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA4-104">&#91;104&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>He was also known to apply his cutting wit to Severus Snape and Dudley Dursley as well. During his first Potions lesson, Snape antagonised Harry with question after question. This was until Harry responded with "<i>I don't know. I think Hermione does, though, why don't you try her?</i>"<sup id="cite_ref-PS_49-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-49">&#91;49&#93;</a></sup> He also commented that he was surprised that Dudley was intelligent enough to know the days of the week, after Dudley stated he knew what day it was. When Harry was eleven, <a href="/wiki/Dudley" title="Dudley">Dudley</a> suggested that he and Harry should do upstairs and practise shoving heads down toilets. Harry then stated that the toilet had never had something as disgusting as Dudley's head down it. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 253px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151211030511" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="251" height="116" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry teaching the DA.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20151211030511" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151211030511" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20151211030511" decoding="async" width="251" height="116" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry teaching the DA.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20151211030511" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_teaching_the_DA.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as the leader of Dumbledore's Army, while teaching a lesson on the <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">Stunning Spell</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Although he never sought power himself and would be content with a normal life, when a situation required him to step up he would do so. Such as when he, Ron, and Hermione discovered Voldemort and Quirrell's attempt to steal the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> and his time as teacher/leader of <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>. Harry has shown not-inconsiderable leadership abilities, to the point that Dumbledore reflected that Harry was a better leader than him as he never sought power for himself but simply had to assume the mantle of leadership due to circumstances beyond his control and found in the process that he did it well.
</p><p>During his youth, Harry tended to see things in a rather stark, absolute manner, particularly when it came to the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Houses" title="Hogwarts Houses">Hogwarts Houses</a>. Harry generally regarded members of <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin House</a> as evil and therefore his enemies, while <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindors</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaw</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuffs</a> were allies. The former part could be due to his own status as a Gryffindor and that many of the Slytherins he encountered, such as Lord Voldemort, Draco Malfoy, and Severus Snape, were significant enemies of his during this period. In addition, many of his friends and allies, such as: Ron, Hermione, Dumbledore, and Hagrid, were fellow Gryffindors. However, this mentality eroded as he aged, since he encountered both allies among Slytherin, such as <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a> (and later, Snape) and enemies among the other three Houses, such as Peter Pettigrew (a fellow Gryffindor) and <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirinus Quirrell</a> (a Ravenclaw). By 2017, Harry had adopted a more moderate attitude on the Houses, telling his younger son Albus Potter that "<i>it doesn't matter to us</i>" if Albus was Sorted in Slytherin or Gryffindor. In addition, Harry named that same son after <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, whom he recounted as "<i>the bravest man</i> [he] <i>ever knew</i>".
</p><p>In the aftermath of the Secondary Wizarding War, Harry is shown to suffer from survivors guilt and also Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. These two symptoms extend into his childhood and throughout his life at Hogwarts. Because of his depression he also claims that he was supposed to die and everyone knew it, but he survived it all. He also claims that too many people died for the "Boy Who Lived" and that he wasn't worth dying for at all. Harry's depression and trauma are caused by not having removed Voldemort completely from his life. He fears that he will always allow Voldemort to have some mental and emotional control over him. 
</p><p>Harry also has shown signs of suffering from recurring clinical depression, such as his sullen and withdrawn demeanour during his mid-to-late teens as a result of the tragedies in his life. A particular symptom of this is his outrageous temper during his bouts of depression, which frighten all but Ginny by their sheer force and magnitude alone. Overall, Harry is much the same as any other soldier, struggling to carry on despite the horrors of his past and the brutality he has been a part of for so long. 
</p><p>Harry does have some fears, though he hides them extremely well from his family. In fact he hide them so well that his younger son considered his father to be utterly fearless. These fears include the dark, pigeons, small spaces, and seeing his family in danger. 
</p><p>It is commented by his son that Harry's personality is complicated and this is furthered by Ron, who calls him intense in terms of his traits and past experiences.<sup id="cite_ref-CC415_105-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CC415-105">&#91;105&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Magical_abilities_and_skills">Magical abilities and skills</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=101" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Magical abilities and skills">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=101" title="Edit section: Magical abilities and skills"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
