<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215753" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="183" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry casting the Shield Charm.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215753" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215753" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215753" decoding="async" width="250" height="183" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry casting the Shield Charm.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215753" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_casting_the_Shield_Charm.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry casting a Shield Charm during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Charm" title="Charm">Charms</a></b>: Harry achieved an 'Exceeds Expectations'<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup> on his O.W.L. exam and advanced to <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.</a>-level. He proved to be particularly talented in this subject. Harry mastered the <a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Summoning Charm</a> in only one day and often used it successfully, would occasionally cast the <a href="/wiki/Protective_enchantment" title="Protective enchantment">protective enchantments</a> that Hermione used during the Horcrux hunt<sup id="cite_ref-DH16_23-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH16-23">&#91;23&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-DH27_132-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH27-132">&#91;132&#93;</a></sup>, and was able to cast the <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confundus Charm</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH26_123-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH26-123">&#91;123&#93;</a></sup> He displayed an impressive mastery of the <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a>, surpassing that of many Ministry employees:<sup id="cite_ref-HBP6_133-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP6-133">&#91;133&#93;</a></sup> his Shield Charms were so powerful that they were able to deflect curses from Lord Voldemort himself.<sup id="cite_ref-DH36_107-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH36-107">&#91;107&#93;</a></sup> During the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a>, he was able to levitate a side-car with himself in it for a long stretch of time. He could also cast simpler charms such as the <a href="/wiki/Wand-Lighting_Charm" title="Wand-Lighting Charm">Wand-Lighting Charm</a>, <a href="/wiki/Levitation_Charm" title="Levitation Charm">Levitation Charm</a>, <a href="/wiki/Colour_Change_Charm" title="Colour Change Charm">Colour Change Charm</a>, <a href="/wiki/Banishing_Charm" title="Banishing Charm">Banishing Charm</a>, <a href="/wiki/Refilling_Charm" title="Refilling Charm">Refilling Charm</a>, <a href="/wiki/Freezing_Spell" title="Freezing Spell">Freezing Spell</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-POAG_134-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POAG-134">&#91;134&#93;</a></sup> and various others. Under the teaching of <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, Harry was able to conjure an extremely powerful corporeal stag <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> in his third year. This was a remarkable feat and yet another proof of his talent, given that many adult witches and wizards are often unable to cast this extremely difficult charm successfully.<sup id="cite_ref-PM_89-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-89">&#91;89&#93;</a></sup> As an Auror, Harry displayed the ability to use Charms in combat, especially incapacitating ones, using <i><a href="/wiki/Obscuro" title="Obscuro">Obscuro</a></i> and <a href="/wiki/Brachiabindo" title="Brachiabindo">Brachiabindo</a> when duelling Draco.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Healing_magic" title="Healing magic">Healing magic</a></b>: Harry was able to effectively cast <a href="/wiki/Healing_spell" title="Healing spell">healing spells</a>. He could perform the <i><a href="/wiki/Reparifors" title="Reparifors">Reparifors</a></i> spell in his third year. After he saw <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a> perform <i><a href="/wiki/Episkey" title="Episkey">Episkey</a></i> on his own broken nose he fixed <a href="/wiki/Demelza_Robins" title="Demelza Robins">Demelza Robins</a>' broken lip in 1996 with the same spell, which is used to treat mild to moderate injuries.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP14_135-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP14-135">&#91;135&#93;</a></sup> He could also perform the healing spell for clearing up dried <a href="/wiki/Blood" title="Blood">blood</a> from a bleeding wound.<sup id="cite_ref-DH17_70-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH17-70">&#91;70&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparition</a></b>: Harry had not earned a licence to apparate, but he used the ability frequently during 1997 and 1998 to great success, even when forced to apparate with only a few seconds' notice or while guiding others.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_47-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-47">&#91;47&#93;</a></sup> He also used apparition in his sixth year to a very impressive degree, to get himself and a weakened <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> over an incredibly vast distance even though he was inexperienced.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP26_128-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP26-128">&#91;128&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Cursed Child">"<i>Harry waves his wand and the papers and books transform into neat piles. </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry using nonverbal magic to straighten his work space<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Cursed_Child" title="Harry Potter and the Cursed Child">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Nonverbal_spell" title="Nonverbal spell">Nonverbal magic</a></b>: During <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> and <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Harry began using spells nonverbally and became quite proficient at it when Snape was not harassing him.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_47-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-47">&#91;47&#93;</a></sup> On July 31, 1997 Harry was able to light a lamp in the Weasley's sitting room with no words and a flick of his wand.<sup id="cite_ref-136" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-136">&#91;136&#93;</a></sup> As an adult, Harry displays the ability to consciously use nonverbal magic; shown when he straightened his work-space with the simple wave of his wand.<sup id="cite_ref-137" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-137">&#91;137&#93;</a></sup> He also demonstrated the use of nonverbal magic during his church duel with <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphini</a>, the two were mercilessly firing spells at each other.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Wandless_magic" title="Wandless magic">Wandless magic</a></b>: In <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> when <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> attacked in Little Whinging, <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> had knocked <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">Harry's wand</a> out of his hand when he punched him moments before. In desperation, Harry called out "<i><a href="/wiki/Wand-Lighting_Charm" title="Wand-Lighting Charm">Lumos</a></i>!" Although his wand was not in his hand, the wand tip lit up.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP1_138-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP1-138">&#91;138&#93;</a></sup> When enraged he was able to inflate Aunt Marge without a wand, possibly though unconscious use of an <a href="/wiki/Inflating_Charm" class="mw-redirect" title="Inflating Charm">Inflating Charm</a>. Few other wizards have exhibited this power, although <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> and <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> were among them. This further testifies to Harry's skill, as only some of the most powerful wizards of his time were able to do so.</li></ul>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3b/Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215913" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="127" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter Buckbeak.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3b/Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215913" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3b/Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215913" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3b/Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215913" decoding="async" width="250" height="127" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter Buckbeak.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3b/Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122215913" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_Buckbeak.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> during the first lesson of Care of Magical Creatures</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a></b>: Harry achieved an '<a href="/wiki/Exceeds_Expectations" title="Exceeds Expectations">Exceeds Expectations</a>'<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup> on his <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> exam and has shown on more than one occasion to have good skill in handling numerous sorts of magical creatures. For example, he was the first in his class to tame a <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriff</a>, which he did very excellently.<sup id="cite_ref-POA6_139-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA6-139">&#91;139&#93;</a></sup> He befriended the hippogriff, to such an extent that Buckbeak defended him when he was in danger. Harry has also shown on three occasions that he is quite competent at dealing with <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragons</a>. This is shown when he was able to help <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> take care of baby <a href="/wiki/Norberta" title="Norberta">Norbert</a> the dragon, outsmart the <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_Horntail" title="Hungarian Horntail">Hungarian Horntail</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, and tame a half-blind dragon into helping the trio escape <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a> by flying out on its back. He was also one of very few in his class who was able to see <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">Thestrals</a>, and had no trouble mounting his in June 1996. Harry was also good with <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">House-elves</a>, befriending the house-elf <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> and eventually freeing him. This act of kindness made the little elf so loyal to him that he gave his life to save him.<sup id="cite_ref-DH24_109-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH24-109">&#91;109&#93;</a></sup> He also earned the respect and loyalty of <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>, a very difficult task.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Herbology" title="Herbology">Herbology</a></b>: Harry attended <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.</a> Herbology classes. He achieved an 'Exceeds Expectations'<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup> on his O.W.L. exam, showing aptitude in the subject. In 1998, Harry was able to recognise a <a href="/wiki/Snargaluff" title="Snargaluff">Snargaluff</a> plant at the <a href="/wiki/Lovegood_House" title="Lovegood House">Lovegood House</a> and knew to gave it a wide berth of space.<sup id="cite_ref-DH20_140-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH20-140">&#91;140&#93;</a></sup> He also had knowledge of plants such as: <a href="/wiki/Devil%27s_Snare" title="Devil&#39;s Snare">Devil's Snare</a>, <a href="/wiki/Gillyweed" title="Gillyweed">Gillyweed</a>, <a href="/wiki/Venomous_Tentacula" title="Venomous Tentacula">Venomous Tentacula</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Fanged_Geranium" title="Fanged Geranium">Fanged Geranium</a> from hands on experience. He could cast plant-related spells such as the <a href="/wiki/Fire-Making_Spell" title="Fire-Making Spell">Fire-Making Spell</a><sup id="cite_ref-PSvg_141-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PSvg-141">&#91;141&#93;</a></sup>, <a href="/wiki/Severing_Charm" title="Severing Charm">Severing Charm</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Herbivicus_Charm" title="Herbivicus Charm">Herbivicus Charm</a>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Astronomy_(class)" title="Astronomy (class)">Astronomy</a></b>: Though not excellent at Astronomy, Harry was able to pass his O.W.L. exam with an '<a href="/wiki/Acceptable" title="Acceptable">Acceptable</a>'.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP5_81-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP5-81">&#91;81&#93;</a></sup> Although it was stated that he didn't finish his exam. This was due to the fact that he was distracted by <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>'s attempt to arrest <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, during the time the exam was being taken. It is not known if he was able to advance to the N.E.W.T class or not, seeing as he did not apply for advancement.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Wandlore" title="Wandlore">Wand versatility</a></b>: Harry was able to use <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_wand" title="Hermione Granger&#39;s wand">Hermione's wand</a> after his was broken during the <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1997)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1997)">Attack at Godric's Hollow</a> in 1997. He was able to use spells such as: the <a href="/wiki/Wand-Lighting_Charm" title="Wand-Lighting Charm">Wand-Lighting Charm</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a>, and the <a href="/wiki/Severing_Charm" title="Severing Charm">Severing Charm</a> at full strength, despite not having won the wand's allegiance.<sup id="cite_ref-DH19_19-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH19-19">&#91;19&#93;</a></sup> He also gained the allegiance of <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy%27s_wand" title="Draco Malfoy&#39;s wand">Draco Malfoy's wand</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>, and quite possibly <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_wand" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s wand">Voldemort's wand</a> by defeating the previous masters.</li>
<li><b>Detective skills</b>: Harry was a formidably talented investigator. While in school, he and his friends had a knack for solving difficult mysteries and discovering the truth despite all attempts by others to conceal it. Hermione generally finding the background information, while Harry put the pieces together to make a coherent picture. In his first year, Harry uncovered the truth about the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> and saved it from Voldemort. Over the next six years, he would solve the mystery of the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> and understand how the Basilisk's victims were attacked and why they did not die, but more importantly he located the entrance of the Chamber and rightly supposed that the victim of the first opening of the Chamber was <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Moaning Myrtle</a>;<sup id="cite_ref-COS15_142-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS15-142">&#91;142&#93;</a></sup> understand, with almost no clues, what Dumbledore wanted he and Hermione to do after spinning the Time Turner; find the truth about the <a href="/wiki/Prophecy" title="Prophecy">prophecy</a>; hunt down and destroy all of Voldemort's Horcruxes using his amazing deductive skills. During his sixth year, he also observed Dumbledore's memories about Voldemort and noticed things which would help him later. Harry's deductive skills also allowed him to uncover the mystery of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH22_101-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH22-101">&#91;101&#93;</a></sup> He discovered that he mastered the three of them, when even Ron and Hermione were initially sceptical of their existence. Harry also had a knack for spotting things that others did not, and had a sharp eye for details. He was able to tell that <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> had not been home in weeks by the state of her room,<sup id="cite_ref-DH21_143-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH21-143">&#91;143&#93;</a></sup> and he became suspicious when Dobby revealed that he had known that Harry was not getting any letters in <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>. His intelligence also allowed him to intuitively know that <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> had been branded with the Dark Mark despite no solid proof, that Malfoy was using the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> as a work shop, and that he was having <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Crabbe</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Goyle</a> use <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> in order to disguise themselves as girls while keeping watch outside the room.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP21_144-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP21-144">&#91;144&#93;</a></sup> He also had an eye for details and a very good memory: for instance, even in an highly stressful situation, such as the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-145" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-145">&#91;145&#93;</a></sup> he was able to remember objects he saw over a year before in the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Hidden Things</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-146" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-146">&#91;146&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>And you feel that you have exerted your very best efforts in this matter, do you? That you have exercised all of your considerable ingenuity? </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Comment regarding Harry's resourcefulness<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<ul><li><b>Resourcefulness</b>: Harry showed resourcefulness in many different situations. In his first year he impersonated the <a href="/wiki/Bloody_Baron" title="Bloody Baron">Bloody Baron</a>. Harry did this in order to warn <a href="/wiki/Peeves" title="Peeves">Peeves</a> to stay away from the third floor that night so he wouldn't inconvenience the trio on their quest to save the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS16_147-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS16-147">&#91;147&#93;</a></sup> In his second year, when encountering Professor McGonagall after hours, he lied and said that he and Ron were on their way to see Hermione in the hospital wing.<sup id="cite_ref-COS16_148-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS16-148">&#91;148&#93;</a></sup> Also in his second year, he used a <a href="/wiki/Basilisk" title="Basilisk">basilisk</a> fang to destroy <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">Riddle's Diary</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-COS17_149-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS17-149">&#91;149&#93;</a></sup> In his fourth year, he managed to escape from Voldemort and all the Death Eaters, taking Cedric Diggory's dead body with him. In his fifth year, while under interrogation from <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Umbridge</a>, he relayed a coded message to <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a>. He did this in an attempt to warn Snape and by extension the Order, that Voldemort had Sirius. In the same year, while surrounded by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> Harry came up with the plan to smash the shelves in the <a href="/wiki/Hall_of_Prophecy" title="Hall of Prophecy">Hall of Prophecy</a>. This was a distraction so that he and the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> could try and escape. During the hunt for <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>, he used the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a> as a way of retrieving <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup">Helga Hufflepuff's cup</a> from the mounds of burning treasure and used a half-blind <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragon</a> as a means to escape from <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH26_123-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH26-123">&#91;123&#93;</a></sup> Harry was also cunning enough that the Sorting Hat heavily considered Sorting him into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> house.<sup id="cite_ref-PS7_62-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS7-62">&#91;62&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>It is a curious thing, Harry, but perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it. Those who, like you, have leadership thrust upon them, and take up the mantle because they must, and find to their own surprise that they wear it well.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry's outstanding leadership skills<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/Dumbledore%27s_Army.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161123060553" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore&#39;s Army.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore&#39;s_Army.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/Dumbledore%27s_Army.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161123060553" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/Dumbledore%27s_Army.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161123060553" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/Dumbledore%27s_Army.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161123060553" decoding="async" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore&#39;s Army.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore&#39;s_Army.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/Dumbledore%27s_Army.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161123060553" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore%27s_Army.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, leader and teacher of <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b>Leadership skills</b>: While Harry never deliberately set out to be a leader to others, he had often taken charge when the situation required it. This began with his impulsive decision to find and warn Hermione about the presence of a <a href="/wiki/Troll" title="Troll">troll</a> in the school during the 1991 <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en_feast" class="mw-redirect" title="Hallowe&#39;en feast">Hallowe'en feast</a>. It progressed to the point where over thirty students, some of them in their sixth and seventh years — respect him as a teacher in <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>, despite him being younger than they were.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP18_150-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP18-150">&#91;150&#93;</a></sup> Dumbledore later noted that Harry was a superior leader to him. Dumbledore had deliberately sought power in his youth, and subsequently avoided anything more demanding than his role as <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> headmaster — while Harry had leadership thrust upon. Harry accepted the burden of command, acknowledging his responsibilities towards those who "followed" him. He did this regardless of how uncomfortable he might feel about the prospect and coordinating his efforts against his enemies well, when left with no other option but to take control.<sup id="cite_ref-DH35_20-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH35-20">&#91;20&#93;</a></sup> Harry's natural talents later served the rest of the wizarding community of Great Britain. In 2007 he was promoted to the Head of the <a href="/wiki/Auror_Office" title="Auror Office">Auror Office</a> at age 26 and was later made the Head of <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Magical Law Enforcement</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-151" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-151">&#91;151&#93;</a></sup> His promotion to these positions of power at relatively young ages demonstrated Harry's natural talent as a commander.</li>
<li><b>Indomitable willpower</b>: Harry appeared to possess an unbreakable spirit and though not above depression, he never truly gave up on any mission. He had been shown to rise from defeat and loss, such as the deaths of many loved ones, even stronger than before. Harry's indomitable will was exemplified by his ability to resist the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a> and possibly, on the onther hand, by his ability to cast powerful Imperius Curses. It was also exemplified by the fact that he had never begged for mercy (even in life-and-death situations), he would fight back in defiance of himself, as well as perform <a href="/wiki/Nonverbal_spell" title="Nonverbal spell">non-verbal spells</a> flawlessly.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_47-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-47">&#91;47&#93;</a></sup> His inability to perform <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a> (despite possessing the required willpower) was due to his inability to keep his emotions under control.</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>You're a r-really good teacher, you know. I've never been able to Stun anything before.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Cho Chang regarding Harry's teaching ability<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<ul><li><b>Teaching skills</b>: Harry demonstrated tremendous skill in teaching others. Having mastered many spells at a young age, Harry successfully taught them to others even when he was still a student himself. He would give proper instructions and corrections on how to perform many fields of magic, ranging from the relatively simplistic <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Disarming Charm</a> to the highly advanced <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_117-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-117">&#91;117&#93;</a></sup> Harry's effectiveness as a teacher led many, some even older than him, to choose him over the Ministry-installed (but highly incompetent) teacher <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>. He even returned to Hogwarts to give occasional <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> lectures as an adult and professional Auror. He kept his teaching aptitude in his later years and successfully instructed the members of the <a href="/wiki/Statute_of_Secrecy_Task_Force" title="Statute of Secrecy Task Force">Statute of Secrecy Task Force</a> in the use of several formidable spells.</li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Possessions">Possessions</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=102" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Possessions">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=102" title="Edit section: Possessions"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>He's been left a house?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon Dursley</a>'s shock regarding Harry's inheritance<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">Potter</a> <a href="/wiki/Vault_687" title="Vault 687">Legacy</a></b>: When Harry's parents were murdered by <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, they left behind a small fortune in Vault 687 of <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a>. This inheritance became Harry's source of funding for all his <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> textbooks, wizarding clothes, and other expenses.</li></ul>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141208232731" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="150" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg" data-image-key="HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20141208232731" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141208232731" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20141208232731" decoding="async" width="150" height="150" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg" data-image-key="HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ca/HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20141208232731" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HarryPotterWandNN8415.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's first wand: 11", holly, and phoenix feather</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">Wand</a></b>: As is the case with most <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizards and witches</a>, Harry's <a href="/wiki/Wand" title="Wand">wand</a> is among his most valued <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magical</a> possessions. His wand is made of <a href="/wiki/Holly" title="Holly">holly</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Wand_wood" title="Wand wood">wood</a> with the powers to repel evil.<sup id="cite_ref-152" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-152">&#91;152&#93;</a></sup> The wand is in deliberate contrast to the wand of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, which is <a href="/wiki/Yew" title="Yew">yew</a>: a wood with the powers of evil. Harry's wand shared a twin core with Voldemort's wand, as both contained <a href="/wiki/Phoenix_feather" title="Phoenix feather">phoenix feathers</a> from the same phoenix, <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a>. Harry's wand broke in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> during a <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1997)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1997)">skirmish</a> with <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> in <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>'s house due to a stray spell cast by <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>. Later he used the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a> to repair it.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy%27s_wand" title="Draco Malfoy&#39;s wand">Draco Malfoy's wand</a></b>: In <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a> Harry won the <a href="/wiki/Hawthorn" title="Hawthorn">hawthorn</a> wand's allegiance after overpowering Draco Malfoy during the <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</a>. This wand was carried by him for the remainder of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>; seeing action in the <a href="/wiki/Break-in_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" title="Break-in of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)">break-in at Gringotts</a>, as well as during the final climactic <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>. It is unknown what happened to the wand after Harry repaired <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">his wand</a>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_photo_album" title="Harry Potter&#39;s photo album">Photo album</a></b>: In June of <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a> <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> gave this album as a gift to Harry. The album contained pictures of his parents, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, and himself.</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>We've decided that your need is greater than ours.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Fred and George giving Harry the Marauder's Map<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Marauder%27sMap.png/revision/latest?cb=20150114123703" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="281" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Marauder&#39;sMap.png" data-image-key="Marauder&#39;sMap.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Marauder%27sMap.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20150114123703" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Marauder%27sMap.png/revision/latest?cb=20150114123703" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Marauder%27sMap.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20150114123703" decoding="async" width="150" height="281" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Marauder&#39;sMap.png" data-image-key="Marauder&#39;sMap.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a3/Marauder%27sMap.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20150114123703" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Marauder%27sMap.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Marauder's Map</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a></b>: One of Harry's most treasured possessions. In his third year, <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a> gave it to Harry while he was trying to sneak into <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>. It was confiscated by <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, but later returned when Lupin quit his job. Harry kept it with him for a long period of time, keeping it in the <a href="/wiki/Mokeskin" title="Mokeskin">mokeskin</a> wallet he had gotten from Hagrid, until it was finally stolen from his desk by his son, James.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a></b>: Another valued and useful possession is Harry's Cloak of Invisibility. In his first year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a>, he received it as an anonymous Christmas gift. He later learned the gift came from <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>, who obtained it in turn from Harry's father, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James Potter</a>. It was later revealed to be a <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">family</a> heirloom as well as one of the three <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>. From this Harry realises he is a direct descendant of Ignotus Peverell, one of the three brothers who created the Deathly Hallows. Harry later gave the Cloak to his eldest son, James Sirius.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a></b>: Harry's animal companion, Hedwig was vitally helpful in delivering messages and packages for Harry, especially while Sirius was in hiding from the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry</a>. Hedwig loved Harry dearly, showing signs by nibbling his ear or fingers, and loyally obeyed his every command (even pecking Ron and Hermione until they answer back). Harry loved her as much as she loved him. Hedwig was killed during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a> by a stray Killing Curse that was most likely meant for Hagrid. Harry was overcome with grief over Hedwig's death.</li></ul>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20080810144607" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="67" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Deathly Hallows.PNG" data-image-key="Deathly_Hallows.PNG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20080810144607" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20080810144607" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20080810144607" decoding="async" width="250" height="67" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Deathly Hallows.PNG" data-image-key="Deathly_Hallows.PNG" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20080810144607" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathly_Hallows.PNG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Deathly Hallows (left to right): Cloak of Invisibility, Resurrection Stone, and the Elder Wand</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a></b>: For a brief time, Harry was master of all three <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>: the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a>, and the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a> (though he was not in physical possession of the Elder Wand until after losing the Resurrection Stone). These three artefacts are the most powerful magical items in all of the wizarding world and were so ancient that they were only the subject of <a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">fairy tales</a>. When Harry lost the Resurrection Stone inside the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, he decided to leave it there. Harry also interred the Elder Wand in Albus Dumbledore's grave, so the power of the wand would be extinguished after Harry's eventual death. However, the portrait of Dumbledore that hangs in the <a href="/wiki/Headmaster%27s_office" class="mw-redirect" title="Headmaster&#39;s office">Headmaster's office</a> advised Harry to keep the Invisibility cloak, since it was his father's.<br clear="right" /></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>It belongs to Harry! It chose him, he was the one who found it, it came to him out of the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Hermione arguing with <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>, regarding the ownership of the Sword of Gryffindor<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png/revision/latest?cb=20161125023226" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="197" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Sir Harry of Gryffindor.png" data-image-key="Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161125023226" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png/revision/latest?cb=20161125023226" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161125023226" decoding="async" width="150" height="197" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Sir Harry of Gryffindor.png" data-image-key="Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161125023226" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Sir_Harry_of_Gryffindor.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Sword of Gryffindor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a></b>: A relic of the <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor" title="Godric Gryffindor">founder</a> of Harry's <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">house</a>, the goblin-made sword of Godric Gryffindor was left to Harry by his former Headmaster <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> in his <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">will</a>. However, the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> claimed that it was not Dumbledore's to give, and that it truly belonged to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. Although the Ministry confiscated a replica of the sword, the true sword found its way into Harry's possession still through the machinations of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>. Soon after, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> used it to destroy <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin&#39;s Locket">Slytherin's Locket</a>, one of Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. Harry lost the sword to <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> when he, Ron and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> <a href="/wiki/Break-in_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" title="Break-in of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)">stole</a> <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a> at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a>. However, the sword reappeared in the hands of <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>; he used it to kill <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, and thus destroyed the last of the Horcruxes. Neville was seen sitting beside the sword after the battle, but it is likely that it was returned to Hogwarts as a relic of the Founders, along with the remains of the other Founders' relics.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_penknife" title="Sirius Black&#39;s penknife">Enchanted knife</a></b>: This magical knife, with the power to open most mechanical locks and magical seals and which Harry received for Christmas from Sirius Black, was melted when Harry tried it on a locked door at the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>. The protective enchantments on the door were far stronger than the magic of the enchanted knife.</li></ul>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140603220634" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="226" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry potter balai firebolt 175 7.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20140603220634" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140603220634" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20140603220634" decoding="async" width="150" height="226" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry potter balai firebolt 175 7.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20140603220634" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_potter_balai_firebolt_175_7.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A Firebolt, his second broom and a Christmas gift</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_Firebolt" title="Harry Potter&#39;s Firebolt">Firebolt</a></b>: During Harry's third year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a> <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a> he'd been riding since his first year was destroyed by the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> replaced it by giving Harry the <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">finest broom</a> available as an anonymous gift. The broom was one of Harry's most prized possessions for years. It was lost during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a>. It is not known if Harry ever recovered or replaced it.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_Nimbus_2000" title="Harry Potter&#39;s Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a></b>: This broomstick was gifted to him from <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> after agreeing to join the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a> in 1991. He used it during his first and second years at Hogwarts. In his third year it blew into the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a> and was smashed to bits, breaking it beyond repair.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Two-way_mirror" title="Two-way mirror">Communication mirror</a></b>: Harry also owns one in a pair of <a href="/wiki/Two-way_mirror" title="Two-way mirror">two-way mirrors</a>, given to him by his godfather <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>. The mirror was intended to be a means covert communication, but Harry broke it out of anger over Sirius' death. Harry did not realise the mirror could still work, although he kept a shard out of sentimentality. When Harry and several friends are captured at <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a>, at the time being used as a headquarters for Voldemort, Harry used the shard of mirror to communicate with <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>, who had the other mirror. Aberforth sent <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> to rescue Harry and the other prisoners.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_schoolbag" title="Harry Potter&#39;s schoolbag">Schoolbag</a></b>: A schoolbag was used by Harry Potter to carry around textbooks, quills, and other items throughout his six years attending <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. It is possible that this bag was used even in his <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> education before attending Hogwarts.<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161121184137" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="228" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry In his New Jumper from Mrs Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161121184137" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161121184137" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161121184137" decoding="async" width="150" height="228" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry In his New Jumper from Mrs Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9c/Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161121184137" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_In_his_New_Jumper_from_Mrs_Weasley.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry wearing a Weasley jumper</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Weasley_jumper" title="Weasley jumper">Weasley jumpers</a></b>: Harry received a homemade jumper every <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> from <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a>. His were said to be much more extravagant, as Mrs Weasley "made much more effort" when her presents were not made for actual family members. The known jumpers he has include an emerald green one, a scarlet one, a green one with a <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_Horntail" title="Hungarian Horntail">Hungarian Horntail</a> on the front, and one with a <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a> on the front.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Sneakoscope" title="Sneakoscope">Sneakoscope</a></b>: Hermione Granger gave Harry a Sneakoscope as a gift for his seventeenth birthday at breakfast, the trio would later take it on their <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter&#39;s Horcrux Hunt">hunt for Horcruxes</a>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_alarm_clock" title="Harry Potter&#39;s alarm clock">Alarm clock</a></b>: In the summer of <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, Harry found and repaired the alarm clock and in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, this alarm clock ticked on Harry's windowsill as he slept on the night that <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> came to collect him.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_first_Golden_Snitch" title="Harry Potter&#39;s first Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a></b>: This Snitch was caught by Harry during the <a href="/wiki/1991-1992_school_year" class="mw-redirect" title="1991-1992 school year">1991-1992 school year</a>. It was later left to him in Albus Dumbledore's will, to posthumously ensure that <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt&#39;s Ring">Marvolo Gaunt's Ring</a> would be safely delivered to him.</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Harry took off his watch, which he was only wearing out of habit, as it didn't work anymore, and stuffed it into his pocket.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;Harry takes off his watch before a lesson about <a href="/wiki/Niffler" title="Niffler">nifflers</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_watch" title="Harry Potter&#39;s watch">Watch</a></b>: This watch was used by Harry until it was destroyed in the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament#The_Second_Task" title="Triwizard Tournament">Second Task</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, since it was not waterproof and by <a href="/wiki/May" title="May">May</a> of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, he had discarded the watch entirely.</li></ul>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161121175452" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="150" height="250" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter (GoF-07) dress robes.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_(GoF-07)_dress_robes.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161121175452" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161121175452" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161121175452" decoding="async" width="150" height="250" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter (GoF-07) dress robes.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_(GoF-07)_dress_robes.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161121175452" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_(GoF-07)_dress_robes.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's dress robes at the Yule Ball</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_dress_robes" title="Harry Potter&#39;s dress robes">Dress robes</a></b>: Harry wore dress robes to the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> for the <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, they were bottle green that matched his eyes. He also wore dress robes to <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">Bill and Fleur's wedding</a> in 1997. He also wore a set of dress robes to Slughorn's Christmas Party in 1996.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett%27s_watch" title="Fabian Prewett&#39;s watch">Fabian Prewett's watch</a></b>: <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> gave Harry the watch of her late brother <a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett" title="Fabian Prewett">Fabian Prewett</a> for his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_seventeenth_birthday_party" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter&#39;s seventeenth birthday party">seventeenth birthday</a>. It has a dent in it, but Harry kept the watch, even into his thirties. The watch does not have arms; rather, it has stars.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Mokeskin_pouch" title="Mokeskin pouch">Mokeskin pouch</a></b>: A birthday present from Hagrid. Harry kept it with him throughout the Deathly Hallows, and kept in it his treasures that were of no use to his search; the Snitch, the broken mirror, his broken wand, his mother's letter and the fake Horcrux. Harry also received a photo album, from Hagrid, which had photos of his parents and other family members.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_rucksack" title="Harry Potter&#39;s rucksack">Rucksack</a></b>: This rucksack was owned by Harry during the 1997-1998 school year. He packed it with everything he felt he would need during the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter&#39;s Horcrux Hunt">hunt for Horcruxes</a>. He almost lost it during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a>, but managed to keep hold of it.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Enchanted_razor" title="Enchanted razor">Enchanted razor</a></b>: In 1997, Harry received an enchanted razor on his seventeenth birthday from <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>. It is not known whether he used it at any point or if he still owns it.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Practical_Defensive_Magic_and_Its_Use_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Practical Defensive Magic and Its Use Against the Dark Arts">Practical Defensive Magic and Its Use Against the Dark Arts</a></b></i>: This book had moving colour illustrations of all the <a href="/wiki/Counter-jinx" title="Counter-jinx">counter-jinxes</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hex" title="Hex">hexes</a> it described. Harry received a set of these books in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> as a Christmas present from <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> and <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>. Harry planned to put them to good use in his lessons for <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>.</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts_and_Where_to_Find_Them" title="Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them"><b>Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them</b></a></i>: Harry owned a copy of this book, as was mandatory for any student of Hogwarts studying <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a>. He shared it with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> after the latter lost his. The trio doodled and wrote messages to each other throughout the book.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Flying_with_the_Cannons" title="Flying with the Cannons">Flying with the Cannons</a></b></i>: Harry received a copy of this from Ron Weasley in 1992 as a Christmas present.<sup id="cite_ref-CoS_153-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CoS-153">&#91;153&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Teams_of_Britain_and_Ireland" title="Quidditch Teams of Britain and Ireland">Quidditch Teams of Britain and Ireland</a></b></i>: <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> gave this book to Harry in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, as a Christmas gift.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Twelve_Fail-Safe_Ways_to_Charm_Witches" title="Twelve Fail-Safe Ways to Charm Witches">Twelve Fail-Safe Ways to Charm Witches</a></b></i>: This book is a sophomoric manual on dating and flirting with girls. A copy was given to Harry on his seventeenth birthday from <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>. Harry speculated that there might be an entire chapter devoted to compliments.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_notebook" title="Harry Potter&#39;s notebook">Notebook</a></b>: This notebook was owned by Harry from at least <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>. It was used to keep his notes and other writings, such as things he wanted to remember.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_toy_broomstick" title="Harry Potter&#39;s toy broomstick">Toy broomstick</a></b>: this was a gift to him from Sirius Black, it was the first broomstick he had ridden. It's unknown what happened to it after the <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1981)">1981 attack at Godric's Hollow</a>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_car" title="Harry Potter&#39;s car">Car</a></b>: This car was used by Harry to drive his family to <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a> on 1 September, 2017. On <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform 9¾</a>, Ron Weasley asked Harry if he had parked the vehicle alright, then told him he had managed to park his own car.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_and_Ginevra_Potter%27s_house" title="Harry and Ginevra Potter&#39;s house">Family home</a>:</b> Sometime following the war, Harry acquired his own house and raised his three children there alongside his wife, <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>. This can be assumed due to Harry denying James' request to have Teddy move in with them in exchange for sharing a room with his younger brother. Harry replied that he would only allow the two Potter brothers to share a room when "[he wanted] the house demolished."</li></ul>
<p>After <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> died, all of his remaining possessions were passed along to Harry. This included: Kreacher
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>As you can see, Harry, Kreacher is showing a certain reluctance to pass into your ownership.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> confirming that Harry now owns the Black estate<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 252px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420212214" class="image"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" width="250" height="83" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C4M1 Advance Guard and Harry outside Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420212214" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420212214" class="image"><img alt="" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420212214" decoding="async" width="250" height="83" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C4M1 Advance Guard and Harry outside Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420212214" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C4M1_Advance_Guard_and_Harry_outside_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">12 Grimmauld Place, London</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Vault_711" title="Vault 711">Black inheritance</a></b>: Located at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>, it and all the contents and furnishings of the house, including <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> (the family <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a>) became Harry's. <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a> would later try to steal many of Harry's inherited possessions, including <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin&#39;s Locket">Slytherin's Locket</a>. Harry also inherited the remainder of Sirius' wealth in wizard's gold at Gringotts. Since Sirius was disowned at the age of sixteen, it is likely that this wealth was limited to the gold left to him by his uncle <a href="/wiki/Alphard_Black" title="Alphard Black">Alphard Black</a>. However, that is open to debate because although Sirius Black was disinherited by his family, he ended up inheriting the <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> after their death, which might lead us to believe in the existence of forms of inheritance from his family other than what his uncle left him.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_motorbike" class="mw-redirect" title="Sirius Black&#39;s motorbike">Motorbike</a></b>: As one of Sirius's possessions, it was left to Harry, presumably in his will. Despite the severe damage done to it in the Battle of the Seven Potters, Arthur Weasley managed to repair the bike and returned it to Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-chat_154-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-chat-154">&#91;154&#93;</a></sup> Harry presumably learned to ride it sometime after the war. Given the ease with which he learned to fly a broomstick, ride animals such as hippogriffs and thestrals, and even a dragon, Harry likely learned how to ride with very little trouble at all.</li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Relationships">Relationships</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=103" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Relationships">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=103" title="Edit section: Relationships"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_relationships" title="Harry Potter&#39;s relationships">Harry Potter's relationships</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<p>Throughout his life, Harry has had many relationships with a variety of people. Because of his upbringing, he had few connections in his early years, the only people he truly interacted with being the abusive <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>. With his introduction to the wizarding world, this changed and he built connections with many of the residents of the magical community, both good and bad. His strongest relationships were with: <a href="/wiki/James_and_Lily_Potter" title="James and Lily Potter">his parents</a>, <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">his children</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a>, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> and <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a>.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=104" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=104" title="Edit section: Etymology"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_(name)" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Harry (name)">Harry</a> is the Middle English form of the name <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_(given_name)" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Henry (given name)">Henry</a>, derived from the Germanic name <i>Heinrich,</i> from the words <i>heim,</i> meaning "home", and <i>ric</i>, meaning "power, ruler". It has been a very popular name in the English-speaking world for centuries. Harry can also be a diminutive form of the name Harold, from the Old English name <i>Hereweald</i>, meaning "leader of the army". It has been the name of five kings of Norway, three kings of Denmark, and two kings of England.<sup id="cite_ref-155" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-155">&#91;155&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-156" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-156">&#91;156&#93;</a></sup> In an interview J. K. Rowling stated that 'Harry' had always been one of her favourite boy's names and that if her daughter had been a son she would have named him 'Harry', although then she would have to have come up with a different name for the books as it <i>"would have been too cruel to name him after my own son".</i><sup id="cite_ref-accio-quote.org_157-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-accio-quote.org-157">&#91;157&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_(name)" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:James (name)">James</a> is derived from the same Hebrew name as Jacob, meaning “holds the heel” (in the Genesis narrative, Jacob was born grasping Esau′s heel and later bought his birthright). The name came into English language from the French variation of the Late Latin name Iacomus, a dialect variant of Iacobus, from the New Testament Greek Ἰάκωβος (Iakōbos), from Hebrew word יעקב (Yaʻaqov). James is Harry's middle name, James was the name of his father and is also the name of his first son.
</p><p><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Potter" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Potter">Potter</a> is a very common surname of English origin.<sup id="cite_ref-158" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-158">&#91;158&#93;</a></sup> It traditionally refers to the occupation of making pottery. <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beatrix_Potter" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Beatrix Potter">Beatrix Potter</a> was a well-known English children's author. <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Potter%27s_Field" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Potter&#39;s Field">Potter's Field</a> is the name for a burial ground for the unknown or unclaimed dead, particularly soldiers and orphans; the Potter family had many members that fit that description. The <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Potter_Box" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Potter Box">Potter Box</a> is a model for making ethical decisions developed at Harvard University. <a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> has also commented that she has liked the name since childhood, as a family that had lived near her carried this surname.<sup id="cite_ref-accio-quote.org_157-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-accio-quote.org-157">&#91;157&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-159" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-159">&#91;159&#93;</a></sup> The last name "Potter" was also carried by the first successful magician in 1811 in America named Richard Potter<sup id="cite_ref-160" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-160">&#91;160&#93;</a></sup> who also happened to be African-American, the land that was bought by the magician and where Potter lived was called "Potter Place".<sup id="cite_ref-161" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-161">&#91;161&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Behind_the_scenes">Behind the scenes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?veaction=edit&amp;section=105" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: Behind the scenes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit&amp;section=105" title="Edit section: Behind the scenes"><svg class="wds-icon wds-icon-tiny section-edit-pencil-icon"><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-pencil-tiny"></use></svg>edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:&#160;J.K.Rowling Official Site">"<i>There are quite a few real Harry Potters out there. So far I have heard of a newborn baby who actually has Harry's full name (Harry James Potter), a barrister in London, a grandfather who was very pleased that he had become cool in his grandchildren's eyes, a soldier who died in the second world war (I was sent a picture of his tombstone) and a clockmaker who worked in London in the last century.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> regarding the name Harry James Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/J.K.Rowling_Official_Site" class="mw-redirect" title="J.K.Rowling Official Site">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
